src: "Yes! King Tutankhamun, sometimes referred to as ""King Tut"" or ""The Boy King"", is one of the most well known ancient Egyptian kings in modern times. Interestingly, he was not considered to be very important in ancient times and was not recorded on most ancient king lists. However, the discovery of his tomb in 1922 made him a celebrity. While many tombs of the past were robbed, this tomb was left virtually undisturbed. Most of the items buried with Tutankhamun have been well preserved, including thousands of artefacts made from precious metals and rare stones."
mt: "Iya! Raja Tutankhamun, kadang-kadang disebut ""Raja Tut"" atawa ""Raja Bocah"", nyaéta salah sahiji raja Mesir kuna anu paling dipikawanoh dina jaman kiwari. Unikna, éta raja teu dipikawanoh ku rakyatna dina jaman éta jeung teu dicatet dina daftar raja-rja. Aya sababaraha makam raja-rja anu sebelumna teu dipaké, tapi makamna Tutankhamun teu dipaké jeung teu dipaké. Banyak barang-barang anu dikuburkeun bareng jeung Tutankhamun teu dipaké, kaasup ribuan artefak anu dijieun tina logam mulia jeung batu langka."
ref: "Leres! Raja Tutankhamun, anu sakapeung disebut ""Raja Tut"" atawa ""Raja Muda"", nyaeta salah sahiji Raja Mesir kuno anu dikenal pisan di zaman modern. Unikna, anjeunna henteu dianggep penting pisan di jaman harita teras henteu dicatet dina daptar raja-raja jaman baheula. Nanging, papanggihan makamna di 1922 ngajantenkeun anjeunna jadi selebritis, nalika seeur makam kapungkur dijarah, makam anjeunna diantep teu kaganggu. Seeurna barang anu kakubur sareng Tutankhamun téh parantos dilestarikeun, kalebet  ogé rébuan paninggalan anu dijieun tina logam mulia sareng batu langka."

src: We know many Greek politicians, scientists, and artists. Possibly the most known person of this culture is Homer, the legendary blind poet, who composed two masterpieces of Greek literature: the poems Iliad and Odyssey. Sophocles and Aristophanes are still popular playwrights and their plays are considered to be among the greatest works of world literature. Another famous Greek is a mathematician Pythagoras, mostly known for his famous theorem about relations of the sides of right triangles.
mt: Kami tahu banyakan politikus, ilmuan, sareng seniman Yunani. Mungkin urang anu paling dipikirkeun ti budaya éta nyaéta Homer, saurang penyair legénda anu buta, anu nulis dua karya klasik sajarah Yunani: puisi Iliad sareng Odyssey. Sophocles sareng Aristophanes masih populer tiwuh jeung drama-drama éta dianggap salaku karya-karya anu pangagungna di sajarah sastra dunya. Urang Yunani anu kasohor deui nyaéta matematikawan Pythagoras, anu paling dipikirkeun pikeun teoremanya ngeunaan hubungan sisi segitiga kanon.
ref: Urang sadayana terang seueur politisi, élmuwan, sareng seniman Yunani. Jigana anu paling kasohor dina budaya ieu nyaéta Homer, penyair buta anu kasohor pisan, anu ngadamel dua mahakarya sastra Yunani: puisi Iliad sareng Odyssey. Sophocles sareng Aristophanes masih jadi panulis naskah populér sareng lakonana dianggap karya sastra pangpentingna di dunya. Jalmi Yunani séjén anu kawéntar nyaéta matematikawan Phythagoras, paling ka sohor ku teori na anu kawéntar ngeunaan sisi sagitiga katuhu.

src: In the warm climate of the Middle East, the house was not so important. Most of the life of the Hebrew family happened in the open air. Women did the cooking in the yard; stores were just open counters looking into the street. Stone was used for building houses. There were no large forests in the land of Canaan, so wood was extremely expensive.
mt: Dina iklim hangat ti Tenggara, rumah téh teu kawajib. Béda loba ti kahirupan kulawarga Ibrani ngalakukeun di luar. Bajing-bajing ngadamel makanan di halaman; toko-toko téh teu leuwih ti hiji kauntér anu nongkong ka jalan. Batu téh dipaké pikeun ngadamel rumah. Aya teu loba hutan di tanah Kanaan, jadi kayu téh mahal.
ref: Dina iklim haneut dina Timur Tengah, Imah henteu pati penting pikeun aranjeunna. Lolobana kahirupan ti kulawarga Ibrani kajadian dina rohangan terbuka. Istri masakna di halaman; toko-toko ngan saukur konter anu malik ka jalan. Batu dianggo pikeun ngawangun imah. Tiheulana heunteu aya hutan lega di tanah Kanaan, jadi harga kayu mahal pisan.

src: Greenland was settled sparsely. In the Norse sagas they say that Erik the Red was exiled from Iceland for murder, and when travelling further west, found Greenland and named it Greenland. But regardless of his discovery, Eskimo tribes were already living there at the time. Though each country was 'Scandinavian', there were many differences between the people, kings, customs and history of Denmark, Sweden, Norway and Iceland.
mt: Greenland dipadati rata-rata. Dina sagas Norse éta, disebutkeun yén Erik Sang Merah dipindahkeun ti Islandia pikeun pembunuhan, jeung nalika ngalajengkeun ka barat, ngadegkeun Greenland jeung ngarandamna Greenland. Nanging, tanpa ngadegkeunna, suku Eskimo geus ngahuni di tempat éta dina waktu éta. Walaupun sababaraha negara 'Skandinavia', aya béda-béda antara urang, raja, adat jeung sejarah Denmark, Swedia, Norwegia jeung Islandia.
ref: Greenland tara aya anu nempatan. Dina carita Nordik aranjeunna ngadongeng yén Erik si Beureum diasingkeun ti Islandia kusabab ngabunuh, teras nalika ngumbara ka kulon, mendakan Greenland teras masihan nami Greenland. Tapi salian ti panimuan anjeuna, suku éskimo téh emang tos netep dina eta tempat ti jaman harita. Sanaos unggal nagara eta 'Skandinavia', aya seueur bedana antara masarakat, raja, adat istiadat sareng sajarah ti Denmark, Swedia, Norwegia Sareng Islandia.

src: While most of their food would be familiar to us, Romans did have their share of strange or unusual feast items, including wild boar, peacock, snails, and a type of rodent called a dormouse Another difference was that while the poor people and the woman ate their food while sitting in chairs, the rich men liked to have banquets together where they would lounge on their sides while they ate their meals. Ancient Roman meals couldn't have included foods that came to Europe from America or from Asia in later centuries. For instance, they didn't have corn, nor tomatoes, nor potatoes, nor cocoa, and no ancient Roman ever tasted a turkey.
mt: Salian ti makanan anu umum, Romawi ngalaman panganan anu asing atawa anu aneh, kaasup babi hutan, burung merak, siput, sareng hirup anu disebut dormouse. Beda sanesna nalika nyaeta jalma-jalma miskin sareng awewe tuang bari diuk dina korsi, anu beunghar resep ngayakeun perjamuan babarengan dina aranjeunna bakal berbaring nalika tuang. Tuangeun Romawi Kuno henteu tiasa ngalebetkeun tuangeun anu dugi ka Éropa ti Amérika atanapi ti Asia di abad-abad saparantosna. Salaku conto, aranjeunna henteu gaduh jagung, tomat, kentang, kalapa, teras teu aya jalmi Romawi kuno anu atos nyobian kalkun.

src: While most of their food would be familiar to us, Romans did have their share of strange or unusual feast items, including wild boar, peacock, snails, and a type of rodent called a dormouse Another difference was that while the poor people and the woman ate their food while sitting in chairs, the rich men liked to have banquets together where they would lounge on their sides while they ate their meals. Ancient Roman meals couldn't have included foods that came to Europe from America or from Asia in later centuries. For instance, they didn't have corn, nor tomatoes, nor potatoes, nor cocoa, and no ancient Roman ever tasted a turkey.

src: A civilization is a singular culture shared by a significant large group of people who live and work co-operatively, a society. The word civilization comes from the Latin civilis, meaning civil, related to the Latin civis, meaning citizen, and civitas, meaning city or city-state, and that also somehow defines the size of the society. City-states are the precursors of nations. A civilizational culture implies the passing on of knowledge across several generations, a lingering cultural footprint and fair dissemination. Minor cultures often vanish without leaving relevant historic evidence and fail to be recognized as proper civilizations.
mt: Peradaban nyaéta budaya nu dipaké ku hiji grup nu cukup gedé, anu ngahubungkeun diri jeung kahirupan jeung kerja bareng, nu disebut masyarakat. Kata peradaban asalna tina basa Latin civilis, anu hartina sipil, nu patali jeung basa Latin civis, anu hartina warga, jeung civitas, anu hartina kota atawa kota negara, jeung anu ogé ngajelaskeun ukuran masyarakat. Kota negara nyaéta pambakal negara. Budaya peradaban ngimplikasikeun ngahasilkeun pengetahuan dina sababaraha generasi, jeung jeung jelemaan budaya nu nyata jeung ngabagi. Budaya-budaya nu leutik seringkali hilang tanpa ngahasilkeun bukti sejarah nu nyata jeung teu diakui minangka peradaban nu sahiang.
ref: Paradaban mangrupikeun budaya anu kagolong kana sakumpulan jalma anu hirup sareng damel sasarengan, masarakat. kecap civilization asalna tina basa Latén nyaéta civilis nu hartina sipil, aya hubungana jeung kecap Latén civis, nu hartina warga nagara, jeung civitas, nu hartina dayeuh atawa dayeuh-nagara bagian, jeung teuing kumaha harti éta téh tiasa dihartikeun sakumaha seueur na eta masarakat nu disajeroeunana. Kota-nagara bagian nyaéta pelopor bangsa. Budaya peradaban nyiratkeun penerusan pangaweryg keur sababaraha generasi,tapak budaya anu tinggaleun sarta penyebaran anu adil. Budaya minor sering binasa tanpa ninggalkeun buktos sajarah anu pakait tur gagal diaku salaku peradaban anu pantes.

src: The Drukgyal Dzong is a ruined fortress and Buddhist monastery in the upper part of the Paro District (in Phondey Village). It is said that in 1649, Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel created the fortress to commemorate his victory against the Tibetan-Mongol forces. In 1951, a fire caused for only some of the relics of the Drukgyal Dzong to remain, such as the image of Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal. After the fire, the fortress was preserved and protected, remaining to be one of Bhutan's most sensational attractions.
mt: Drukgyal Dzong nyaéta benténg anu rusak sareng biara Buddha di bagian atas Paro District (di Phondey Village). Dijelaskeun yen dina taun 1649, Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal ngadegkeun benténg pikeun ngarindukeun kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana k
ref: Drukgyal Dzong nyaeta benteng sareng biara Buddha anu tos rubuh dina bagian luhur Distrik Paro (di Kampung Phondey). Disebatkeun yén di taun 1649, Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel midamel bénténg pikeun pangémut kameunanganna ngalawan pasukan Mongol-Tibét. Di taun 1951, kahuruan nyebabkeun ngan nyisakeun sababaraha patilasan Drukgyal Dzong, sapertos gambar Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal. Saenggeus kahuruan, bénténg éta diawétkeun jeung dijaga, dugi ka janten salah sahiji anu paling dipikaresepeun di Bhutan.

src: During the 18th century Cambodia found itself squeezed between two powerful neighbors, Thailand and Vietnam. The Thais invaded Cambodia several times in the 18th century and in 1772 they destroyed Phnom Phen. In the last years of the 18th century the Vietnamese also invaded Cambodia.
mt: Di abad ka-18, Kamboja ngalaman diri ku dua tetangga nu kuat, Thailand sareng Vietnam. Thais nginvasi Kamboja sababaraha kali di abad ka-18 sareng dina taun 1772 éta ngabangun Phnom Phen. Dina taun-taun pangahirna abad ka-18, Vietnam ogé nginvasi Kamboja.
ref: Salila abad ka-18, Kamboja manggihan anjeunna kacepét di antawis dua tatangga anu kuat, Thailand jeung Vietnam. Urang Thailand narajang Kamboja sababaraha kali di abad ka 18 sareng di taun 1772, aranjeunna ngancurkeun Phnom Phen. Dina taun-taun pangtungtungna abad ka-18, urang Vietnam ogé narajang Kamboja.

src: Taiwan beginning start way back in 15th century where European sailors passing by record the island’s name as Ilha Formosa, or beautiful island. In 1624,Dutch East India Company establishes a base in southwestern Taiwan, initiating a transformation in aboriginal grain production practices and employing Chinese laborers to work on its rice and sugar plantations. In 1683, Qing dynasty (1644-1912) forces take control of Taiwan’s western and northern coastal areas and declared Taiwan as a province of the Qing Empire in 1885. In 1895, after defeat in the First Sino-Japanese War (1894-1895), the Qing government signs the Treaty of Shimonoseki, by which it cedes sovereignty over Taiwan to Japan, which rules the island until 1945.
mt: Taiwan mimiti ngadeg ti abad ka-15, di mana kapal-kapal Eropa ngalaporkeun ngeunaan nama pulo éta minangka Ilha Formosa, atawa pulo anu éndah. Dina 1624, Perusahaan Hindia Timur Belanda ngadegkeun basis di bagian kidul-kulon Taiwan, nu ngabalukarkeun perubahan praktik produksi beras aborigin jeung nyalurkeun pekerja Tionghoa pikeun bekerja di pabrik padi jeung gula éta. Dina 1683, pasukan Dinasti Qing (1644-1912) ngabéntangan bagian wétan jeung kidul Taiwan jeung ngabéntangan Taiwan minangka provinsi Dinasti Qing dina 1885. Dina 1895, sabada kalah di Perang Sino-Jepang (1894-1895), pamaréntah Dinasti Qing ngagabungkeun dina Perjanjian Shimonoseki, ku kituna éta pamaréntah ngabéntangan Taiwan ka Jepang, anu ngabéntangan pulo éta nepi ka 1945.
ref: Asal muasal Taiwan atos ti saprak abad ka-15 nalika pelaut Éropa ngaliwat tur nyatet nami pulo  éta sabagé Formosa, atanapi pulo anu éndah. Di aun1624, Walanda Hindia ngadegkeun hiji markas di barat daya Taiwan, anu mulai parobahan prakték produksi biji-bijian pribumi sareng ngagawékeun pagawé Tiongkok pikeun damel perkebonan paré sareng gula. dina taun 1683, pasukan dinasti Qing (1644-1912) nyekel wilayah basisir kulon sareng kalér Taiwan sareng nyatakeun yén Taiwan janten salah sahiji provinsi Karajaan Qing di taun 1885. Dina taun 1895, saatos éléh di Perang Sino-Jepang nu mimiti (1894-1895), Pamaréntahan Qing nandatanganan Perjanjian Shimonoseki, anu nyerahkeun kadaulatan Taiwan ka Jepang, nu nguasaan pulau éta nepi ka taun 1945.

src: This is called a chemical's pH. You can make an indicator using red cabbage juice. The cabbage juice changes color depending on how acidic or basic (alkaline) the chemical is. The pH level is indicated by the amount of Hydrogen (the H in pH) ions in the tested chemical. Hydrogen ions are protons that had their electrons stripped off them (since Hydrogen atoms consist of one proton and one electron).
mt: Éta disebut pH kimia. Kamu bisa ngagunakeun jus daun kubis pikeun ngahasilkeun indikator. Jus daun kubis ngabalukarkeun warna anu terasana tergantung kana kandungan asam atawa basa (alkaline) kimia anu diuji. Tingkat pH nyaéta ditunjukkeun ku jumlah ion hidrogen (H di pH) anu aya dina kimia anu diuji. Ion hidrogen nyaéta proton anu elektronna dipotong (sabab atom hidrogen téh ngandung hiji proton sareng hiji elektron).
ref: Ieu disebatna pH kimia. anjeun tiasa ngadamel panunjuk nganggo jus kol beureum. Jus kubis robah warna na gumantung kana sakumaha asam atawa basa (alkaline) bahan kimia na. Kadar pH na ditentukeun ku jumlah ion hidogen (H dina pH) dina bahan kimia anu dites. Ion hydrogén nyaéta proton anu ngaleupaskeun éléktronna (margi atom Hydrogen téh asalnya tina hiji proton jeung hiji éléktron).

src: Lions are the most social cats, living in large groups called prides. Prides are made up of one to three related adult males, along with as many as thirty females and cubs. The females are usually closely related to each other, being a large family of sisters and daughters. Lion prides act much like packs of wolves or dogs, animals surprisingly similar to lions (but not other big cats) in behavior, and also very deadly to their prey.
mt: Singa nyaéta kucing nu panghawa, ngahidupkeun dina grup nu leuwih gedé disebut kawanan. Kawanan éta teras diwangun ku hiji nepi ka tilu singa nu hubunganana kawin, bareng jeung nepi ka 30 betina sareng anak-anakna. Betina-betina éta umumna hubunganana deukeut, nyaéta hiji kulawarga nu ngadeg ti sora sareng anak-anakna. Kawanan singa ngalakukeun kawas kawanan wulung atawa anjing, hewan nu ngagambarkeun kawas singa (nepi ka kucing nu lain kucing gedé) dina ngalakukeun, jeung ogé ngagambarkeun kawas kawanan wulung atawa anjing nu ngancam mangsa.
ref: Singa nyaéta ucing anu paling resep bersosial, hirup dina kelompok nu gedé nu disebut kabanggaan. Prides terdiri ti hiji nepi ka tilu pejantan dewasa, sareng sakitar tilu puluh bikang sareng budakna. Awéwé biasana gaduh hubungan anu caket sareng anu sanésna, dina wujud kulawargi ageung ti sodara awéwé jeung anak awéwé. Kabanggaan singa teu béda jauh jeung kawanan serigala atawa anjing, sato anu mirip jeung singa (tapi henteu jeung ucing-ucing gedé nu séjén) dina kalakuan, jeung sakitu bahayana keur mangsana.

src: Lions are the most social cats, living in large groups called prides. Prides are made up of one to three related adult males, along with as many as thirty females and cubs. The females are usually closely related to each other, being a large family of sisters and daughters. Lion prides act much like packs of wolves or dogs, animals surprisingly similar to lions (but not other big cats) in behavior, and also very deadly to their prey.
mt: Singa nyaéta kucing nu panghawa, ngahidupkeun dina grup nu leuwih gedé disebut kawanan. Kawanan éta teras diwangun ku hiji nepi ka tilu singa nu hubunganana kawin, bareng jeung nepi ka 30 betina sareng anak-anakna. Betina-betina éta umumna hubunganana deukeut, nyaéta hiji kulawarga nu ngadeg ti sora sareng anak-anakna. Kawanan singa ngalakukeun kawas kawanan wulung atawa anjing, hewan nu ngagambarkeun kawas singa (nepi ka kucing nu lain kucing gedé) dina ngalakukeun, jeung ogé ngagambarkeun kawas kawanan wulung atawa anjing nu ngancam mangsa.
ref: Singa nyaéta ucing anu paling resep bersosial, hirup dina kelompok nu gedé nu disebut kabanggaan. Prides terdiri ti hiji nepi ka tilu pejantan dewasa, sareng sakitar tilu puluh bikang sareng budakna. Awéwé biasana gaduh hubungan anu caket sareng anu sanésna, dina wujud kulawargi ageung ti sodara awéwé jeung anak awéwé. Kabanggaan singa teu béda jauh jeung kawanan serigala atawa anjing, sato anu mirip jeung singa (tapi henteu jeung ucing-ucing gedé nu séjén) dina kalakuan, jeung sakitu bahayana keur mangsana.

src: Under them are more medium sized cats that eat medium sized prey ranging from rabbits to antelopes and deer. Finally, there are many small cats (including loose pet cats) that eat the far more numerous small prey like insects, rodents, lizards, and birds. The secret to their success is the concept of the niche, a special job each cat holds that keeps it from competing with others.
mt: Di handapna aya kucing sedang anu makan mangsa sedang ti antilop jeung rusa nepi ka kelinci. Akhirna, aya kucing leutik (termasuk kucing hirup bebas) anu makan mangsa leutik ti serangga, tikus, ular, jeung burung. Rahasana keberhasilan éta nyaéta konsep niche, pekerjaan khusus ti kucing anu ngahindarkeun éta tina kompetisi.
ref: Di handapeun éta nyaéta ucing nu ukuranna sedeng anu dahar mangsa ukuran sedeng mulai tina kelinci, antelop, jeung rusa. Akhirna, loba ucing leutik (kaasup ucing piaraan) anu daang leuwih loba sato leutik kos sato gegemetan, beurit, kadal, jeung manuk. Rahasia pikeun kasuksésan aranjeunna nyaéta konsép ceruk, padamelan husus diboga ku ucing méh ngajauhkeun persaingan jeung nu séjén.

src: Ocelots like to eat small animals. They will catch monkeys, snakes, rodents and birds if they can. Almost all of the animals that the ocelot hunts are far smaller than it is. Scientists think that ocelots follow and find animals to eat (prey) by smell, sniffing for where they've been on the ground. They can see very well in the dark with night vision, and move very stealthily, too. Ocelots hunt their prey by blending in with their surroundings then pouncing on their prey.
mt: Ocelot ngeunaan makanan anu leutik. Anjeunna bakal ngarangkeun monyet, ular, rodensia sareng burung jikana bisa. Hama anu ocelot ngarangkeun hampir kabéh leuwih leutik ti anjeunna. Ilmuan ngajak yén ocelot ngiket sareng ngidulkeun hama (prey) ku ngabasa, ngabasa pikeun nempo di taneuh. Anjeunna bisa nempo leuwih bagus di gelap ku night vision, sareng gerak leuwih bagus, ogé.
ref: Ocelots resep ngamangsa sato nu leutik. Maranéhna bakal ngadahar monyet, oray, sato nu ngégél jeung manuk mun manéhna bisa. Hampir kabéh sato anu dimangsa ku ocelot téh leuwih leutik ti ukuran manéhna. para elmuan nganggap yen ocelot moro sato sejen pikeun didahar teh ku pangangseuna, ngangseu jana taneuh dimana sato sejen eta pernah ngaliwat. Sato éta tiasa ébréh dina poék nganggo panenjo wengi, teras tiasa ogé ongko-ongkoan lalaunan pisan. Ocelot moro mangsana ku nyampur kana sakurilingna teras ngerekeb mangsana.

src: A well rounded athlete, the tiger can climb (though not well), swim, leap great distances and pull with five times the force of a strong human. The tiger is in the same group (Genus Panthera) as lions, leopards, and jaguars. These four cats are the only ones who can roar. The tiger's roar is not like the full-voiced roar of a lion, but more like a sentence of snarly, shouted words.
mt: Atlet nu leuwih boga, harimau bisa naik (walaupun teu bagus), ngejalan, lompat jauh sareng ngagulung ku lima kali kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak kuak

Maung teh aya dina jumplukan anu sarua (Genus Panthera) jeung singa, maung belang tutul, jeung jaguar. Opat ucing ieu téh hiji-hijina anu bisa ngagerem. Geurungan maung heunteu okos geurungan singa anu gede tapi leuwih sarua jeung geureungan kalimat anu laun.

src: A cell is the smallest structural and functional unit of a living (things) organism. Cell comes from the Latin word cella which means small room. If you look at living things under a microscope, you will see that they are made of small squares or balls. Robert Hooke, a biologist from England, saw small squares in cork with a microscope. They looked like rooms. He was the first person to observe dead cells
mt: Sel nyaéta unit struktur jeung fungsi paling leutik tina hiji organisme hidup. Sel asalna tina basa Latin cella anu hartina ruang leutik. Jika kalian ngamot hiji organisme hidup di mikroskop, kalian bakal nempo yén hiji organisme téh tina kubus-kubus atawa bola-bola. Robert Hooke, biolog ti Inggris, nempo kubus-kubus di kayu cendana di mikroskop. Kubus-kubus éta nempo kaya ruang. Éta nyaéta jalma kapertama anu nempo sel mati.
ref: Sél téh nyaéta unit struktural jeung fungsional anu pangleutikna tina organisme kahirupan. Sél asalna tina basa Latin anu hartosna rohang alit. Lamun anjeun ningal mahluk hirup nganggo mikroskop, anjeun bakal ningal yen aranjeunna kasusun tina kotak-kotak atawa bola-bola leutik. Robert Hooke, ahli biologi ti Inggris, ningali kotak alit dina colokanana liwat mikroskop. Maranéhanana katembong siga rohangan-rohangan. Anjeunna téh jalmi kahiji anu nitetan sél nilar.

src: Animals are made of many cells. They eat things and digest them inside. Most animals can move. Only animals have brains (though not even all animals do; jellyfish, for example, do not have brains). Animals are found all over the earth. They dig in the ground, swim in the oceans, and fly in the sky.
mt: Hayangna tina loba sel. Mereka makan bahan-bahan sareng membusuk di dalam. Banyak hewan bisa bergerak. Hanya hewan memiliki otak (meskipun tidak bahkan semua hewan; misalnya, ubur-ubur, tidak memiliki otak). Hewan ditemukan di seluruh bumi. Mereka menggali di tanah, berenang di lautan, dan terbang di langit.
ref: Sato dijieun tina loba sel. Maranéhanana dahar jeung nyerna dina jero awak. Kalolobaan sato tiasa  unggut. Sato hungkul anu gaduh otak (sanajan teu sadayana sato gaduh; ubur-ubur, contona, henteu gaduh otak). Sato kapanggih sakumna dunya. Maranéhanana ngadongkar taneuh, ngojay di sagara, sareng ngalayang di langit.

src: Plants make oxygen which humans breathe, and they take in carbon-dioxide which humans exhale (that is, breathe out). Plants make their food from the sun by photosynthesis. They also provide shade. We make our houses from plants and make clothes from plants. Most foods that we eat are plants. Without plants, animals could not survive.
mt: Plants ngahasilkeun oksigén anu dipaké ku manusa, jeung méré karbon dioksida anu dipaké ku manusa (yén dipakékeun). Plants ngahasilkeun panganana tina sinar matahari ku fotosintésis. Plants ogé ngabutuhkeun naon anu dipaké ku manusa. Kita ngahasilkeun rumah tina plants jeung ngahasilkeun baju tina plants. Panganan anu paling loba anu dipaké ku manusa tina plants. Tanpa plants, hirupan hewan ngagantung.
ref: Tutuwuhan ngahasilkeun oksigén anu dihirup ku manusa, sareng manehna nyandak karbon dioksida anu ku manusa kaluarkeun (nyaeta, manusia ngahembuskeun nafasna). Pepelakan ngolah daangeuna jeung bantuan sinar panon poe ngalewatan fotosintesis. Pepelakan oge ngiuhkeun. Urang ngabangun imah jeung ngajait baju tina pepelakan. Hampir kabeh kadaharan nu urang dahar tina pepelakan oge. Mun euweuh pepelakan, sato teu bisa hirup.

src: When a small group of living things (a small population) gets separated from the main population that they came from (like if they move over a mountain range or a river, or if they move to a new island so that they can't easily move back) they will often find themselves in a different environment than they were in before. This new environment has different resources and different competitors, so the new population will need different features or adaptations to be a strong competitor than what they had needed before. The original population hasn't changed at all, they still need the same adaptations as before. Over time, as the new population begins to adapt to their new environment, they start to look less and less like the other population. Eventually, after thousands or even millions of years, the two populations will look so different that they can't be called the same species. We call this process speciation, which just means the formation of new species. Speciation is an unavoidable consequence and a very important part of evolution.
mt: Kadang-kadang, hiji kelompok kecil makluk hidup (kelompok kecil populasi) ngalaman diri tina populasi utama anu asalna (seperti jikalau geus ngalirkeun leuwih luhur gunung atawa sungai, atawa jikalau geus ngalirkeun ka hiji pulo anu teu bisa leuwih lantaran geus ngalirkeun ka hiji pulo anu teu bisa leuwih lantaran geus ngalirkeun ka hiji pulo anu teu bisa leuwih lantaran geus ngalirkeun ka hiji pulo anu teu bisa leuwih lantaran geus ngalirkeun ka hiji pulo anu teu bisa leuwih lantaran geus ngalirkeun ka hiji pulo anu teu bisa leuwih lantaran geus ngalirkeun ka hiji pulo anu teu bisa leuwih lantaran geus ngalirkeun ka hiji pulo anu teu bisa leuwih lantaran geus ngalirkeun ka hiji pulo anu teu bisa leuwih lantaran geus ngalirkeun ka hiji pulo anu teu bisa leuwih lantaran geus ngalirkeun ka hiji pulo anu teu bisa leuwih lantaran geus ngalirkeun ka hiji pulo anu teu bisa leuwih lantaran geus ngalirkeun ka hiji pulo anu teu bisa leuwih lantaran geus ngalirkeun ka hiji pulo anu teu bisa leuwih lantaran geus ngalirkeun ka hiji pulo anu teu bisa leuwih lantaran geus ngalirkeun ka hiji pulo anu teu bisa leuwih lantaran geus ngalirkeun ka hiji pulo anu teu bisa leuwih lantaran geus ngalirkeun ka hiji pulo anu teu bisa leuwih lantaran geus ngalirkeun ka hiji pulo anu teu bisa leuwih lantaran ge
ref: Nalika sakelompok sakedik mahluk hirup (penduduk leutik) kapisahkeun ti populasi utami ti asal aranjeuna (sapertos pindah ka peuntas gunung atanapi walungan, atanapi upami pindah ka hiji pulo anyar supados henteu gampang balik) aranjeunna bakal sering mendakan diri di lingkunganana bénten ti sateuacan. lingkungan enggal ieu ngagaduhan bahan baku anu beda sareng musuh anu beda, janten populasi anu enggal ngabutuhkeun fitur anu beda atanapi nyesuaikeun kanggo janten saingan anu kuat ti batan anu heubeul Populasi aslina moal ngarobah sama sakali, manehna tetep ngabutuhkeun adaptasi anu sarua sapertos samemehna. Sairing waktu, pas populasi nu anyar mulai ngabiasakeun ka lingkungan nu anyar, maranehna mulai katingali bakal terus ngurangan siga populasi nu sejenna. Akhirna, saatos rebuan bahkan jutaan taun, 2 populasi bakal katingali benten pisan janten teu tiasa di sebat spesies anu sami. Ieu proses teh urang sebut spésiasi nu hartosna formasi spesies anyar. Spésiasi mangrupikeun akibat nu teu tiasa dihindari sareng bagian nu paling penting dina évolusi.

src: When a small group of living things (a small population) gets separated from the main population that they came from (like if they move over a mountain range or a river, or if they move to a new island so that they can't easily move back) they will often find themselves in a different environment than they were in before. Eventually, after thousands or even millions of years, the two populations will look so different that they can't be called the same species. We call this process speciation, which just means the formation of new species. Speciation is an unavoidable consequence and a very important part of evolution.

ref: Nalika sakelompok sakedik mahluk hirup (penduduk leutik) kapisahkeun ti populasi utami ti asal aranjeuna (sapertos pindah ka peuntas gunung atanapi walungan, atanapi upami pindah ka hiji pulo anyar supados henteu gampang balik) aranjeunna bakal sering mendakan diri di lingkunganana bénten ti sateuacan. lingkungan enggal ieu ngagaduhan bahan baku anu beda sareng musuh anu beda, janten populasi anu enggal ngabutuhkeun fitur anu beda atanapi nyesuaikeun kanggo janten saingan anu kuat ti batan anu heubeul Populasi aslina moal ngarobah sama sakali, manehna tetep ngabutuhkeun adaptasi anu sarua sapertos samemehna. Sairing waktu, pas populasi nu anyar mulai ngabiasakeun ka lingkungan nu anyar, maranehna mulai katingali bakal terus ngurangan siga populasi nu sejenna. Akhirna, saatos rebuan bahkan jutaan taun, 2 populasi bakal katingali benten pisan janten teu tiasa di sebat spesies anu sami. Ieu proses teh urang sebut spésiasi nu hartosna formasi spesies anyar. Spésiasi mangrupikeun akibat nu teu tiasa dihindari sareng bagian nu paling penting dina évolusi.

src: The major organ of the circulatory system is the heart, which pumps the blood. Blood goes away from the heart in tubes called arteries and comes back to the heart in tubes called veins. The smallest tubes are called capillaries.
mt: Organ utama sistem peredaran getih nyaéta jantung, anu ngagunakeun tekanan pikeun ngaburkeun getih. Getih jalan ka jantung dina pipa anu disebut arteri sareng balik ka jantung dina pipa anu disebut vena. Pipa leutikna disebut kapiler.
ref: Organ utama ti sistem aliran getih nyaéta jantung, anu pompa getih. Getih ngalir ti jantung ngalewatan pembuluh darah anu disebut arteri jeung balik deui ka jantung ngalewatan pembuluh darah anu disebut vena. Pembuluh darah pangleutikna disebut pembuluh kapiler.

src: Insects were the first animals to take to the air. Their ability to fly helped them evade enemies more easily and find food and mates more efficiently. Most insects have the advantage of being able to fold their wings back along the body. This gives them a wider range of small places to hide from predators. Today, the only insects that cannot fold back their wings are dragon flies and mayflies.
mt: Insekta nyaéta hewan nu munggaran anu ngalakonan penerbangan. Kakuatan penerbangan éta tiasa ngahindarkeun musuhna leuwih gampang sareng nyarang pangan sareng pasangan leuwih efisien. Banyak insekta anu miboga kelebihan tiasa ngabungkeun sayapna ka balik ka badana. Ieu tiasa ngahasilkeun jangkauan leuwih luas tempat kecil pikeun ngabungkeun diri tina predator. Hiji-satengah insekta anu tiasa ngabungkeun sayapna ka balik nyaéta dragon fly sareng mayfly.
ref: Serangga nyaéta sato mimiti anu ngapung. Kamampuhan pikeun ngapung ngabantu maranéhna ngajauhkeun musuh  jeung néangan dahareun leuwih gampang, jeung leuwih episien mun ngéwé. Kaseueuran serangga téh ngagaduhan kaunggulan tiasa ngalipkeun jangjangna deui sapanjang awak. Ieu teh masihan maranehanana tempat-tempat kanggo nyumput ti predator. Ayeuna, hiji-hijina serangga anu teu tiasa ngalipetkeun jangjangna téh nyaéta papatong sareng laleur papatong.

src: Many paleontologists today believe that one group of dinosaurs survived and is alive today. We call them birds. Many people don't think about them as dinosaurs because they have feathers and can fly. But there are a lot of things about birds that still look like a dinosaur. They have feet with scales and claws, they lay eggs, and they walk on their two back legs like a T-Rex.
mt: Paleontologis ayeuna ngajelaskeun yen hiji grup dinosaurus tiasa ngahidup jeung masih hirup. Kita ngarujukna salaku burung. Banyak jalma teu ngahaja ngalamanana salaku dinosaurus sababna mibanda bulu sareng tiasa terbang. Tapi aya deui hal-hal ngeunaan burung anu masih ngabogaan kagunaan salaku dinosaurus. Mereke mibanda kaki anu mibanda skala sareng kuku, mereke nyaritkeun telur, sareng mereke ngalakukeun dina dua kaki depanna saperti T-Rex.
ref: Seueur palayan paleontologi jaman ayeuna percaya yen 1 golongan dinosaurus tetep salamat sareng sareng hirup keneh nepi ka ayeuna. Urang nyebatna manuk. Seueur jalma anu henteu nganggapan manuk salaku dinosaurus kusabab gaduh bulu sareng tiasa hiber. nanging aya seueur perkawis ngeunaan manuk anu katembong keneh sepertos dinosaurus. Suku maranéhana boga sisit sarta koét, maranehanana ngendog, sarta maranehna mapan kawan dua suku tukang sapertos T-Rex.

src: A triceratops' teeth would have been able to crush not only leaves but even very tough branches and roots. Some scientists think Triceratops ate cycads, which are a type of plant that was common in the Cretaceous. These plants look like a small palm tree with a crown of sharp, spiky leaves. A Triceratops could have used its strong beak to strip off the leaves before eating the trunk. Other scientists argue that these plants are very poisonous so it is unlikely that any dinosaur ate them, even though today the sloth and other animals like the parrot (a descendant of the dinosaurs) can eat poisonous leaves or fruit.
mt: Gigi Triceratops téh tiasa ngahancurkeun bungbuahan, tapi ogé batang-batang anu kuat. Sababaraha ilmuan ngajak Triceratops makan cycads, anu mangrupa tipe tumbuhan anu umum dina Cretaceous. Tumbuhan éta ngadukung kagunaan pikeun ngahargaan Triceratops. Triceratops bisa ngagunakeun bekeun kuatna pikeun ngagulungkeun daun-daun sebelum makan batang. Sababaraha ilmuan ngajak Triceratops makan cycads, anu mangrupa tipe tumbuhan anu umum dina Cretaceous. Tumbuhan éta ngadukung kagunaan pikeun ngahargaan Triceratops. Triceratops bisa ngagunakeun bekeun kuatna pikeun ngagulungkeun daun-daun sebelum makan batang. Sababaraha ilmuan ngajak Triceratops makan cycads, anu mangrupa tipe tumbuhan anu umum dina Cretaceous. Tumbuhan éta ngadukung kagunaan pikeun ngahargaan Triceratops. Triceratops bisa ngagunakeun bekeun kuatna pikeun ngagulungkeun daun-daun sebelum makan batang. Sababaraha ilmuan ngajak Triceratops makan cycads, anu mangrupa tipe tumbuhan anu umum dina Cretaceous. Tumbuhan éta ngadukung kagunaan pikeun ngahargaan Triceratops. Triceratops bisa ngagunakeun bekeun kuatna pikeun ngagulungkeun daun-daun sebelum makan batang. Sababaraha ilmuan ngajak Triceratops makan cycads, anu mangrupa tipe tumbuhan anu umum dina Cretaceous. Tumbuhan éta ngadukung kagunaan pikeun ngahargaan Triceratops. Triceratops bisa ngagunakeun bekeun kuatna pikeun ngagulung
ref: Huntu triceratops lain tiasa ngahancurkeun dangdaunan hungkul tapi akar anu teuas oge tiasa. Sababaraha élmuwan nganggap Triceratops ngadahar siklik, anu mangrupikeun jenis pépélakan anu umum di jaman Cretaceous. Tatawuhan ieu katingali siga tangkal palem leutik nu boga mahkota daun nu runcing jeung seukeut. Triceratops bisa maké cucukna anu kuat keur nyoekeun daun-daun saacan ngadahar batangna. Elmuwan sanesna nyebatkeun yen pepelakan ieu teh bahaya sahingga teu mungkin pikeun tuangeunana dinosaurus, sanaos ayeuna kungkang sareng sato sanes sapertos parili (turunan dinosaurus) tiasa tuang daun anu bahaya atanapi buah.

src: Italy's national football, along with German national football team is the second most successful team in the world and were the FIFA World Cup champions in 2006. Popular sports include football, basketball, volleyball, water-polo, fencing, rugby, cycling, ice hockey, roller hockey and F1 motor racing. Winter sports are most popular in the Northern regions, with Italians competing in international games and Olympic events.
mt: Tim nasional sepak bola Italia, bareng jeung tim nasional sepak bola Jerman, nyaéta tim nasional sepak bola panghasilna di dunya, jeung jadi juara Piala Dunia FIFA 2006. Olahraga populer di Italia nyaéta sepak bola, basket, voli, polo air, pedang, rugby, sikling, hoki es, hoki roling, jeung balap F1. Olahraga dingin paling populer di daérah utara, jeung Italia ngalakukeun kompetisi internasional jeung acara Olimpiade.
ref: Timnas méngbal Itali, sareng timnas méngbalJerman téh dua timnas anu paling sukses di dunya jeung mangrupikeun juara Piala Dunia FIFA di taun 2006. Olahraga anu terkenal nyaéta méngbal, basket, bola voli, polo cai, anggar, rugbi, balap sapeda, hoki es, hoki roller, sareng balap mobil F1. Olahraga usum tiis mangrupikeun anu pang kasohorna di daérah kalér, sareng Italia ngilu dina pertandingan internasional jeung acara Olimpiade.

src: Luxembourg has a long history but its independence dates from 1839. Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution. Luxembourg has always tried to remain a neutral country but it was occupied in both World War I and World War II by Germany. In 1957 Luxembourg became a founding member of the organization which is today known as the European Union.
mt: Prusisi Luxembourg mibanda sejarah anu panjang tapi kemerdekaan éta mimiti ti 1839. Bagian-bagian ti Belgia ayeuna jadi bagian ti Luxembourg dina masa lampau tapi jadi bagian ti Belgia sanggeus Révolusi Belgia 1830-an. Luxembourg geus mibanda sejarah anu panjang tapi kemerdekaan éta mimiti ti 1839. Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution. Luxembourg has always tried to remain a neutral country but it was occupied in both World War I and World War II by Germany. In 1957 Luxembourg became a founding member of the organization which is today known as the European Union.
ref: Luxembourg gaduh sajarah panjang tapi tanggal kamerdekaan na ti 1839. Bagian Bélgia ayeuna mangrupikeun bagian ti Luksemburg di jaman baheula, tapi janten Bélgia saenggeus Révolusi Bélgia taun 1830. Luksemburg parantos teterusan nyobian janten nagara anu teu mihak ka sasaha nanging tetep dijajah dina Perang Dunya I sareng Perang Dunya II ku Jérman. Di 1957, Luxembourg janten anggota anu mendakan organisasi anu ayeuna mah dikenalna Uni Éropa.

src: European Turkey (eastern Thrace or Rumelia in the Balkan peninsula) includes 3% of the country. The territory of Turkey is more than 1,600 kilometres (1,000 mi) long and 800 km (500 mi) wide, with a roughly rectangular shape. Turkey's area, including lakes, occupies 783,562 square kilometres (300,948 sq mi), of which 755,688 square kilometres (291,773 sq mi) are in south west Asia and 23,764 square kilometres (9,174 sq mi) in Europe. Turkey's area makes it the world's 37th-largest country, and is about the size of Metropolitan France and the United Kingdom combined. Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.
mt: Turki Eropa (Thrace Timur atawa Rumelia di Balkan) ngandung 3% ti nagara. Wilayah Turki leuwih ti 1,600 km (1,000 mi) panjang sareng 800 km (500 mi) lebar, jeung bentukna kira-kira segi empat. Wilayah Turki, anu ngandung danu, ngandung 783,562 km² (300,948 sq mi), di antarana 755,688 km² (291,773 sq mi) di Asia kidul barat sareng 23,764 km² (9,174 sq mi) di Eropa. Wilayah Turki ngandung 37 nagara panggedéna di dunya, jeung ukurana kira-kira ukuran Metropolitan Perancis sareng Inggris ngahubungan.
ref: Turki Eropa (bagian Wétan Thrace atanapi Rumelia di Balkan Peninsula) téh 3% ti sakabéh nagara. Wilayah Turki leuwih ti 1,600 kilométer (1,000 mil) panjangna sareng 800 km (500 mil) lébarna, anu bentukna kirang langkung segi opat. Daerah di Turki, situ teh nyandak 783,562 kilometer pasagi (300,948 mil pasagi) dimana eta teh 755,688 kilometer pasagi (291,773 mil pasagi) aya di bagean kidul kulon Asia jeung  23,764 kilometer pasagi (9,174 mil pasagi) di bagean Eropa. Turki ngajadikeun nagarana paling gedé anu ka-37 di dunya, sareng ukuranna satara Metropolitan Perancis sareng gabungan Inggris. Turki dikurilingan ku laut tina tilu sisi: Laut Aegea di kulon, Laut Hideung di kalér jeung Laut Mediterania di kidul.

ref: Turki Eropa (bagian Wétan Thrace atanapi Rumelia di Balkan Peninsula) téh 3% ti sakabéh nagara. Wilayah Turki leuwih ti 1,600 kilométer (1,000 mil) panjangna sareng 800 km (500 mil) lébarna, anu bentukna kirang langkung segi opat. Daerah di Turki, situ teh nyandak 783,562 kilometer pasagi (300,948 mil pasagi) dimana eta teh 755,688 kilometer pasagi (291,773 mil pasagi) aya di bagean kidul kulon Asia jeung  23,764 kilometer pasagi (9,174 mil pasagi) di bagean Eropa. Turki ngajadikeun nagarana paling gedé anu ka-37 di dunya, sareng ukuranna satara Metropolitan Perancis sareng gabungan Inggris. Turki dikurilingan ku laut tina tilu sisi: Laut Aegea di kulon, Laut Hideung di kalér jeung Laut Mediterania di kidul.

src: Vatican City's population is around 800. It is the smallest independent country in the world and the country with the lowest population. Vatican City uses Italian in its legislation and official communications. Italian is also the everyday language used by most of those who work in the state while Latin is often used in religious ceremonies. All citizens of Vatican City are Roman Catholic.
mt: Vatikan ngadunungan 800 jalma. Ieu mangrupa nagara nu paling leutik jeung nu paling ngurang jalma di dunya. Vatikan ngagunakeun basa Italia dina peraturan sareng komunikasi resmi. Basa Italia ogé mangrupa basa harian anu dipaké ku lalaki anu bekerja di nagara ieu, sarta basa Latin sering dipaké dina upacara agama. Semua warga Vatikan katutuhan Katolik Roma.
ref: Populasi Vatican City nyaeta kira-kira 800 nyawa. Vatican nagara merdeka pangleutikna di dunya jeung nagara jeung populasi paling saeutik. Kota Vatikan ngagunakeun basa italia dina panerapan jeung komunikasi resmi. Basa Italia ogé mangrupikan basa sapopoé anu dianggo ku seueur jalmi nu damel di nagara eta sedengkeun Latin mah seringna dianggo keur upacara agama. Sadaya warga Kota Vatican nyaéta panganut Katolik Roma.

src: Computers today are used to manipulate pictures and videos. Sophisticated animations can be constructed on computers, and this kind of animation is increasingly being used in television and films. Music is often recorded using sophisticated computers to process and mix sounds together.
mt: Komputer kiwari dipaké pikeun ngarangkeun gambar sareng vidéo. Animasi anu rumit bisa dipikirkeun di komputer, sareng ieu tipe animasi anu dipaké pikeun ngarangkeun televisi sareng film. Musik biasana dicatet pikeun diprosés sareng diadukkeun di komputer anu rumit.
ref: Komputer ayeuna dipaké kanggo ngamalsukeun gambar sareng pidéo. Animasi anu canggih tiasa didamel dina komputer, sareng animasi samodél kieu langkung seueur dianggo di tipi sareng pilem. Musik sering dirékam nganggo komputer canggih pikeun ngolah sareng nyampurkeun soanten babarengan.

src: The cities of Harappa and Mohenjo-daro had a flush toilet in almost every house, attached to a sophisticated sewage system. Remains of sewage systems have been found in the houses of the Minoan cities of Crete and Santorini in Greece. There were also toilets in ancient Egypt, Persia and China. In Roman civilization, toilets were sometimes part of public bath houses where men and women were together in mixed company.
mt: Kota Harappa sareng Mohenjo-daro aya saluran air bersih di saban rumah, anu disambungkeun kana sistem saluran air bersih anu rumit. Sisa-sisa sistem saluran air bersih geus katempo di rumah-rumah kota Minoan di pulo Crete sareng Santorini di Yunani. Aya ogé saluran air bersih di peradaban Mesir, Persia sareng Cina. Di peradaban Romawi, saluran air bersih kadang-kadang bagian tina bath house publik anu kadang-kadang urang lalaki sareng perempuan berduaan.
ref: Kota Harappa sareng Mohenjo-daro gaduh toilet siram di ampir unggal bumi, anu disambungkeun kana sistem pembuangan limbah anu canggih. Sésa sistem limbah parantos kapeundak di pamudukan di kota Minoa di Crete sareng Santorini di Yunani. Toilet kapendak di peradaban Mesir kuno, Persia jeung Cina. Di Peradaban Romawi, toilet sakapeung ngarupakeun bagéan ti pamandian umum di mana lalaki jeung awéwé ditempatkeun ditempat anu sarua.

src: The blade on a modern ice skate has a double edge with a concave hollow between them. The two edges allow for a better grasp of the ice, even when tilted. Because the bottom of the blade is slightly curved, as the blade tilts to one side or the other, the edge which is in contact with the ice also curves. This causes the skater to turn. If the skates tilt to the right, the skater turns right, if the skates tilt to the left, the skater turns left.
mt: Gigi pikeun skat es modérn ngahasilkeun dua sisi anu ngandung hulu koncava antara dua sisi éta. Dua sisi éta tiasa ngahasilkeun kakuatan pikeun ngahasilkeun kontak jeung es, bahkan nalika tilting. Karena bagian bawah gigi ngahasilkeun hulu koncava, nalika gigi tilting ka sisi kiwa atawa kénca, sisi anu kontak jeung es ogé ngahasilkeun hulu koncava. Ieu nyebabkeun skater ngahasilkeun putaran. Jika skat tilting ka kiwa, skater putaran ka kiwa, jika skat tilting ka kénca, skater putaran ka kénca.
ref: Bilah dina sapatu skét és gaduh dua ujung anu sami-sami cekung. dua ujung éta téh tiasa leuwih saé dina nahan és, bahkan lamun keur dimiringkeun ogé. Kusabab bagéan handap bilahna rada béngkok, pas bilah doyong ka hiji sisi atawa sisi nu séjénna, tungtungna anu paadek sareng és ogé béngkok. Ieu nyieun pamaén skét és pikeun méngkol. Lamun skét miring ka tuhu, skét méngkol ka tuhu, lamun miring ka kénca, skét méngkol ka kénca.

src: "To return to their previous energy level, they must get rid of the extra energy they got from the light. They do this by emitting a tiny particle of light called a ""photon"". Scientists call this process ""stimulated emission of radiation"" because the atoms are stimulated by the bright light, causing the emission of a photon of light, and light is a type of radiation. The next picture shows the atoms emitting photons. Of course, in reality photons are a lot smaller than those in the picture. Photons are even smaller than the stuff that makes up atoms!"
mt: "Pikeun balik ka tingkat énergi anu saméméhna, munggaran méré énergi anu leuwih luhur tina cahaya. Mereke ngahasilkeun partikel cahaya anu leutik anu disebut ""photon"". Ilmuan ngarujuk prosés éta minangka ""stimulated emission of radiation"" sabab atom-atom éta disimulas ku cahaya anu bener, nu ngabalukarkeun émisi partikel cahaya, sareng cahaya téh hiji tipe radiasi. Gambar anu kungsi ditampilkeun ngajelaskeun atom-atom anu ngahasilkeun photon. Tentu, dina kenyataan, photon téh leuwih leutik ti bahan anu ngahasilkeun atom!"
ref: "Pikeun ngabalikeun level energi kanu saacana, maranéhna kudu miceun kaleuwihan energi anu ditambahan ku cahaya. Atom-atom éta ngalakukeun ieu ku mancarkeun partikel cahya alit pisan anu disebat ""foton"". loba elmuan nyebut ieu proses teh ""stimulus emisi tina radiasi"" kusabab si atom teh ka pancing ku lampu anu caang, nyebabkeun emisi photon tina cahaya jeung cahaya teh salah sahiji na radiasi. Gambar saatos ieu némbongkeun bahwa atom mancarkeun foton. Dina kanyataana foton langkung alit tibatan éta dina gambar. Foton malah langkung alit tibatan anu ngabentuk atom!"

src: After hundreds of hours of operation the filament in the bulb eventually burns out and the light bulb no longer works. The light bulb then needs replacing. It is necessary to be careful in replacing the light bulb. First, the switch for the light fixture needs to be turned off or the cable disconnected. This is because electricity flowing into the socket where the metallic part of bulb sits can give you a severe electric shock if you touch the inside of the socket or the metal base of the bulb while it is still partly in the socket.
mt: Sanggeus ratusan jam operasi, filamen di dalam bola lampu ngahabang jeung bola lampu teu bisa bekerja. Bola lampu teuas ngalaman ganti. Aya nu perlu dipikirkeun dina ngaganti bola lampu. Sanggeus, sakabéh kabel perlu diputuskeun. Ieu nyaéta sabab kana listrik anu ngalir ka soket di mana bagian logamna bola lampu ngalir bisa ngabakar kana listrik anu ngalir bisa ngabakar kana listrik anu ngalir bisa ngabakar kana listrik anu ngalir bisa ngabakar kana listrik anu ngalir bisa ngabakar kana listrik anu ngalir bisa ngabakar kana listrik anu ngalir bisa ngabakar kana listrik anu ngalir bisa ngabakar kana listrik anu ngalir bisa ngabakar kana listrik anu ngalir bisa ngabakar kana listrik anu ngalir bisa ngabakar kana listrik anu ngalir bisa ngabakar kana listrik anu ngalir bisa ngabakar kana listrik anu ngalir bisa ngabakar kana listrik anu ngalir bisa ngabakar kana listrik anu ngalir bisa ngabakar kana listrik anu ngalir bisa ngabakar kana listrik anu ngalir bisa ngabakar kana listrik anu ngalir bisa ngabakar kana listrik anu ngalir bisa ngabakar kana listrik anu ngalir bisa ngabakar kana listrik anu ngalir bisa ngabakar kana listrik anu ngalir bisa ngabakar kana listrik anu ngalir bisa ngabakar kana listrik anu ngalir bisa ngabakar kana listrik anu ngalir bisa ngabakar kana listrik anu ngalir bisa ngabakar kana listrik anu ngalir bisa ngabakar kana listrik anu ngalir bisa ngabakar
ref: Saatos ratusan jam hurung, éta filamén dina bohlam tungtungna kaduruk sareng bohlam henteu deui berfungsi. Lampuna teras kedah diganti. Penting kedah ati-ati lamun ngaganti lampu. Kahiji, sakelar lampu kudu dipaehan atawa kabel kudu dilepas. ieu teh kusabab listrik na ngalir kana soket anu dina eta soket teh aya bahan metal nu aya dina lampu bohlam nu matak bisa nyetrum anjeun lamun nyabak eta jero soket atawa dasar bohlam nalika dijero soket keneh.

src: The fission bomb works on the principle that it takes energy to put together a nucleus with many protons and neutrons. Sort of like rolling a heavy cart up a hill. Splitting the nucleus up again then releases some of that energy. Some atoms have unstable nuclei which means that they tend to break apart with little or no nudging.
mt: Senjata fisi nu ngagunakeun prinsip anu teu bisa dipisahkeun, pikeun ngahasilkeun inti nu banyakan proton sareng neutron. Kaya deui ngarolkeun beurat kandaraan ka jalan. Ngepisan inti éta deui ngelepaskeun sababaraha énergi. Sababaraha atom ngandung inti nu teu stabil anu ngandung yén éta teu bisa dipisahkeun ku ngebutan atawa ngarolkeun.
ref: Bom fisi tiasa dianggo dumasar kana prinsip yén butuh énergi pikeun nyatukeun inti anu seueur proton sareng neutron. Sapertos nyurungkeun hiji karanjang beurat ka luhur bukit. Ngamisahkeun intina deui teras ngaluarkeun sababaraha énergi éta. Sababaraha atom ngabogaan inti anu henteu stabil anu hartina yen maranehanana gaduh kacondongan beulah kalawan sakedik atanapi tanpa dorongan.

src: When you call someone who is thousands of miles away, you are using a satellite. The satellite in space gets the call and then reflects it back down, almost instantly. The satellite was sent into space by a rocket. Scientists use telescopes in space because the Earth’s atmosphere distorts some of our light and view. It takes a giant rocket over a 100 feet high to put a satellite or telescope in space.
mt: Kadang-kadang kalian ngalaporkeun seseorang anu jauh ti kalian, kalian ngagunakeun satelit. Satelit anu aya di luar angkasa ngalaporkeun panggilan kalian sareng ngabalikkeunna ka bumi, anu ngahaja. Satelit éta di luar angkasa dihaturan ku roket. Ilmuan ngagunakeun teleskop di luar angkasa sabab atmosfer bumi ngabalikkeun sababaraha cahayana sareng pemandangan. ref: Lamun anjeun ngahubungi jalma nu jauh pisan, anjeun teh nganggo satelit. Satelit anu di luar angkasa teh narima telepon tuluy malikeun deui eta telepon kahandap gancang pisan. Satelit éta dikirim ka luar angkasa ku rokét. Élmuwan nganggo téléskop di ruang angkasa kusabab atmosfir Bumi ngarobih sabagian cahya sareng pandangan urang. Butuh rokét raksasa langkung tina 100 kaki pikeun disimpen dina satelit atanapi teleskop di luar angkasa.

Butuh rokét raksasa langkung tina 100 kaki pikeun disimpen dina satelit atanapi teleskop di luar angkasa.

src: Time is something that is all around us, and affects everything we do, yet is difficult to understand. Time has been studied by religious, philosophical, and scientific scholars for thousands of years. We experience time as a series of events passing from the future through the present to the past. Time is also how we compare the duration (length) of events. You can mark the passing of time yourself by observing the repetition of a cyclical event. A cyclical event is something that happens again and again regularly.
mt: Waktu nyaéta hal anu ngalir di sabudeureunana, jeung ngarandapan sababaraha hal anu kana, tapi teu gampang dipikirkeun. Waktu geus dipelajari ku para sarjana agama, filosofis, sareng ilmiah pikeun sababaraha ribu taun. Kita ngalaman waktu minangka séri tina hal-hal anu leuwih deukeut ka waktu anu geus leupas. Waktu ogé kana cara kita ngabandingkeun durasi (panjangna) tina hal-hal. Kita bisa ngabédakeun waktu ku ngamirkeun ulangna tina sababaraha hal anu ngalir sababaraha kali.
ref: Waktos mangrupikeun hal anu aya di sakuriling urang sadayana, sareng mangaruhan sagala anu urang pigawé, nanging sesah kanggo dipahaman. Waktos parantos diulik ku pamimpin agama, filsuf, jeung ilmuwan salami rébuan taun. Urang ngalaman waktos salaku rangkean kajadian anu tiheula ti masa kahareup ngalewatan jaman ayeuna dugi ka jaman baheula. Waktos ogé mangrupikeun cara urang ngabandingkeun durasi (lilana) kajadian. Anjeun tiasa nyirian waktu sorangan ku nitetan pengulangan kajadian siklus. Kajadian siklus nyaeta hiji hal anu lumangsung berulang-deui sacara teratur.

src: Traditionally, the heir to the throne would go straight into the military after finishing school. However, Charles went to university at Trinity College, Cambridge where he studied Anthropology and Archaeology, and later History, earning a 2:2 (a lower second class degree). Charles was the first member of the British Royal Family to be awarded a degree.
mt: Tradisionalna, penerus tahta bakal langsung ka taktik pas purna sekolah. Anu geus Charles ngalakukeun ka universitas Trinity College, Cambridge anu ngalajari Antropologi sareng Arkeologi, sareng naha sejarah, nyerang 2:2 (na kelas dua kelas dua). Charles nyaéta anggota British Royal Family anu munggaran dipidangkeun gelar.
ref: Sacara tradisional, panerus tahta bakal langsung asup kana militér saatos lulus sakola. Nanging, Charles kuliah di Trinity College di Universitas Cambridge. Manéhna diajar Antropologi jeung Arkéologi, tur Sajarah, jeung meunangkeun predikat 2:2 (gelar kelas kadua handap). Charles mangrupikeun anggota kahiji ti kulawarga British Royal anu ngagaduhan gelar.

src: England had experienced a long period of peace after the reconquest of the Danelaw. However in 991 Ethelred was faced with a Viking fleet larger than any since Guthrum's a century earlier. This fleet was led by Olaf Trygvasson, a Norwegian with ambitions to reclaim his country from Danish domination. After initial military setbacks, Ethelred was able to agree to terms with Olaf, who returned to Norway to try to gain his kingdom with mixed success.
mt: Inggris geus ngalaman jang panjangna damai tina rékonkués Danelaw. Aya deui dina 991 Ethelred dipaksa ku armada Viking nu leuwih gedé ti anu geus dipakéna dina abad ka-10 ku Guthrum. Armada éta dipimpin ku Olaf Trygvasson, Norwegia nu geus ngarasa pikeun ngabébaskeun nagarana ti dominasi Denmark. Sanggeus kagagalan militér, Ethelred tiasa ngabéakana persetujuan jeung Olaf, anu ngabalik ka Norwegia pikeun nyoba pikeun ngabébaskeun nagarana jeung hasil campur tibah.
ref: Inggris téh parantos ngalaman perdamaian anu panjang saatos naklukeun deui Danelaw. Tapi dina taun 991 Ethelred berhadapan sareng armada Viking anu langkung ageung tibatan armada Guthrum sa abad ka pengker. Armada ieu dipimpin ku Olaf Trygvasson, warga nagara Norwégia anu boga ambisi nyandak balik nagarana tina jajahan Dénmark. Saeunggeus mundur militer, Ethelred akhirna satuju kanggo damai jeung Olaf anu akhirna balik deui ka Norwegia kanggo ngabangun karajaanna jeung rupa-rupa kasuksesan.

src: "Around the 15th century, northern Estonia was under great cultural influence of Germany. Some German monks wanted to bring God closer to the native people, so they invented the Estonian literal language. It was based on the German alphabet and one character ""Õ/õ"" was added. As time passed, many words that were borrowed from German coalesced. This was the beginning of enlightenment."
mt: “Dina abad ka-15, Estonia wétan jadi kawih budaya Jerman. Bejeha biar para biarawati Jerman ngabawa Tuhan deukeut ka urang asli, méréh ngagambarkeun basa literal Estonia. Ieu basa ngagunakeun abjad Jerman sareng karakter “Õ/õ” ditambahkeun. Sababaraha katoan anu dipinjami tina Jerman ngagabung. Ieu mangrupa awal pencerahan.”
ref: "Sakira abad ka-15, Estonia kaler aya di handap pangaruh budaya Jerman. Sababaraha biksu Jérman hoyong nyaketkeun pribumi jeung Gusti, janten aranjeunna mendakan bahasa literal Éstonia. Éta téh dumasar karna huruf German sareng 1 karakter ""Õ/õ"" ditambihkeun. Sakumaha waktos lumaku, seueur kecap anu diinjeum tina basa Jérman digabungkeun. Ieu mangrupikeun awal pancerahan."

src: There are varying estimates for how many people speak Hindi. It is estimated to be between the second and fourth most commonly spoken language in the world. The number of native speakers varies depending on whether or not very closely related dialects are counted. Estimates range from 340 million to 500 million speakers, and as many as 800 million people can understand the language. Hindi and Urdu are similar in vocabulary but different in script; in everyday conversations, speakers of both languages can usually understand each other.
mt: Estimasi jumlah orang anu ngomong Hindi boga variasi. Hindi téh katelah antara basa anu paling dipaké ka-2 jeung ka-4 di dunya. Jumlah penutur asli boga variasi, terasana ti 340 juta ka 500 juta penutur, jeung bisa ngomong 800 juta orang anu bisa ngaharapkeun basa éta.
ref: Aya babaraha hiji perkiraan tina sababaraha jalmi anu nyarios basa India. Basa India diperkirakeun basa kadua nepi ka opat anu pangseueurna dianggo di dunya. Jumlah panyatur pribumi bervariasi gumantung kana dialek anu erat patalianana diitung atawa henteu. Diperkirakeun antara 340 juta dugi 500 juta panyatur jeung sakitar 800 juta jalma tiasa ngartos basa éta. Basa India sareng Urdu gaduh kamiripan dina kosakatana, tapi béda dina tulisanana; dina paguneman sapopoé, panyatur kadua basa biasana tiasa silih ngartos.

src: "Hangeul is the only purposely invented alphabet in popular daily use. The alphabet was invented in 1444 during the reign of King Sejong (1418 – 1450). King Sejong was the fourth king of the Joseon Dynasty and is one of the most highly regarded. He originally named the Hangeul alphabet Hunmin Jeongeum, which means ""the correct sounds for the instruction of the people""."
mt: "Hangeul nyaéta satua aksen anu disusun pikeun dipaké ku masyarakat. Aksen éta disusun dina taun 1444 nalika jaman raja Sejong (1418 – 1450). Raja Sejong nyaéta raja kaopat ti Dinasti Joseon sareng satua anu dipikanyaho paling dipikahargikeun. Raja Sejong asalna ngaranna Hangeul Hunmin Jeongeum, anu hartina ""suara nu bener pikeun ngajak masyarakat""."
ref: "Hangeul teh hiji-hiji na alfabet anu ngahaja diciptakeun dina huruf anu biasa dipake sapopoe, Alfabet teh diciptakeun dina taun 1444 nalika Raja Sejong  (1418 – 1450) jumeneng. Raja Séjong mangrupikeun raja ka opat ti DInasti Joeseon sareng mangrupikeun 1 raja ti raja-raja anu paling terhormat. Anjeunna aslina nganamian aksara Hangeul Hunmin Jeongeum, nu artina ""sora nu leres kanggo ngarahkeun jalmi""."

src: There are many theories to how Sanskrit came into existence. One of them is about an Aryan migration from the west into India who brought their language with them. Sanskrit is an ancient language and is comparable to the Latin language spoken in Europe. The earliest known book in the world was written in Sanskrit. After the compilation of Upanishads, Sanskrit just faded due to hierarchy. Sanskrit is a very complex and rich language, which has served to be the source for many modern Indian languages, just like Latin is the source for European languages like French and Spanish.
mt: Salah sahiji teori ngeunaan asal-usul Sanskerta. Salah sahijina ngeunaan hiji migrasi Aryan ti wétan ka India anu ngabawa basana éta. Sanskerta nyaéta basa kuna sareng bisa dihubungkeun jeung basa Latin anu dipaké di Éropa. Buku pangalaman di dunya nyaéta tulisna dina basa Sanskerta. Sanggeus kumpulan Upanishad, Sanskerta teu dipaké deui sabab hierarki. Sanskerta nyaéta basa anu rumit sareng kaya basa anu kaya Latin, anu jadi sumber pikeun banyakan basa-basa India modern, saperti basa Latin jadi sumber pikeun basa-basa Éropa saperti basa Prancis sareng basa Spanyol.
ref: Loba teori perkara kumaha basa sansakerta muncul. salah sahijina nyaeta ngeunaan  Aryan anu migrasi ti kulon india anu mawa basa anjeunna. Basa Sansakerta nyaeta basa kuno sareng tiasa dibandingkeun sareng basa Latin anu  diucapkeun di Eropa. Buku anu pangmimitina nu dikenal di dunya ditulis dina bahasa Sanskerta. saatos pangumpulan Upanishads, bahasa Sanskerta ujug-ujug punah kusabab hirarki. Basa Sansekerta nyaéta basa anu rumit pisan jeung loba rupina. Basa ieu geus janten sumber loba basa India moderen, sapertos basa Latin nu janten sumber basa-basa Éropa sapertos Prancis sareng Spanyol.

src: How would Io's gravity pull on me? If you stood on the surface of Io, you would weigh less than you do on Earth. A person who weighs 200 pounds (90kg) on Earth would weigh about 36 pounds (16kg) on Io. So the gravity, of course, pulls less on you.
mt: Kabéh tiasa ngarungu? Jika kalian berdiri di permukaan Io, kalian akan berat kurang dari kalian di Bumi. Seseorang yang berat 200 pound (90kg) di Bumi akan berat sekitar 36 pound (16kg) di Io. Jadi, gravitasi, tentu saja, menarik kurang pada kalian.
ref: Kumaha gravitasi Io bakal narik kuring? Upami anjeun nangtung dina permukaanna Io, beurat anjeun bakal kirang ti pas anjeun aya di Bumi. Jalma anu beuratna 200 pon (90kg) di Bumi beuratna sakitar 36 pon (16kg) di Io. Janten gravitasi, tangtosna, kirang narik anjeun.

src: The surface of the Moon is made of rocks and dust. The outer layer of the Moon is called the crust. The crust is about 70 km thick on the near side and 100 km thick on the far side. It is thinner under the maria and thicker under the highlands. There may be more maria on the near side because the crust is thinner. It was easier for lava to rise up to the surface.
mt: Wajah Bulan tina batu sareng abu. Lapisan luar Bulan disebut kulit. Kulitna 70 km tebal di sisi dekat sareng 100 km tebal di sisi jauh. Kulitna leuwih tipis di bawah maria sareng leuwih tebal di bawah dataran tinggi. Aya mungkin leuwih maria di sisi dekat sabab kulitna leuwih tipis. Lava tiasa leuwih mudah na jang muncul ka permukaan.
ref: Beungeut bulan di wangun ku babatuan jeung debu. Lapis pangluarna Bulan disebutna kulit. Kandel kerakna kira-kira 70 km di sisi caket sarta kandel 100 km di sisi tebih. eta leuwih ipis di sisi anu poek sareng langkung kandel di sisi anu caang Manawi aya langkung seueur maria di sisi caket margi kusabab leuwih ipis. Éta langkung gampil kanggo lava naik ka permukaan.

src: "Many people dream of the day when humans can travel to another star and explore other worlds, some people wonder what's out there some belive that aliens or other life may live on another plant. But, if this ever does happen probably won't happen for a very long time. The stars are so spread out that there are trillions of miles between stars that are ""neighbors"". Maybe one day, your great grandchildren will be standing atop an alien world wondering about their ancient ancestors?"
mt: "Banyan urang ngadamel mimpi pikeun poé nu manéhna bisa ngalamanan manusa bisa ngalamanan planét lain sareng ngalamanan jagat lain. ref: "Seueur jalma ngimpikeun poé dimana manusa tiasa ngarambat ka bintang anu sanés sareng ngajalajah alam sanés, sababaraha urang héran naon nu aya di luar ditu sareng aya sababaraha anu percaya yén mahluk luar angkasa atanapi kahirupan sanés hirup dina tutuwuhan anu sanés. Mungkin hiji waktos, cucu buyut aranjeun bakal nangtung di luhur dunya anu asing teras tatanya tentang leluhur kuno aranjeunna?"

src: "The Sun doesn't have a crust like the Earth that you can stand on. The whole Sun is made out of gases, fire, and plasma. The gas becomes thinner as you go farther from the center of the Sun. The outer-part we see when we look at the Sun is called the photosphere, which means ""ball of light""."
mt: ""Matahari teu miboga kulit saperti Bumi anu tiasa dipikiran. Matahari kabéh tina gas, api, sareng plasma. Gasna jadi leutik jeung leutik ku kituna anu jauh ti pusatna. Bagian luar anu tiasa katingali nalika kitu ngamot matahari disebut fotosfera, anu hartina ""bola cahaya""."
ref: "Panon poé heunteu boga kerak tempat nincak sapertos Bumi. Panon poé dijieun tina gas, seuneu, jeung plasma sakabéhna. Gasna langkung janten ipis nalika anjeun ngalih ti tengah panonpoé. Bagian pangluarna anu ku urang tingali pas ningal panon poe disebut potosfer, anu hartina ""bola cahaya""."

src: About three thousand years later, in 1610, Italian astronomer Galileo Galilei used a telescope to observe that Venus has phases, just as the moon does. Phases happen because only the side of Venus (or of the Moon) facing the Sun is lighted. The phases of Venus supported the theory of Copernicus that the planets go around the Sun. Then, a few years later in 1639, an English astronomer named Jeremiah Horrocks observed a transit of Venus.
mt: Kira tiga ribu taun sabalikna, dina 1610, astronom Italia Galileo Galilei ngagunakeun teleskop pikeun ngamotkeun yen Venus mibanda fase, saperti bulan. Fase éta tiasa ngabenerkeun teori Copernicus anu planét ngalakonan orbit kana Surya. Sabalikna, sababaraha taun sabalikna dina 1639, astronom Inggris Jeremiah Horrocks ngamotkeun transit Venus.
ref: sakitar tilu rébu taun saatosna, di taun 1610, ahli astronom Italia Galileo Galilei nganggo téléskop pikeun nyimpulkeun yén Venus oge aya pase na, sapertos bulan. Fase teh aya kumargi ngan hiji bagean planet venus (atawa bulan) nu ngahareupan panon poe kacaangan. Fase planet venus ngadukung teori ti Copernicus nyaeta planet-planet teh ngulilingan panon poe. Teras, babaraha taun saatosna di taun 1639, ahli astronomi Inggris anu namina Jeremiah Horrocks niténan transit di Venus.

src: The Amazon River is the second longest and the biggest river on Earth. It carries more than 8 times as much water as the second biggest river. The Amazon is also the widest river on Earth, at times six miles wide. A full 20 percent of the water that pours out of the planet's rivers into the oceans comes from the Amazon. The main Amazon River is 6,387 km (3,980 miles). It collects water from thousands of smaller rivers.
mt: Amazon River nyaéta dua pangpanjang sareng pangluhurna di Bumi. Éta ngarungkeun leuwih ti 8 kali tina panjangna dua pangluhurna. Amazon ogé nyaéta leuwih lebar tibatan dua pangluhurna, ngahadang 6 mil. Sajumlah 20 persén tina air nu ngalir ti cai-caina di bumi ka laut berasal ti Amazon. Cai Amazon utama nyaéta 6,387 km (3,980 mil). Éta ngumpulkeun cai ti ribuan cai-caina leutik.
ref: Walungan Amazon mangrupikeun walungan kadua pangpanjangna sareng anu panggedéna di dunya. Boga cai leuwih ti 8 kali leuwih cai tibatan walungan kadua anu panggedéna. Amazon walungan panglegana di Bumi, kalayan lebar 6 mil. 20 persen cai anu nyebar di walungan-walungan nu aya di dunya teras ka laut téh asalna ti Amazon. Walungan utamina Amazon ngabogaan paos 6,387 km (3,980 mil). Walungan éta nampung cai ti rébuan anak walungan.

src: Eighteen percent of Venezuelans are unemployed, and most of those who are employed work in the informal economy. Two thirds of Venezuelans who work do so in the service sector, nearly a quarter work in industry and a fifth work in agriculture. An important industry for Venezuelans is oil, where the country is a net exporter, even though only one percent work in the oil industry.
mt: 18 persén warga Venezuela teu beunghar, jeung loba ti anu beunghar beunghar di ekonomi informal. Dua per tiga warga Venezuela beunghar di sektor pelayanan, nepi ka 25 persén beunghar di industri sareng 20 persén beunghar di sektor pertanian. Industri penting pikeun warga Venezuela nyaéta minyak, di mana negara éta jadi net eksportir, walaupun ngan 1 persén beunghar di industri minyak.
ref: Dina sakumna nu aya di Venezuela, 18% jalma teu didamel, jeung kaseueuran jalma anu gaduh damel didamel dina ekonomi informal. Dua per tilu penduduk Venezuela daramel di bidang jasa, ampir saparapatna damel di bidang industri sareung saperlimana di bidang katanian. Industri anu penting kanggo wargi Venezuela nyaéta minyak, dimana nagarana janten pangékspor bersih, sanaos ngan hiji persén anu damel dina industri minyak.

src: Stars give off light and heat because of the energy made when hydrogen atoms are merged (or fused) together to form heavier elements. Scientists are working to create a reactor that can make energy in the same way. This, however, is a very hard problem to solve and will take many years before we see useful fusion reactors built.
mt: Star ngahasilkeun cahaya sareng panas sabab tina énergi anu dihasilkeun nalika atom hidrogén dihimpun (atau difusi) pikeun ngahasilkeun unsur anu leuwih beurat. Para ilmuan bekerja pikeun ngahasilkeun reaktor anu tiasa ngahasilkeun énergi dina cara éta. Ieu, tapi, mangrupa masalah anu teu bisa diselesaikan jeung teu bisa dipikirkeun pikeun dipeunasan jeung bakal ngahasilkeun reaktor fusi anu boga manfaat.
ref: Bentang mancarkeun cahaya sareng panas kusabab énergi anu dihasilkeun nalika atom hidrogen ngagabung (atanapi ngahiji) babarengan pikeun ngabentuk elemen anu leuwih beurat. Para élmuwan nuju didamel kanggo midamel réaktor anu tiasa ngahasilkeun energi ku cara anu sami. Nanging, ieu, mangrupikeun masalah anu sesah pisan kanggo di réngsékeun bakal mangtaun-taun saacan urang ningali reaktor fusi anu gunana di wangun.

src: Elements and compounds can move from one state to another and not change. Nitrogen as a gas still has the same properties as liquid nitrogen. The liquid state is denser but the molecules are still the same. Water is another example. The compound water is made up of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom. It has the same molecular structure whether it is a gas, liquid, or solid. Although its physical state may change, its chemical state remains the same.
mt: Élémén jeung campuran tiasa pindah ti hiji wujud ka wujud séjén jeung teu ngalaman perubahan. Nitrogen minangka gas masih ngangetkeun sifatna minangka nitrogen cair. Wujud cairna leuwih padet tapi molekulna masih sarua. Air jadi conto séjénna. Campuran air téh terbentuk tina dua atom hidrogén jeung hiji atom oksigén. Aya struktur molekul sarua ngeunaan wujud gas, cair, jeung padet. Walaupun wujud fisikna bisa berubah, wujud kimianya masih sarua.
ref: Unsur jeung sanyawa tiasa di robah ti 1 wujud ka wujud nu lain tapi tetep sarua. Nitrogén minangka gas ngabogaan kénéh sipat anu sami kalawan nitrogén éncér. Nitrogén anu éncér langkung mundel nanging molekulna sami kénéh. Conto lainna nyaéta cai. Senyawa cai téh kabentuk tina dua atom hidrogén sareng hiji atom oksigén. Ieu gaduh struktur molékul nu sami anu tiasa waé ieu téh antara gas, cairan, atanapi padet. Sanajan kaayaan fisik na tiasa robah, kaayaan kimia na mah bakal tetep.

src: During the Revolutionary War, the thirteen states first formed a weak central government—with the Congress being its only component—under the Articles of Confederation. Congress lacked any power to impose taxes, and, because there was no national executive or judiciary, it relied on state authorities, who were often uncooperative, to enforce all its acts. It also had no authority to override tax laws and tariffs between states. The Articles required unanimous consent from all the states before they could be amended and states took the central government so lightly that their representatives were often absent.
mt: Salila Perang Revolusioner, tiga belas negara munggaran ngahasilkeun pamaréntahan pusat anu lemah—sanggeusna Kongrés jadi komponénna—naon jadi ngahubungkeun dina Pasal-pasal Konfédérasi. Kongrés teu miboga hak pikeun ngarobah pajak, jeung, sabab teu aya pamaréntahan eksekutif atawa yudikatif, teu ngarandapan kana pamongahan ti pamongahan negara, anu teu kaweruh, pikeun ngahubungkeun kabéh tindakanna. Ieu ogé teu miboga hak pikeun ngarandapan hukum pajak jeung tarif antar negara. Pasal-pasal konfédérasi ngaharapkeun konsensus silih tunggung ti kabéh negara pikeun diubah jeung negara-negara ngaharapkeun pamaréntahan pusat saéngsar, nu miboga wakil-wakilna teu aya.
ref: Nalika Perang Revolusi, tilu welas nagara bagian ngawangun pamarentahan pusat munggaran anu lemah -kalayan Kongres mangrupikeun hiji-hijina komponen-dina Artikel Konfederasi. Kongres henteu ngagaduhan kakuatan pikeun maksa pajak, sareng kusabab henteu aya eksekutip nasional atanapi yudikatif, eta gumantung ka otoritas nagara, anu sering henteu kooperatif, pikeun maksakeun sagala tindakanana. Eta ogé teu boga kakuasaan keur kaluar ti aturan pajak jeung biaya antar nagara bagian. Pasal-pasal éta meryogikeun panyatujuan anu mutlak ti sakumna nagara bagian saacan tiasa digentos teras nagara bagian osok nganggap énteng pamaréntah pusat janten wawakilna sering teu hadir.

src: "If you have watched the movie National Treasure, you may think a treasure map was written on the back of the Declaration of Independence. However, that is not true. Although there is something written on the back of the document, it is not a treasure map. Written on the back of the Declaration of Independence were the words ""Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776"". The text appears on the bottom of the document, upside down. While no one knows for certain who wrote it, it is known that early in its life, the large parchment document (it measures 29¾ inches by 24½ inches) was rolled up for storage. So, it is likely that the notation was added simply as a label."
mt: "Jika kalian pernah nonton film National Treasure, kalian mungkin berpikir peta petualangan ditulis di belakang Deklarasi Kemerdekaan. Namun, itu tidak benar. Meskipun ada sesuatu yang ditulis di belakang deklarasi kemerdekaan, itu bukan peta petualangan. Ditulis di belakang deklarasi kemerdekaan adalah kata-kata ""Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776"". Tulisan muncul di bawah dokumen, terbalik. Sementara tidak ada yang tahu dengan pasti siapa yang menulisnya, diketahui bahwa dokumen besar (ukurannya 29¾ inci oleh 24½ inci) awalnya dilipat untuk penyimpanan. Jadi, kemungkinan besar label itu ditambahkan hanya sebagai label."
ref: "Upami anjeun parantos nonton pilem National Treasure, anjeun panginten bakal mikir yén aya peta harta karun dina tukangeun Deklarasi Kamerdékaan. Nangning, eta henteu leres. Sanaos aya serat dina bagean tukang dokumen, eta sanes peta harta. Dina bagean tukang Deklarasi Kamerdekaan  aya tulisan ""Deklarasi Kamerdekaan Asli tanggal 4 Juli 1776"". Teks nembongan dina handapeun dokumen, tibalik. Sanaos teu aya 1 oge anu terang tangtos saha anu nyerat na, dipikanyaho yen dina mimiti kahirupanana, dokumen perkamen ageung (ukuranana 29¾ inci kali 24½ inci) atos digulung kanggo ditunda. Jadi, sigana notasi éta téh ditambihkeun ngan salaku labél hungkul."

src: Early in the nation's independence, Singapore Botanic Gardens' expertise helped to transform the island into a tropical Garden City. In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, an orchid hybrid, was chosen as the nation's national flower.
mt: Awalna dina kamerdékaan negara, Singapura Botanic Gardens' ahli bantuan pikeun ngabalikkeun pulo jadi hiji kota tropis. Dina taun 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, hiji hybrid orchid, dipilih jadi bunga nasional.
ref: Dina mimiti kamerdékaan negara na, ahli Kebon Botani Singapura tos ngabantu ngarubah pulo nepi ka dayeuh kebon tropis. Dina taun 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, anggrek hibrida, dipilih salaku kembang nasional nagara.
