src: Although pyramid-building in stone continued until the end of the Old Kingdom, the pyramids of Giza were never surpassed in their size and the technical excellence of their construction. New Kingdom ancient Egyptians marvelled at their predecessors monuments, which were then well over a thousand year old.
mt: Walaupun ngalakukeun pembangunan piramida tina batu ngahaja nepi ka akhir Kerajaan Lama, piramida Giza teu pernah dipasangkeun dina ukuranna sareng kualitas teknisna dina konstruksina. Bangsa Mesir Kuno Kerajaan Baru ngagumapakeun jeung pamandanganana, anu teuas leuwih ti hiji ribu taun.
ref: Sanaos pangwangunan piramida di luhur batu diteraskeun dugi ka akhir Karajaan Lami, piramida Giza henteu pernah tiasa ngaleuwihan ukuran sareng kaunggulan téknis dina pangwangunanana. Karajaan anyar urang Mesir kuno takjub kana monumén paninggalan karuhunna, anu umurna langkung ti sarebu taun.

src: Every year around October nearly 1.5 million herbivores travel towards the southern plains, crossing the Mara River, from the northern hills for the rains. And then back to the north through the west, once again crossing the Mara river, after the rains in around April. The Serengeti region contains the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and Maswa Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.

src: Every year around October nearly 1.5 million herbivores travel towards the southern plains, crossing the Mara River, from the northern hills for the rains. And then back to the north through the west, once again crossing the Mara river, after the rains in around April. The Serengeti region contains the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and Maswa Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.

src: With the battle for France over, Germany began to get ready to invade the island of Britain. Germany code-named the attack “Operation Sealion”. Most of the British Army's heavy weapons and supplies had been lost when it evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was fairly weak. But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (“Kriegsmarine”) and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent across the English Channel. However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack.
mt: Pas kalahna Perancis, Jérman mulai nyiapkeun invasi ka pulo Inggris. Jérman ngarandam operasi éta “Operation Sealion”. Béda ti Angkatan Darat Inggris anu keur ngalaman kalahna, Angkatan Laut Inggris masih leuwih kuat ti Angkatan Laut Jérman (“Kriegsmarine”) sareng tiasa ngejeg invasi kuat ti Jérman. Nanging, béda ti Angkatan Laut Inggris anu ngahaja ngabutuhkeun kapal di jalur invasi, para jendral Angkatan Laut ngan ngabutuhkeun kapal di jalur invasi, para jendral Angkatan Laut ngan ngabutuhkeun kapal di jalur invasi, para jendral Angkatan Laut ngan ngabutuhkeun kapal di jalur invasi, para jendral Angkatan Laut ngan ngabutuhkeun kapal di jalur invasi, para jendral Angkatan Laut ngan ngabutuhkeun kapal di jalur invasi, para jendral Angkatan Laut ngan ngabutuhkeun kapal di jalur invasi, para jendral Angkatan Laut ngan ngabutuhkeun kapal di jalur invasi, para jendral Angkatan Laut ngan ngabutuhkeun kapal di jalur invasi, para jendral Angkatan Laut ngan ngabutuhkeun kapal di jalur invasi, para jendral Angkatan Laut ngan ngabutuhkeun kapal di jalur invasi, para jendral Angkatan Laut ngan ngabutuhkeun kapal di jalur invasi, para jendral Angkatan Laut ngan ngabutuhkeun kapal di jalur invasi, para jendral Angkatan Laut ngan ngabutuhkeun kapal di jalur invasi, para jendral Angkatan Laut ngan ngabutuhkeun kapal di jalur invasi, para jendral Angkatan Laut ngan ngabutuhkeun
ref: "Saatos pertempuran sareng Prancis réngsé, Jérman teras siap-siap pikeun nyerang pulo Inggris. Jérman nganamian kode serangan éta ""Operasi Singa Laut"". Seuseueurna pakarang beurat sareng bebekelan Angkatan Darat Inggris leungit pas diungsikeun ti Dunkrik, jadi pasukanna keur rada lemah. Tapi Angkatan Laut Kerajaan masih kénéh leuwih kuat tibatan Angkatan Laut Jerman (“Kriegsmarine”) sareng tiasa waé ngancurkeun armada invasi naon wae anu dikirim lewat Selat Inggris. Nanging, ngan sakedik pisan Angkatan Laut Karajaan anu pangkalanna caket rute pertempuran kusabab para laksamana sieun dititeuleumkeun ku serangan kapal udara Jérman."

src: "Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the ""little brother"" of Germany and Japan. It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war. Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa. For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else. Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain."
mt: "Mimiti jeung penjelasan ngeunaan rencana Italia. Italia biasa jadi ""adik kecil"" ti Jepang sareng Jérman. Tapi, Italia miboga tentara sareng laut nu leutik, tapi, Italia geus ngebangkeun opat kapal anyar segera sebelum perang dimulai. Italia tujuan utamana nyaéta nagara-nagara Afrika. Pikeun ngahabisi nagara-nagara éta, Italia kudu ngahabisi pangkalan Britania sareng kapal di Mesir. Selain aksi-aksi éta, Italia kapal perang henteu kudu ngalakukeun hal séjén. Sekarang pikeun Jepang. Jepang nyaéta nagara pulau, saperti Britania."
ref: "Hayu urang mimitian sareng penjelasan rencana Italia. Itali utamana ""adi"" ti Jérman sareng Jepang. Eta gaduh pasukan anu langkung lemah sarta angkatan laut anu langkung lemah, sanaos maranehanana cik keneh ngawangun opat kapal anyar pas sateuacan mimiti perang. Tujuan Itali anu utama nyaéta nagara-nagara Afrika. Pikeun nalukkeun nagara-nagara ieu, aranjeunna kedah ngagaduhan tapak peluncuran pasukan supados pasukan tiasa ngaliwat Laut Tengah sareng nyerang Afrika. Pikeun éta, aranjeunna kedah nyingkirkeun markas sareng kapal Inggris di Mesir. Salain tindakan éta, kapal perang Itali henteu kudu ngalakukeun anu lain. Ayeuna Jepang. Jepang nyaeta nagara pulau, sami sapertos Inggris."

src: "The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free. It was ruled by the ""Vichy"" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them. On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called ""Operation Dragoon"". In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany."
mt: "Pendaratan D-Day jeung perang nu tiasa ngahabéan bebaskeun wewengkon lor Perancis, tapi wewengkon kidul masih teu bebas. Ieu wewengkon kidul dipimpin ku Vichy Perancis. Ieu nyaéta warga Perancis anu ngabuat damai jeung Jerman dina taun 1940 jeung bekerja bareng jeung invader alih-alih ngalawan. Pada 15 Agustus 1940, Sekutu nginvasi Perancis kidul, invasi éta disebut ""Operasi Dragoon"". Dina dua peuting, Amérika jeung pasukan Perancis bebas ngahabéan Perancis kidul jeung ngarah ka Jerman."
ref: "Pendaratan D-Day jeung pertempuran nu lain téh berhasil ngabebaskeun Prancis bagéan kalér, tapi bagéan kidul na mah acan. Diparéntah ku Perancis ""Vichy"". Aranjeunna mangrupikeun jalma Perancis anu parantos damai jeung Jerman dina 1940 sareng damel bareng penjajah tinimbang tarung aranjeunna. Di kaping 15 Agustus 1940, Sekutu narajang Perancis kidul, serangan éta disebat ""Operasi Dragoon"". Dina ngan dua minggu urang Amérika sareng pasukan Pembebasan Perancis ngabebaskeun Perancis kidul teras aranjeunna wangsul ka Jérman."

src: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.
mt: Submarine nyaéta kapal anu dirancang pikeun ngalaju di bawah laut, sareng bisa ngalaman di bawah laut pikeun waktu lama. Submarine dipaké dina Perang Dunia I sareng Perang Dunia II. Dina waktu éta, submarine teu bisa ngalaju leuwih cepat sareng jangkungna ngalakonan tugas teu bisa leuwih jauh. Dina awal perang, submarine biasa ngalaju di bawah laut, tapi sabab radar mulai ngalaman pikeun ngabeneran sareng akurat, submarine teu bisa ngalaju di bawah laut pikeun ngalindungkeun diri tina ditangkep. Submarine Jerman disebut U-Boat. Jerman teu bisa ngalakonan navigasi sareng operasi submarine éta. Sabab jadikeun éta, sabada perang Jerman teu bisa dipercaya pikeun ngalakonan submarine.
ref: Kapal selam nyaéta kapal anu didamel pikeun ngalalana di jero cai, sareng tetep cicing di jero cai sababaraha waktu. Kapal selam dianggo di jaman Perang Dunia kahiji sareng Perang Dunia kadua. kapungkur, kapal sela laun pisan sareng jarak nembak na anu terbatas. Dina awal perang, aranjeunna seuseueurna ngumbara di luhur laut, tapi nalika radar mulai berkembang sareng janten langkung akurat kapal selam kapaksa lebet kana cai supados teu katingali. Kapal selam Jérman disebat U-Boats. Jérman pinter pisan dina ngarahkeun sarta ngoperasikeun kapal selamna. Kusabab kasuksésanna nganggo kapal selam, saenggeus perang urang Jerman henteu dipercaya keur seueur gaduh nukitu.

src: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.
mt: Saméméh bulan Séptémber 17, 1939, pertahanan Polandia geus robah, jeung harita harita saeutik aya harapan pikeun nyurung jeung reorganisasi di jembatan Romania. Anu geus ngaganggu rencana éta, nalika leuwih ti 800.000 tentara ti Uni Soviet Red Army masuk jeung ngadegkeun front Belarussia sareng Ukraina sanggeus nginvasi wilayah timur Polandia ngalangkang Perjanjian Riga, Perjanjian Non-Agresi Soviet-Polandia, jeung perjanjian internasional séjénna, bilateral sareng multilateral.
ref: Kaping 17 Séptémber 1939, pertahanan Polandia geus ancur. Hiji-hijina harepan nyaéta mundur sareng ngatur deui pertahanan di sasak Roman. Nanging, rencana ieu janten luntur sapeupeuting, nalika leuwih ti 800.000 prajurit ti Prajurit Beureum Uni Sovièt asup jeung nyiptakeun barisan Bélarus sareng Ukraina saatos nyerang Polandia bagian wétan anu ngalanggar Perjangjian Damai Riga, Pakta Non-Agregasi Soviét-Polandia sareng perjangjian internasional anu sanésna, bilateral sareng multilateral.

src: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.
mt: Kabar anu teu ngahasilkeun pikeun Italia di Afrika Kalér ti awalna. Dina hiji minggu ti perang Italia ngadéklarasi ka 10 Juni, 1940, pasukan 11th Hussars Britania ngagébogkeun Fort Capuzzo di Libya. Dina ambang di timur Bardia, pasukan Britania ngagébogkeun Kepala Insinyur Tenth Army Italia, Jenderal Lastucci. Dina 28 Juni, Marsal Italo Balbo, Gubernur Jenderal Libya sareng penerus anu mungkin ti Mussolini, dipaténi ku tembakan sahabatna waktu nyampe di Tobruk.
ref: Perkara henteu saé kanggo urang Italia di Afrika Kalér ti mimiti ogé. Dina waktu saminggu saeunggeus Italia nyatakeun perang kaping 10 Juni 1940, pihak 11 Hussars Inggris parantos nguasai Bénténg Capuzzo di Libya. Dina serangan wétan Bardia, Inggris nangkap Kapala Angkatan Darat Italia, Jeneral Lastucci. Dina 28 Juni, Marsekal Italo Balbo, Gubernur Jendral Libya sareng ahli warisna Mussolini, tiwas ku témbakan babaturan sorangan nalika mendarat di Tobruk.

src: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.
mt: Agama Buddha Tibet nyaéta ngagantung kana ajaran Buddha, tapi diéntah ku jalan mahayana kasih sareng ku banyakan téhnik ti Yoga India. Dina prinsipna, agama Buddha Tibet téh teu rumet. Ieu téh téh Kundalini Yoga, meditasi sareng jalan kasih nu ngabungkeun. Dina Kundalini Yoga, énérji Kundalini (énergi pahormatan) diéntah ku posisi yoga, latihan nafas, mantra sareng visualisasi. Pusat meditasi Tibet téh Deity Yoga. Dina visualisasi deiti-deiti anu béda, jalur énergi di bersihkeun, cakra diaktifkeun sareng énérji pahormatan diwujudkeun.
ref: Buddhist Tibét dumasar kana ajaran agama Buddha, tapi ditambihan ku jalan cinta Mahayana sareng ku seueur téhnik ti Yoga India. Dina prinsipna, aliran Buddha Tibet téh sederhana pisan. Éta isina Kundalini Yoga, tapa, sareng jalan cinta anu ngarangkul sadayana. Jeung Kundalini Yoga, energi Kundalini (energi pencerahan) dijieun ngalangkungan gerakan yoga, latihan nafas, mantra jeung visualisasi. Pusat tapa Tibét nyaéta Yoga Dewa. Ngaliwatan visualisasi rupa-rupa déwa, saluran énérgi diberesihan, cakra diaktipkeun sareng kasadaran pencerahan diciptakeun.

src: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.
mt: Programna dimimitian dina tabuh 8:30 enjing waktu lokal (15.00 UTC). Sajarah penyanyi di seluruh negara nyanyi bhajans, atawa lagu devotional, ka kaki Shri Shyam. Singer Sanju Sharma dimimitian malam, diikuti ku Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Lakkha Singh ngajadikeun nyanyi bhajans. 108 plate Chhappan Bhog (dina Hinduisme, 56 bahan makanan anu bisa dimakan, kayaning, makanan manis, buah-buahan, kacang-kacangan, masakan etc. anu disajikeun ka dewa) disajikeun ka Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh nyanyi chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.
ref: Program ieu dimulai tabuh 8:30 wengi waktu sakitar (15.00 UTC) Penyanyi kakoncara ti sakumna nagara nawiskeun bhajans, atanapi lagu pamujaan, dina sukuna Shri Shyam. Panyanyi Sanju Sharma nu muka acara sonten éta, diteraskeun ku Jai Shankar Choudhary. Midangkan chhappan bhog bhajan ogé. Panyanyi, Raju Khandelwal ogé ngabaturan anjeunna. Teras, Lakkha Singh nu mimpin nyanyi bhajans. 108 piring Chhappan Bhog (dina kaparcayaan Hindu, 56 kadaharan nu beda-beda sapertos kue, buah, kacang-kacangan, piring jeung lainna anu nawarkeun pola daang) disajikeun kanggo Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh oge nampilkeun chhappan bhog bhajan. Panyanyi, Raju Khandelwal oge ngabarengan manehna.

src: "The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show ""Troy""."
mt: “Pesta dimimitian ku tampilan khusus ti grup dunia terkenal Cirque du Soleil. Ieu diikuti ku Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, band Janissary, sareng penyanyi Fatih Erkoç sareng Müslüm Gürses. Sanggeusna, Whirling Dervishes tampil. Diva Turki Sezen Aksu tampil bareng tenor Italia Alessandro Safina sareng penyanyi Yunani Haris Alexiou. Pesta diakhiri ku tampilan grup tari Turki Fire of Anatolia tampilan pesta “Troy”.”
ref: "Parayaan ieu dimimitian ku pagelaran khusus ku grup terkenal sadunya Cirque du Soleil. Teras disusul ku Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, hiji band Janissary, sareng panyanyi Fatih Erkoç sareng Müslüm Gürses. Teras Whirling Dervishes naék ka panggung. Diva Turki, Sezen Aksu, maju nyanyi jeung penyanyi ténor Italia, Alessandro Safina, jeung penyanyi Yunani, Haris Alexiou. Dina panutupanna, grup tari Turki Seuneu tina Anatolia nampilkeun penampilan ""Troy""."

src: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""
mt: "Penumpang dipakékeun air minum salian teuas 90(F)-derajat. Kapten pemadam api Scott Kouns ngomong, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""
ref: "Panumpang dipasihan cai bari nungguan dina suhu 90 darajat (F). Kaptén petugas pemadam kebakaran Scott Kouns nyarios, ""Dinten éta teh dinten anu panas di Santa Clara sareng suhuna ogé 90an. di sabaraha lila wwaktos urang kajebak di roller coaster tangtu teu ngeunah, kanggo saeutikna, sarta peryogi sahenteuna sa jam kanggo hiji jelema mereskeun puteran."

src: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.
mt: Jonny Reid, co-driver pikeun tim A1GP Selandia Anyar, hari ieu ngalakukeun sejarah ku ngamot mobil paling luhur di jembatan Auckland Harbour Bridge, Selandia Anyar, legal. Mr Reid ngamot mobil Selandia Anyar A1GP, Black Beauty di kacepatan 160km/h sapuluh kali di jembatan éta. Polisi Selandia Anyar ngalakukeun ngabaca radar kecepatan pikeun ngamot kacepatan Mr Reid tapi teu bisa ku lantaran Black Beauty ngan ngan ngan, jeung waktu polisi ngabaca Mr Reid nyaéta kacepatan 160km/h.
ref: Jonny Reid, pendamping sopir tim A1GP New Zealand, dinten ieu nyiptakeun sajarah nalika nyupiran panggancangna di Jambatan Palabuan Auckland anu kolotna 48 taun, Selandia Baru, sacara sah. Mr. Reid junun numpakan mobil A1gp Selandia Anyar, Black Beauty kalawan kecepatan langkung ti 160 km/jam tujuh kali ngaléwatan jembatan. Pulisi Selandia Anyar kasulitan ngagunakeun radar kacepetan pikeun ningali kacepetan pak Reid nyetir sabab mobil Black Beauty-na rendah pisan, jeung hiji-hijina waktos pulisi tiasa ngukur kacepetan pak Reid nyaéta pas anjeunna ngalambatkeun ka 160km/jam.

src: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.
mt: Gempa bumi moderat ngagoyang Montana barat dina tabuh 10:08 enjing dina Senen. Tiasa teu aya laporan segeran kana kerusakan anu dikirimkeun ku Survei Geologi Amerika Serikat (USGS) sareng Pusat Informasi Gempa Bumi Nasional. Gempa bumi éta pusatna 20 km (15 mil) kalér-kalér ti Dillon, sareng 65 km (40 mil) kidul ti Butte.
ref: Gempa sedeng ngoyagkeun wilayah Montana kulon tabuh 10:08 peuting dinten senén. Teu aya laporan karusakan langsung nu ditarima Amerika Serikat Geological Survey (USGS) sareng Pusat Informasi Gempa Nasionalna. Lini eta asalna ti 20 km (15 mil) palebah kaler - kaler wetan Dillon, jeung sakitar 65 km (40 mil) kidul Butte.

src: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

src: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.
mt: Band éta ngabatalkeun konser di Stadium War Memorial Maui, anu bakal dihadirkeun ku 9.000 jalma, sareng maafkeun ka para fans. Perusahaan manajemen band, HK Management Inc., teu ngabéakna alasan awalna nalika ngabatalkeun tanggal 20 Séptémber, tapi ngabéakna alasan logistik nalika tanggal 21.
ref: band ngabatalkeun acara di Maui's War Memorial Stadium, anu sakirana bakal didatangan ku 9,000 jelema, sareng menta hampura ka penggemar na Perusahaan manajemen band, HK Managament Inc., teu masihan terang naha ngabatalkeun pas kaping 20 Séptémber, tapi nyalahkeun alesan logistik isukanna.

src: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."
mt: "Looting nu leuwih jembar ngalaman ngalaman malam harieun, sabab ti law enforcement officers teu aya di jalan-jalan Bishkek. Bishkek digambarkeun salaku ngalaman "anarki" ku hiji panjelasan, sabab gang-gang jalma ngalaman jalan sareng ngabébaskeun toko-toko konsumen. Beberapa warga Bishkek ngarasa hiji gang-gang jalma ti kidul anu ngalaman hirupan."
ref: "Dilaporkeun penjarahan eta teh makin ngaluas jeung berlanjut tadi wengi, kusabab teu aya hiji pun aparat di jalan Bishkek. Bishkek digambarkeun titeuleum ka kaayaan ""anarki"" ku salah sahiji pengamat, nalika gerombolan turun ka jalan teras ngajarah toko-toko nu jual barang-barang nu tiasa dikonsumsi. Sabagian wargi Bishkek nyalahkeun pendemo ti kidul kusabab ngalanggar hukum."

src: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.
mt: Sejénna, CEO Ring, Jamie Siminoff, nyarios yén perusahaan éta mulai ti waktu éta, tina waktu éta, pintu gerbangna teu bisa didengar ti toko di garagenya. src: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."
mt: "Seri PBS ngalaman leuwih ti dua-dua puluh Emmy, jeung jangkahan runna leuwih pendek ti Sesame Street sareng Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Dina saban episode seri éta, ngabahas tema dina buku anu husus sareng ngalirkeun tema éta dina saban kisah. Saban episode ogé ngabogaan rekomendasi buku anu anak-anak tiasa ngalirkeun nalika ngalaman ka perpustakaan. John Grant, ti WNED Buffalo (stasiun rumah Reading Rainbow) ngomong ""Reading Rainbow ngajak anak-anak pikeun ngabogaan alasan pikeun ngarang,... kasenangan ngarang — [seri éta] ngajak anak-anak pikeun ngarang buku."" Dina pandangan beurat, kaasup John Grant, pikeun pamegat jeung perubahan filosofi program televisi pendidikan ngabalukarkeun seri éta pungkas.
ref: "Acara PBS ngagaduhan langkung ti dua belasan panghargaan Emmy, sareng pagelaranna langkung pondok ti Sesame Street sareng Mister Rogers 'Neighborhood. Unggal épisode acara éta bakal ngapokuskeun kana téma dina buku tertentu sareng teras ngajalajah tema jadi sababaraha carita. Setiap acara ogé bakal nyadiakeun rékoméndasi buku keur budak nu kudu dipilari lamun datang ka perpustakaan. John Grant, ti WNED Buffalo (stasiun induk Reading Rainbow), nyarios ""Reading Rainbow ngajarkeun murangkalih naha kedah maca,... resep maca - [acara ieu] ngadorong murangkalih pikeun nyandak buku sareng maca."" Sababaraha urang percanten, katut John Grant, yén krisis dana sareng peralihan filosofi pendidikan program tipi nyumbang pikeun ngaréngsékeun séri ieu."

src: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

ref: Pajabat kota Amsterdam sareng Musium Anne Frank nyatakeun yén tangkal éta katepaan ku jamur sareng nimbulkeun bahaya kasehatan masyarakat sabab pikir tangkal éta dina bahaya murag. éta parantos di jadwalkeun di tuar dinten Salasa, tapi disimpen saatos kaputusan pangadilan darurat.

src: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""
mt: "Animal Liberation jeung Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) deui ngajalanan pikeun pangaruh mandatirna kamera CCTV di sababaraha abattoir di Australia. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy ngabéakkeun ABC yen pangaweruh sareng inspeksi abattoir tiasa jadi hal biasa di Australia. ref: "Kelompok Pembebasan Satwa sareng Masyarakat Kerajaan keur Pencegahan Kekejaman terhadap Sato (RSPCA) nyarios deui bahwa wajib masang kaméra CCTV di kabéh tempat jagal di Australia. src: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.
mt: Berita ngababar di komunitas Red Lake hari ini saprak upacara pemakaman Jeff Weise sareng tiga ti satus korban dipikirkeun diadakan anu lainna mah salah sahiji murid ditangkep dina hubungan jeung penembakan di sekolah tanggal 21 Maret. Otoritas ngabéwarakeun dina resmi anu teu jelas tiap-tiap tiapna mah anu ngabéwarakeun hari ieu mah tangkepan. Aya sumber anu ngahaja ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwarakeun anu ngabéwar
ref: Berita di Red Lake ngabewarakeun yen dina dinten ieu, pas pamakaman kanggo Jeff Weise sareng tilu tina salapan korban nuju lumangsung, aya murid sejen anu ditewak polisi lantaran manehna berhubungan sareng kasus penembakan di sakola tanggal 21 Maret. Aparat teu seueur saur sacara resmi salian ti mastikeun prosés néwak dinten ieu. Nanging, narasumber anu apal penyelidikan éta masihan terang  ka Minneapolis Star-Tribune yén éta téh si Louis Jourdain, murangkalihna Kepala Suku Red Lake Tribal Floyd Jourdain anu umurna 16 taun. Teu apal ayeunamah tuduhan naon anu bakal dituduhkeun téh atanapi anu ngarahkeun aparat ka budak éta tapi prosés pendakwaan budak parantos dimulai di pengadilan pusat.

src: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.
mt: Organisator tina protes ngalaporkeun 100.000 jalma tibatan di kota-kota Jérman saperti Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, sareng Hanover. Di Berlin, polisi ngéstimasi 6.500 jalma protes. Protés ogé tibatan di Paris, Sofia di Bulgaria, Vilnius di Lithuania, Valetta di Malta, Tallinn di Estonia, sareng Edinburgh sareng Glasgow di Skotlandia. Di London, 200 jalma protes di luar kantor-kantor pihak hak cipta nu penting. Bulan lalaki, aya protes gedé di Polandia nalika negara éta ngagabungkeun ACTA, nu ngabalukarkeun pamaréntah Polandia ngabéakna pikeun ratifikasi, pikeun saiki. Latvia sareng Slovakia ogé ngabéakna prosés pikeun gabungkeun ACTA.
ref: Nu ngayakeun démo nyatakeun yén kira-kira 100,000 jalmi wedal di dayeuh-dayeuh di Jerman, contona Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, sareng Hanover. Di Berlin pulisi perkirakeun aya 6,500 demonstran. Protes oge kajadian di Paris, di Sofia, Bulgaria, di Vilnius, Lithuania, di Valette, Malta, di Tallin, Estonia, jeung di Edinburg oge Glasgow di Skotlandia. Di London, kira-kira 200 urang ngalakukeun protes diluar kantor pemegang hak cipta. Sasih tiheula, kajadian protes gede di Polandia keur nagara eta nandatanganan ACTA. Iyeu nyebabkeun pamarentah Polandia mutuskeun kanggo nunda ratifikasi. Latvia sareng Slovakia duanana nunda prosés gabung ACTA.

src: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""
mt: “Sekitar 60 kasus iPod anu ngalaman gangguan panasna ngahitamkeun, ngabalukarkeun 6 kebakaran sareng 4 urang ngalaman luka-luka. Kementrian Ekonomi, Perdagangan sareng Industri Jepang (METI) ngabéwarakeun yen aya 27 kejadian anu patali jeung perangkat éta. Minggu lalu, METI ngabéwarakeun yen Apple ngabéwarakeun 34 kasus ngahitamkeun anu lain serius. Kementrian ngabéwarakeun yen pangunduran waktu Apple ngabéwarakeun kasus éta “sangat menyesal”.
ref: "Sakitar 60 kasus iPods anu kapanasan sareng teu hurung dilaporkeun, nyebabkeun total genep kaduruk teras nyebabkeun opat jalmi beunang luka kaduruk anu leutik. Menteri Ekonomi, Perdagangan, jeung Industry Jepang (METI) nyarios bahwa nyadar kana 27 insiden nu patali jeung parangkat eta. Minggon kamari, METI ngumumkeun Apple tos ngainpokeun tambahan insiden panas leleuwih, anu perusahaan nyebutkeunna ""teu serius"". Kementrian nanggepanna ku nyebutkeun penundaan laporan Apple téh ""bener-bener disesalkeun""."

src: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his 2 hour speech he stated that ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today""."
mt: Steve Jobs CEO Apple ngababarkeun alat éta ku ngalakukeun panggung sareng ngabéntang iPhone tina jinsa éta. Dina 2 jam ngalakukeunna éta, Steve nyaritakeun ""Hari ieu Apple tiasa ngarubah telepon, Kita tiasa ngarubah sejarah hari ieu"".
ref: "CEO Apple Steve Jobs ngawanohkeun ieu perangkat sabari mapah naék kana panggung teras ngaluarkeun iPhone tina saku calana jins na. Dina 2 jam pidatona, anjeunna nyatakeun yén ""Ayeuna Apple badé nyiptakeun HP deui, urang bakal nyétak sajarah dinten ieu."""

src: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
mt: Senator jeung Ibu Negara Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner ngabéntangan kandidat presidenna dina malam hari di La Plata, kota 50 kilometer (31 mil) tina Buenos Aires. Ibu Kirchner ngabéntangan niatna pikeun jadi presiden di Teater Argentina, tempatna dia ngabéntangan kandidatna pikeun Senat dina 2005 minangka anggota delegasi Buenos Aires.
ref: Senator ayeuna sarta Ibu Nagara Argéntina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner ngumumkeun pencalonana minangka présidén kamari wengi di La Plata, hiji dayeuh 50 kilométer (31 mil) ti Buenos Aires. Ny. Kirchner ngumumkeun niatna pikeun nyalonkeun janten présidén di Téater Argéntina, lokasi anu sami pas anjeunna ngamimitian kampanye Sénat taun 2005 salaku anggota délégasi propinsi Buénos Airés.

src: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.
mt: ACMA ogé ngabuktikeun yen walaupun video éta dipancarkeun di internet, Big Brother teu ngalanggar hukum pencegahan konten online, sabab media teu disimpan di situs Big Brother. Ulahan Layanan Siaran nyadiakeun regulasi pikeun konten internet, tapi pikeun dianggap konten internet, éta teu bisa disimpan di server.
ref: ACMA ogé mendakan bahwa sanajan pideo na diputer di Internet, Big Brother henteu ngalanggar hukum sénsor kontén daring sabab pideo na henteu disimpen dina halaman web Big Brother. UU penyiaran nyayogikeun régulasi pikeun konten internét, nanging anu disebat kontén internét téh nyaéta data anu sacara fisik aya dina sérver.

src: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."
mt: Peter Costello, kaséhatan jeung manéh anu paling mungkin pikeun ngagantikeun John Howard minangka pamimpin Liberal partéy ngabéntangan industri nuklir di Australia. Mr Costello ngomong yen nuklir pikeun pambangunan tenaga bisa jadi ekonomis, Australia tiasa ngalakukeunna. ""Jika jadi komérsil, kito tiasa ngalakukeunna. Ieu, aya teu ngan paham anu ngabéntangan nuklir pikeun pambangunan tenaga"" Mr Costello ngomong.
ref: "Peter Costello, bendahara na Australia jeung jelema anu paling mungkin ngagantikeun Perdana Menteri John Howard salaku pingpinan partai liberal, geus mere dukungan ka industri listrik tanaga nuklir di Australia. Mr Costello nyarios yén nalika pembangkit tanaga nuklir sacara ekonomi layak didamel, Australia kedah ngudag pamaksudanana. Upami éta janten komérsial, arurang kedah ngaduhan éta. Hartina, henteu aya bantahan ngeunaan énergi nuklir,"" saur Costello."

src: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.
mt: Salila 18 medal anu tiasa dipikawanoh dina hiji poé, sababaraha nagara teu bisa ngahontal podium medal. Ieu diantarana Belanda, Anna Jochemsen finis ka-9 dina klas standar dina Super-G dina poé sabalun, sareng Finlandia, Katja Saarinen finis ka-10 dina event anu sarua. Australia, Mitchell Gourley finis ka-11 dina Super-G klas standar. Kompetitor Ceko, Oldrich Jelinek finis ka-16 dina Super-G klas duduk. Arly Velasquez ti Meksiko finis ka-15 dina Super-G klas duduk. Adam Hall ti Selandia Baru finis ka-9 dina Super-G klas standar. Polandia, Maciej Krezel sareng Anna Ogarzynska, guide dina Super-G klas dina panyabab. Jong Seork Park ti Koréa Kidul finis ka-24 dina Super-G klas duduk.
ref: Kalayan ngan aya dalapan belas medali nu di sayogikeun sapoéna, sababaraha nagara aya anu gagal menangkeun medali. Salah sahiji na nyaéta Walanda, ku Anna Jochemsen réngsé di urutan ka salapan dina katégori wanoja di Super-G kamari, disusul Finlandia anu diwakilan ku Katja Saarinen anu réngsé di urutan ka sapuluh dinu acara anu sami. Mitchell Gourley asal Australia ayana di urutan kasebelas dina men's standing Super-G. Sainganna, Oldrich Jelinek asal Ceko ayana di urutan kagenep belas dina men's standing Super-G Arly Velasquez ti Mexico pungkas di urutan kalima belas dina Super-G jang lalaki. Adam Hall ti Selandia Anyar pungkas di urutan kasalapan dina Super-G jang lalaki. Pemaén ski tunanétra lalaki Polandia Maciej Krezel sareng pemandu na Anna Ogarzynska réngsé diurutan katilu belas di Super-G. Jong Seork Park ti Korea Kidul aya diurutan ka dua puluh opat di katégori lalaki Super-G .

src: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.
mt: Salila 18 medal anu tiasa dipikawanoh dina hiji poé, sababaraha nagara teu bisa ngahontal podium medal. Ieu diantarana Belanda, Anna Jochemsen finis ka-9 dina klas standar dina Super-G dina poé sabalun, sareng Finlandia, Katja Saarinen finis ka-10 dina event anu sarua. Australia, Mitchell Gourley finis ka-11 dina Super-G klas standar. Kompetitor Ceko, Oldrich Jelinek finis ka-16 dina Super-G klas duduk. Arly Velasquez ti Meksiko finis ka-15 dina Super-G klas duduk. Adam Hall ti Selandia Baru finis ka-9 dina Super-G klas standar. Polandia, Maciej Krezel sareng Anna Ogarzynska, guide dina Super-G klas dina panyabab. Jong Seork Park ti Koréa Kidul finis ka-24 dina Super-G klas duduk.
ref: Kalayan ngan aya dalapan belas medali nu di sayogikeun sapoéna, sababaraha nagara aya anu gagal menangkeun medali. Salah sahiji na nyaéta Walanda, ku Anna Jochemsen réngsé di urutan ka salapan dina katégori wanoja di Super-G kamari, disusul Finlandia anu diwakilan ku Katja Saarinen anu réngsé di urutan ka sapuluh dinu acara anu sami. Adam Hall ti Selandia Anyar pungkas di urutan kasalapan dina Super-G jang lalaki. Pemaén ski tunanétra lalaki Polandia Maciej Krezel sareng pemandu na Anna Ogarzynska réngsé diurutan katilu belas di Super-G. Jong Seork Park ti Korea Kidul aya diurutan ka dua puluh opat di katégori lalaki Super-G .

src: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."
mt: “Pertunjukan éta ngalakukeun di Birmingham Crown Court jeung ngabubarkeun tanggal 3 Agustus. Presenter, anu ditangkep di tempat, ngabéntahkeun ngalakukeun serangan jeung ngarébutkeun yén dia ngagunakeun tiang pikeun ngabébaskeun diri tina botol-botol anu diémbakkeun ka dirina ku leuwih ti 30 jalma. Blake ogé ditangkep ku niat pikeun ngabébaskeun jalma tina hukuman. Hakim ngomongkeun yén “hampir pasti” Blake bakal dikirim ka tahanan.”
ref: "Sidang éta lumangsung di Pengadilan Birmingham Crown teras bérés kaping 3 Agustus. Pamawa wartos eta, anu ditewak di tempat, ngahindar panarajang sareng nyarios yen manehna nganggo tihang kanggo ngalindungan dirina sorangan tina botol-botol anu dialungkeun ka manehna ku nepi ka tilu puluh jelema. Blake ogé dinyatakeun salah kusabab nyoba ngarobah kaadilan. Hakim ngabéjaan Blake yén ""ampir heunteu tiasa dihindarkeun"" ajeunna badé dilebetkeun kana panjara."

src: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.
mt: Subjék séjénna anu aya dina agenda di Bali nyaéta ngahimpi mangsa hutan-hutan anu masih tetep di dunya, sareng ngahagorkeun teknologi pikeun méré bantuan ka negara-negara nu sedeng pikeun ngagangguan ka hareupna. U.N. ogé mungkaskeun dana pikeun méré bantuan ka negara-negara anu dipingpin ku panyakit global pikeun ngahadapi dampakna. Dana éta tiasa dipaké pikeun rumah-rumah anu tahan lindungan ti banjir, pikeun manajemen air anu leuwih bagus, sareng diversifikasi tanaman.
ref: Jejer sanés dina agenda di Bali kaasup nyalametkeun leuweung dunya anu masih keneh aya, sareng ngembangkeun téknologi pikeun ngabantosan nagara berkembang maju léwat cara nu kirang berpolusi. PBB ogé ngaharepkeun pikeun méréskeun dana pikeun ngabantosan nagara-nagara anu kapangaruhan ku pemanasan global pikeun ngatasi épékna. Acisna tiasa dianggo pikeun ngawangun imah tahan banjir, ngelola cai supados langkung sae, atanapi nyeeran tutuwuhan.

src: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."
mt: “Nigeria ngabéntangan anu geus ngabéntangan pikeun ngabogaan AfCFTA dina minggu anu ngajangkeut ka summit. Komisaris AU pikeun perdagangan sareng industri Albert Muchanga ngabéntangan Benin geus ngabogaan. Komisaris éta nyarios, “Kami teu geus ngabogaan aturan asal sareng koncési tarif, tapi kerangka anu geus kami kagungan teuasih pikeun ngamimitan perdagangan dina tanggal 1 Juli 2020.”
ref: "Nigeria saacanna ngumumkeun yén bakal ngagabung jeung AfCFTA saminggu saacan konperensi. Komisioner dagang sarta industri AU Albert Muchanga nyabarkeun Benin badé ngagabung. Komisaris nyarios, ""Urang teu acan ragem ngeunaan aturan awal sareng konsési tarif, tapi kerangka anu dipimilik ku urang tos cekap pikeun ngamimitian dagang dina 1 Juli 2020""."

src: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.
mt: Éta méré pujian kritis dina waktu di Atlanta jeung diakui pikeun pendidikan urban anu inovatif. Dina 2009 éta méré gelar National Superintendent of the Year. Dina waktu éta, sekolah Atlanta geus ngalaman peningkatan luar biasa dina hasil tes. Sanggeusna, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution ngalaporkeun laporan anu ngabuktikeun yén hasil tes geus naik luar biasa cepat, jeung ngabuktikeun yén sekolah geus ngadetéksi masalah tapi teu ngalakukeun hasilna. Bukti anu datang sanggeusna ngabuktikeun yén kertas tes geus diubah Hall, bareng jeung 34 pejabat pendidikan séjénna, dihukum dina 2013.
ref: Anjeunna dipuji ku krititikus pas anjeunna keur di Atlanta sareng diaku ku élmu perkotaan anu inovatif. taun 2009, anjeunna dibere gelar Pangawas Nasional Taun ieu Basa pas panghargaan éta, sakola Atlanta tos ningal parkembangan dina nilei-nilei murid. Sajongjonan sanggeusna, Konstitusi-Jurnal Atlanta mempublikasikeun laporan anu nembongkeun masalah dina kénging tés. Laporan nunjukeun yén nilai ulangan téh ningkatna gancang, teras nuduh sakola atos apal masalah ieu tapi henteu bertindak nanaon dina panemuan éta. Buktos saatos éta nunjukkeun yén kertas ujian nu diruksak ku Hall, sareng 34 patugas pendidikan nu sanés, anu didakwa di taun 2013.

src: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.
mt: Salah sahiji bom meledug di luar kantor gubernur umum. Tiga bom lian meledug di deukeut bangunan pamaréntah dina jangka waktu dua jam. Berita-berita ngalaporkeun yen angka kematian resmi nyaéta opat, jeung berita resmi ngabéakakeun yen nepi ka 30 lalakon, tapi angka akhirna masih teu kanyataan.
ref: Hiji bom ngajelegur di luar kantor gubernur jendral. 3 deui bom ngabeledag dekeut gedung pamarentah disajeroeun waktos 2 jam. Sababaraha laporan nyebutkeun anu resmi tewas nyaeta dalapan, jeung laporan resmi mastikeun bahwa sakitar 30 luka-luka, tapi jumlah nu benerna can kanyahoan.

src: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.
mt: Jesus, umur 21 taun, ngabogaan Manchester City dina bulan Januari 2017 ti klub Brasil Palmeiras pikeun biaya nu dikeuakeun £27 juta. Dina waktu éta, Brazil ngalakonan 53 pertandingan pikeun klub dina kabéh kompetisi sareng ngahasilkeun 24 gol.
ref: Jesus nalika yuswa 21 taun ngagabung ka Manchester City taun kamari dina Januari 2017 ti klub Brasil Palmeiras jang dibayaran saloba £27 juta. Ti saprak éta, pamaén Brazil ieu parantos tampil dina 53 partandingan pikeun klub dina sadaya kompetisi sareng parantos nyétak 24 gol.

src: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.
mt: Hostel tigil di Mekkah, kota suci Islam dina waktu tabuh 10 enjing waktu lokal. Bangunan éta ngahuni hiji jumlah warga anu datang pikeun ngunjungi kota suci dina waktu hajj. Tamu hostel éta umumna warga Uni Arab Emirates. Jumlah korban tilar dunya paling saeutik 15, nu diprediksikeun bakal nambahan.
ref: Hiji hostél rugrug di Mekah, kota suci umat Islam, tabuh 10 énjing waktos satempat. Bangunan iyeu nganampung sajumlah peziarah anu datang jang daratang ka kota suci di peuting haji. Sémah pamondokan seseueurna wargi Uni Émirat Arab. Korban anu maot sahenteuna 15, anu diperkirakeun bakal naék.

src: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.
mt: Satelit, anu sabenerna leuwih ti 1,000 pon sareng ngalaju kira-kira 17,500 mil per jam, ngalanggar 491 mil di luhur bumi. Ilmuan ngabéakakean yén éta ngabédakkeun anu gedé. Mereka masih nyoba nyieun penentuan yén bumi bakal dipengaruhi. Kantor Komando Strategis Amerika Serikat ti Departemen Pertahanan Amerika Serikat ngalakukeun pamariksaan jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngabéakakean jeung ngab
ref: Eta satelit, anu dua-duana ngagaduhan beurat langkung ti 1.000 pon, sareng melaju dina jarak kirang langkung 17.500 mil perjam, tabrakan kana 491 mil diluhureun bumi. élmuwan nyarios yén ledakan anu disababkeun tabrakan éta gedé pisan. Aranjeunna keur usaha jang nangtukeun sakumaha gedé tabrakan éta sareng kumaha dunya bakal kapengaruh. Komando Strategis Amérika Serikat ti kantor Departemen Pertahanan AS nuju ngalacak ruruntuhan éta. Hasil analisis perencanaan éta bakal diposting di halaman situs publik.

src: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.
mt: Batten dipatut 190 ti 400 orang Amerika nu paling kaya dina taun 2008 jeung estimasi kekayaanna $2.3 miliar. Anjeunna lulus ti College of Arts & Sciences ti Universitas Virginia dina taun 1950 sareng jadi donatur nu sigentik ka institusi éta.
ref: Batten rengking dina ka-190 dina 2008 400 daftar jalmi pang beungharna Amerika kalayan diperkirakeun untung $2,3 milyar. Anjeunna lulus ti perguruan tinggi seni jeung sains Universitas Virginia taun 1950 jeung ogé salah sahiji pendonor utama keur institusi éta.

src: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading ""18"" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense."
mt: "Gubernur California Arnold Schwarzenegger ngagambarkeun undang-undang anu ngaharaman penjualan atawa sewa video game anu ngandung kekerasan ka anak-anak. Undang-undang éta ngaharapkeun video game anu ngandung kekerasan anu dijual di California dipajangkeun jeung label ""18"" jeung ngaharaman penjualanna ka anak-anak jeung denda $1000 per kasus."
ref: "Gubernur California Arnold Schwarzenegger nandatanganan undang-undang  anu ngalarang icalan atawa nyewakeun video gim kekerasan ka budak leutik. RUU eta negeskeun yen video gim nu aya kekerasanna nu dijual di nagara bagéan California kudu ditandaan ""18"" jeung upami dijual ka budak alit bakal dihukum ku denda $1000 tiap nu ngalanggar."

src: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""
mt: Mike Duvall, nu ngawinangan sareng dua anak dewasa, teu ngalakukeun jeung Miller, nu ngalaporkeun kana kisahna. Saenggeus ditanya koméntar, Miller ngomong, ""Mike ngomong deui dina rapat...Aku ngalakukeun pikeun nyiapkeun diri...Jadi, teu ngawasita kana anu Mike ngomongna."""
ref: "Duvall, anu tos nikah sareng gaduh dua murangkalih nu tos ageung, henteu ninggalkeun kesan anu saé ka Miller, anu patali sareng carita éta. Waktos diménta koméntar, Miller nyarios ""Mike seueur nyarios keur sidang lumangsung... Abdi nuju siap-siap janten abdi heunteu ngadangukeun naon anu anjeunna omongkeun."""

src: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."
mt: "Pamimpin Perdana Menteri Stephen Harper ngabogaan pikeun nyeratkeun "Clean Air Act" ka komite partéy anu ngabagi-bagi, sabada pertemuan 25 menitna ka Jack Layton, pamimpin partéy NDP, di PMO. Layton ngajak pikeun ngaganti peraturan lingkungan partéy konservatif dina pertemuan jeung PM, ngajak pikeun "thorough and complete rewriting" tina peraturan partéy konservatif. Ti saprak pamaréntah fédéral ngabogaan pikeun ngabagi-bagi dana tina rumah sakit Mersey di Devonport, Tasmania, pamaréntah nagara jeung sababaraha anggota parlemén fédéral ngalaporkeun yen aksi éta nyaéta stént di awal pilihan umum fédéral nu bakal dipangaruhi ku November. Nanging, Pamimpin Perdana Menteri John Howard ngalaporkeun yen aksi éta nyaéta pikeun ngabogaan pikeun ngabagi-bagi fasilitas tina rumah sakit tina pamaréntah Tasmania, ku ngabagi-bagi AUD$45 juta."
ref: "Perdana Menteri Stephen Harper parantos satuju keur ngirimkeun 'Clean Air Act' na pamaréntah ka komite kabéh partai keur dipariksa, sateuacanna bacaan kadua, saatos 25 menit rapat dinten salasa jeung ketua NDP Jack Layton di PMO. Layton atos nyuhungkeun parobahan dina RUU lingkungan konsérvatif salami pasamoan kalawan PM, nyuhungkeun opiken ""ditulis ulang sadayana teras lengkep"" tina RUU lingkungan partai Konservatif. Saprak Pamarentah Federal turun tangan kanggo nyokot alih ngadanaan Rumah Sakit Mersey di Devonport, Tasmania, pamarentah nagara haturan sarta sababaraha anggota parlemen federal atos wagel tindakan ieu minangka aksi dina bubuka pemilu federal anu bade disauran dina sasih Nopember. Tapi Perdana Mentri John Howard nyarios  lamun tindakan éta téh ngan saukur keur ngalindungi pasilitas rumah sakit anu diturunkeun ku pamaréntah Tasmania, ku masihan tambahan 45 juta dollar Australia."

src: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).
mt: Kedua asam sianurik sareng melamin ditemukan di sampel urin hewan peliharaan anu mati setelah makan makanan hewan peliharaan yang terkontaminasi. Dua bahan kimia éta bereaksi antarana pikeun ngahasilkeun kristal anu tiasa ngahambat fungsi ginjal, para ilmuan ti universitas éta nyarios. Para ilmuan nampa kristal anu dihasilkeun ku penambahan melamin sareng asam sianurik. Komposisi kristal éta anu dihasilkeun ku urin hewan peliharaan anu terkena dibandingkeun ku spektroskopi inframerah (FTIR).
ref: Asam sianurat sareng melamin dipanggihan dina sampel urin sato peliharaan nu geus paéh saenggeus ngonsumsi kadaharan sato nu terkontaminasi. Kadua sanyawa saling ngabentuk kristal anu tiasa ngaruksak pungsi ginjal, ceuk panaliti di salah sahiji kampus. Panalungtik ningali kumaha kristal kabentuk dina cikiih ucing ku nambahkeun melamin jeung asam cyanuric. Komposisi tina kristal-kristal ieu teh cocok jeung komposisi anu dipendakan dina cikiih piaraan anu kapangaruhan pas dibandingkeun nganggo spektroskopi infra merah (FTIR).

src: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."""
mt: "Xinhua ngababarkeun yen insinyur pamaréntah ngadamel dua "black box" rekam jeung jejak penerbangan dina Rabu. Teman-teman olahraga jemputan ogé ngababarkeun pamujaan ka Luna. Tommy Dreamer ngomong ""Luna nyaéta raja pertama Extreme. Pamangku pertama kuak. Luna tilar dunya dina malam dua bulan. Aya nu unik saperti éta. Bidadari kuat."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels koméntarkeun ""Luna nyaéta anu aneh saperti éta...mungkin leuwih...saya kasihatana sareng saya ngabutuhkeunna...harapna éta di tempat anu leuwih bagus..."""
ref: "Xinhua ngalaporkeun yen panyidik pamarentah mendak 2 perekam pangapungan 'kotak hideung' dina dinten Rebo. Sobat-sobat pegulatna ogé masihan panghormatan kanggo Luna. Tommy Dreamer nyarios ""Luna nyaeta Ratu kahiji anu ekstrim. Bos kahiji kuring. Luna ngantunkeun dina wengi dua bulan. Unik sapertos anjeunna. Awéwé anu kuat."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels ngoméntaran yén ""Luna mangrupikeun anéh sami salaku kuring ... sigana deui anu langkung ... mikanyaah anjeunna sareng bakal sono pisan ... mugia anjeun aya di tempat anu langkung saé."""

src: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt. However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head. The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
mt: Walaupun tigapeur urang aya di rumah nalika mobil éta ngabakar, teu satengahna anu kalah. Nu nyanghareupan, anu ngendang mobil red Audi TT, ngalaman luka parah dina kepalana. Jalan di mana kejadian éta ngalaman ditutup sementara pikeun ngabébaskeun sanggeus mobil nyamperkeun. Anjeunna diawetkeun di Rumah Sakit James Paget di Great Yarmouth. Anjeunna diangkat ka Rumah Sakit Addenbrooke di Cambridge.
ref: Sanaos tilu urang aya di jero bumi pas mobil na nabrak, teu aya anu cidera. Tapi, supir ngalaman tatu parah dina sirahna. Jalan di mana aya kacilakaan ditutup samentara jeung layanan darurat ngabébaskeun supir ti mobil Audi TT beureum. Anjeunna mimitina dirawat di Rumah Sakit James Paget di Yarmouth Raya. Anjeunna teras dialihkeun ka Rumah Sakit Addenbrooke di Cambridge.

src: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.
mt: Permainan dimimitian pukul 10:00 pagi jeung cuaca anu bagus jeung keur 7:00 pagi hujan anu teu lama teu ngabuburkeun, ieu mangrupakeun poé anu bagus pikeun rugby 7. Tim top seeds Afrika Kidul dimimitian jeung nyerang Zambia nu diurutkeun ka 5. Zambia teu bisa ngahontal 26 - 00 jeung Afrika Kidul. Nalika permainan kaénan jeung saudara kidulna, Afrika Kidul teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal jeung teu bisa ngahontal je
ref: Pertandingan mulai tabuh 10:00 enjing di cuaca anu caang saatos gerimis sakeudap enjing-enjingna, ieu mangrupikeun dinten anu pas pikeun 7 Rugbi. Bibit luhur dina turnamén Afrika Kidul dimimitian dina catetan katuhu nalika aranjeunna meunang gampang 26 - 00 ngalawan bibit ka 5 Zambia. Katempo jelas kualitas na nurun dina pertandingan ngalawan dulur-dulur na ti kidul, Afrika Kidul teras-terasan ningkat nalika turnamen lumangsung. Partahanan disiplin manehna, kaahlian pangendalian bal sareng kerja sama tim anu sae midamel manehna menonjol sareng jelas yen ieu tim anu kudu dielehkeun.

src: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.
mt: Salila tiga dasawarsa, walaupun tetep jadi negara komunis, Cina ngalakukeun reformasi ekonomi. Reformasi éta dimimiti ku pamimpin Cina, Deng Xiaoping. Salila tiga dasawarsa, ekonomi Cina ngalaman panggémbor 90 kali. Dina taun 2009, Cina ngalakukeun ekspor mobil leuwih loba ti Jerman sareng ngalahkeun Amérika Sarikat minangka pasar mobil panggedéna. Ekonomi Cina bisa leuwih loba ti Amérika Sarikat dina dua dasawarsa.
ref: Salama 3 abad kapungkur, sanaos tetep janten nagara komunis, Tiongkok tiasa ngembangkeun pasar ékonomi. Kamajuan ekonomi anu mimiti ajeg dihandap kapamingpinan Deng Xiaoping. Ti saprak eta, ekonomi Tiongkok jadi tumbuh 90 kali lipat. Pikeun kahiji kalina, taun kamari Cina ngékspor mobil langkung seueur ti Jerman sareng ngelehkeun Amérika Serikat salaku pasar panggedéna pikeun industri ieu. Angka PDB Tiongkok leuwih gedé dibandingkeun Amérika Serikat dina dua dekade terahir.

Salila tiga dasawarsa, ekonomi Cina ngalaman panggémbor 90 kali. Dina taun 2009, Cina ngalakukeun ekspor mobil leuwih loba ti Jerman sareng ngalahkeun Amérika Sarikat minangka pasar mobil panggedéna. Ekonomi Cina bisa leuwih loba ti Amérika Sarikat dina dua dasawarsa.
ref: Salama 3 abad kapungkur, sanaos tetep janten nagara komunis, Tiongkok tiasa ngembangkeun pasar ékonomi. Kamajuan ekonomi anu mimiti ajeg dihandap kapamingpinan Deng Xiaoping. Ti saprak eta, ekonomi Tiongkok jadi tumbuh 90 kali lipat. Pikeun kahiji kalina, taun kamari Cina ngékspor mobil langkung seueur ti Jerman sareng ngelehkeun Amérika Serikat salaku pasar panggedéna pikeun industri ieu. Angka PDB Tiongkok leuwih gedé dibandingkeun Amérika Serikat dina dua dekade terahir.

src: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""
mt: Hu ngomongkeun, ""Kami bakal nyebatkeun emisi karbon dioksida per unit GDP ku margin anu nyata ku 2020 ti tingkat 2005,"" Hu ngomongkeun. Anjeun teu ngaturkeun angka pikeun nyebatkeun éta, anjeun ngomongkeun anjeun bakal nyebatkeunna ku panghasilan ékonomi Cina. Hu ngomongkeunkeun negara-negara nu sedeng bakal nyebatkeun jalan anu lama anu polusi pikeun mungkasna sareng nyebatkeun. Anjeun ngomongkeunkeun anjeun teu, anjeun teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu, teu
ref: "Kami bakal milarian cara ngirangan émisi karbon dioksida per unit GDP ku margin anu signifikan di 2020 ti tingkat 2005,"" saur Hu. Anjeunna henteu netepkeun angka pikeun pemotongan éta, nyarios bahwa éta bade didamel dumasar tina hasil ekonomi Tiongkok. Hu ngadesek nagara-nagara berkembang ""pikeun nyingkahan jalan pencemaran udara anu lami sareng ngabersihan engkéna."" Anjeunna nambahan bahwasana ""aranjeunna henteu kedah ditaros nyandak kawajiban saluareun tahap kamekaran, tanggung jawab sareng kamampuan aranjeunna."""

src: "The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country. Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: ""Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola,"" he said."
mt: "Kurang leuwih 1000 kasus malaria dianggep paling parah di nagara éta. Spokesman pikeun Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman ngomong: ""Angola tiasa ngalaman panyakitna paling parah jeung situasi masih teu luhur di Angola,"" dia ngomong."
ref: "Badan amal medis Mangola, Medecines Sans Frotieres sareng Organisasi Kasehatan Dunya nyatakeun yén éta mangrupikeun wabah paling parah anu kacatet di nagara éta. Juru carios Medecine Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman nyarios: ""Angola téh nuju nyanghareupan badai parah jeung kaayaanna masih parah pisan,"" saur anjeunna."

src: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.
mt: Kier Starmer QC, Direktor Umum Penerangan, ngabéakake pernyataan dina pagintungan ngabéntangan penerbangan Huhne sareng Pryce. Huhne geus meunangkeun jabatan sareng ieu tiasa digantikeun ku Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP tiasa ngagantikeun jabatan Davey anu geus kosong. Huhne sareng Pryce tiasa ngabéntangan di Westminster Magistrates Court tanggal 16 Pébruari.
ref: Direktur Penuntutan Publik Kier Starmer QC, masihan pernyataan enjing ieu ngumumkeun panuntutan Huhne jeung Pryce. Huhne tos ngundurkeun diri jeung anjeunna bakal digantos di Kabinet ku Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP diharapkeun keur ngajabat Menteri Bisnis nu ditinggalkeun Davey. Huhne sareng Pryce kedah dongkap ka Paradilan Westminster Magistrates tanggal 16 Febuari.

src: "The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist ""whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."" As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in."
mt: Kisah anu disajikeun dina opera Perancis, ku Camille Saint-Saens, nyaéta tina hiji seniman ""anu hidupna dipaksa ku kasih sayang pikeun narkoba sareng Jepang."" Sababna, para penampil ngabakar rokok ganja dina panggung, sareng teater éta ogé ngajak para penonton pikeun nyokot.
ref: "Caritana dimawakeun dina opera Perancis ku Camille Saint-Saens ngeunaan hiji seniman ""anu hirupna diatur ku kacintaan anjeunna kana obat-obatan jeung Jepang."" Hasilna, para pamaén ngisep ganja di luhur panggung, sareng téater éta ngadorong penonton ekeur miluan ogé."

src: "Leonov, also known as ""cosmonaut No. 11"", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or ""spacewalk"", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes. He received the ""Hero of the Soviet Union"", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over."
mt: Leonov, anu ogé dipikawanoh salaku "cosmonaut No. 11", mangrupikeun bagian ti tim kosmonaut Uni Soviet asal. Pada 18 Maret 1965, éta nyekel peran salaku kosmonaut anu munggaran ngalakukeun aktivitas ekstravehikular (EVA), atawa "spacewalk", anu ngahasilkeun 12 menit. Éta menerima "Hero of the Soviet Union", panghargian pangalusna ti Uni Soviet, pikeun karya éta. Sepuluh taun sabalikna, éta ngeléwati bagian ti misi Apollo-Soyuz Uni Soviet, nu ngahasilkeun simbolisasi yén balap ruang angkasa teuas.
ref: "Leonov, katelah ogé salaku ""kosmonot No. 11"", nyaéta bagian tina tim kosmonot Soviét anu mimiti. dina tanggal 18 Maret taun 1965, manehna ngamimitian ngalakukeun manned extravehicular activity (EVA) nayeta ""leumpang di luar angkasa"", nyesakeun manehna sorangan diluar kapal ngaleuwihan dua belas menit. Anjeunna nampi ""Pahlawan Uni Soviet"", Panghormatan anu pangluhurna ti Uni Soviet, pikeun karyana. 10 taun kapengker, anjeunna mingpin bagian Soviet tina misi Apollo-Soyuz, anu ngalambangkeun yén balap ruang angkasa parantos réngsé."

src: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day. A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" They all ran back from where the accident had happened."
mt: “Sanggeus kecelakaan ngalaman, Gibson dipindahkeun ka rumah sakit tapi tilaran ti saprak. Pamandu mobil, anu umurna 64, teu kacida luka dina kecelakaan éta. Mobilna dirampok tina tempat kecelakaan dina waktu 1200 GMT dina poé éta. Sareng jalma anu bekerja di garasi deukeut tempat kecelakaan ngalaporkeun: ““Aya anak-anak anu nunggukeun pikeun salamet di jalan sareng anjeunna ngadengdeng sareng nangis.”” Anak-anakna balik tina tempat kecelakaan éta.”
ref: "Saatos kacilakaan kajantenan, Gibson dicandak ka rumah sakit nanging ngantunkeun teu lami saatosna. Supir truk eta, anu umurna 64 taun, heunteu ngalaman raheut tina kacilakaan eta. Kandaraan anu terlibat parantos dipindahkeun ti tempat kajadian cilaka kira-kira tabuh 12:00 GMT dinten éta kénéh. Batur anu damel di garasi caket tempat kacilakaan kajantenan nyarios: 'Aya murangkalih ngantosan nyebrang jalan sareng aranjeunna sadaya téh ngajerit sareng ceurik."" Manehna kabeh lalumpat dimana kacalakaan eta kajadian."

src: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does. This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.
mt: Karya anu dilakukeunna umumna teori, tapi programna ditulis pikeun ngamimitan observasi anu dilakukeun ka galaksi Sagittarius. Efek tim éta ngalakukeun pikeun ngabandingkeun antara matérial gelap jeung matérial gelap galaksi Bima Sakti. Saperti bulan ngarobah bumi, ngabalukarkeun pasang surut, begitu Bima Sakti ngarobah galaksi Sagittarius. Ilmuan tiasa ngabandingkeun yen matérial gelap ngarobah matérial gelap anu séjénna dina cara nu sarua jeung matérial biasa. Teori éta ngomong yen matérial gelap di sekeliling galaksi umumna teras di sekeliling galaksi dina wadah, jeung teras dijieun tina banyakan partikel kecil.
ref: Padamelan nu rengse seuseueurna teori hungkul, tapi programna didamel pikeun simulasi panalitian anu dilakukeun ka galaksi Sagitarius. Éfék anu di téangan ku tim bakal disababkeun ku gaya pasang surut antara materi gelapna galaksi éta jeung materi gelapna Bima Sakti. Siga bulan anu ngerahkeun gaya tarik ka bumi, nyebabkeun pasang surut, kitu oge Bima Sakti ngerahkeun gaya ka galaksi Sagitarius. Para élmuwan tiasa nyimpulkeun yén materi gelap méré pangaruh ka materi gelap nu lianna nganggo cara anu sami sapertos matéri biasa. Teori ieu nyebutkeun yén seueurna matéri poék disakitaran galaksi téh aya disakitaran hiji galaksi dina bentuk buletan cahaya, teras kadamel tina seueur partikel leutik.

src: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."
mt: Debat éta dipicu ku kontroversi ngeunaan pemasukan pikeun panyaluran sareng panyambungan di New Orleans, anu dipikawanoh ku sebagian kalompok konservatif fiskal minangka ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Kritik liberal ngeunaan panyaluran sareng panyambungan éta fokusna kana pemberian kontrak panyambungan ka para insider Washington.
ref: "Debat éta dipicu ku kontrovérsi kusabab kaleuleuwihan dina pamakéan biaya keur bantosan jeung rékonstruksi saatos Badai Katrina; anu sababaraha jalmi konsérvatif fiskal téh nyebatkeunna ""Kasepakatan Bush di New Orleans"". Kritik liberal dina upaya rékonstruksi atos mokuskeun dina masihan kontrak rékonstruksi pikeun warga lokal Washington anu diaku."

src: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."
