src: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.
mt: Kapal éta bakal ngahampir ka Bumi jeung ngalobang ka atmosfer, dina tabuh 5 enjing (waktu timur), diharapkeun bakal ngahasilkeun pameran cahaya pikeun jalma-jalma di California Lor, Oregon, Nevada, sareng Utah. Kapal éta bakal nampak kawas bintang jatuh anu ngalir di langit. Kapal éta bakal ngalir dina kira-kira 12,8 km atawa 8 mil per detik, cukup cepat pikeun leumpang ti San Francisco ka Los Angeles dina hiji menit. Stardust bakal ngalungguhkeun rekor panganyar-anya pikeun kapal anu paling cepat ngahampir ka Bumi, ngagaduh rekor panganyar-anya anu dijieun dina bulan Méi taun 1969 nalika kapal Apollo X ngahampir ka Bumi. “Kapal éta bakal ngalir di wétan pabeulit California jeung bakal ngahasilkeun pameran cahaya ti California ka Oregon Tengah sareng leuwih ka Nevada sareng Idaho sareng ka Utah,” Tom Duxbury, pamimpin proyek Stardust ngomong.
ref: "ngeke jam 5 isuk-isuk (waktos wetan) pas kapsul eta nepi ka bumi jeung asup ka atmosfir, kapsul eta teh bakal nyieun cacaangan nu tiasa ditingali ku urang-urang di Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, sareng Utah. Kapsulna bakal katingalina siga bentang murag anu ngaliwatan langit. Kapsulna bakal ngumbara sakitar 12,8 kilometer atawa 8 mil per detik, lumayan gancang waktos nu dibutuhkeun angkat ti San Francisco ka Los Angeles ngan salami samenit. Stardust bakal mecahkeun rékor salamina nu anyar janten kapal angkasa panggancangna anu balik ka Bumi, ngelehkeun rekor sateuacana sasih Mei taun 1969 nalika balikna modul parintah Apollo X. Ieu teh bakal ngalangkungan pantai kulon di kaler California jeung bakal nyaangan langit ti California dugi ka Oregon tengah teras dugi ka Nevada sareng Idaho sareng Utah,"" saur Tom Duxbury, manajer proyek Stardust."

src: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.
mt: Kapal éta bakal ngahampir ka Bumi jeung ngalobang ka atmosfer, dina tabuh 5 enjing (waktu timur), diharapkeun bakal ngahasilkeun pameran cahaya pikeun jalma-jalma di California Lor, Oregon, Nevada, sareng Utah. Kapal éta bakal nampak kawas bintang jatuh anu ngalir di langit. Kapal éta bakal ngalir dina kira-kira 12,8 km atawa 8 mil per detik, cukup cepat pikeun leumpang ti San Francisco ka Los Angeles dina hiji menit. src: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state. She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets. Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.
mt: Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, nyaéta dokter anu bekerja di Rumah Sakit Anak Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, bakal dihukum mati anu dipingpin ku tindakan anu ngaharapkeun kematian sanggeus ibuna, Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, katempo mati di bagasi mobilna, sababaraha polisi di Ohio ngabéak. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian katempo di Blue Ash, Ohio, sabuduh 15 mil di luar Cincinnati, katempo ngaduduk di taneuh di deukeut jalan, ngan ngagunakeun kaos jeung celana dalam, dina keadaan anu kacida boga obat. Anjeunna ngabéakkeun polisi ka mobilna, Oldsmobile Intrigue, anu 500 feet jauhna. Di situ, polisi katempo mayat ibuna, Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, anu katempo ngagunakeun baju jeung baju, anu katempo boga bau darah. Polisi ngabéakkeun yen mayat éta katempo boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga boga b
ref: Hiji dokter anu damel di Rumah Sakit murangkalih di Pittsburg, Pennsylvania bakal didakwa kalawan pembunuhan sadis sanggeus indungna kapanggih tiwas di bagasi mobil na dina dinten Rebo, sanggem pihak berwenang di Ohio. Doktor Malar Balasubramanian, usia 29, kapanggih di Blue Ash, Ohio, bagian sisi kota kirang langkung 15 mil ti Cincinnati kalér. Anjeunna ngagolér di sisieun jalan nganggo kaos sareng cangcut, jeung anjeunna jiga nembé dirawat. Anjeunna ngarahkeun aparat ka Oldsmobile hideung anu jarakna sakitar 500 kaki. Di dinya, aranjeuna manggih bugang Saroja Balasubramanian, 53 taun, ditutupan simbut anu pinuh ku getih. Pulisi nyatakeun yén layonna parantos aya di ditu sakitar sadinten.

src: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.
mt: Éta mangrupa akuisisi panggedéna dina sejarah eBay. Perusahaan éta ngarasa pikeun memperluas sumber keuntungan jeung jadi populer di wewengkot di mana Skype ngadeg ku posisi kuat, saperti Cina, Eropa Timur, jeung Brasil.
ref: ieu teh mangrupakeun akuisisi pangbadagna dina sajarah eBay. Parusahaan ngaharepkeun pikeun ngamisahkeun asal kauntunganna sareng ningkatkeun kasohoranana dimana Skype gaduh posisi anu kuat, sapertos Cina, Éropa Wétan, sareng Brasil.

src: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear. Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard. Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas. Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.
mt: Ketika perang berhenti setelah luka-luka diangkut ke rumah sakit, sekitar 40 dari tahanan yang tersisa tinggal di halaman dan menolak untuk kembali ke selnya. Penyelenggara berusaha memperbaiki situasi, tetapi tuntutan tahanan tidak jelas. Antara 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, api mulai dinyalakan oleh tahanan di halaman. Sekarang, petugas berpakaian serba hitam masuk ke halaman dan mengepung tahanan dengan gas air mata. Tim pemadam kebakaran akhirnya memadamkan api pada 11:35 malam.
ref: Nalika gelut di eureunkeun saatos anu tatu diangkut ka rumah sakit, sakitar 40 tahanan anu sejen tetep cicing di pakarangan sareng nolak balik ka sélna. Tukang negosiasi na keur nyoba ngabenerkeun kaayaan éta, tapi tungtutan tawanan na teu jelas. Antawis tabuh 10:00-11:00 wengi MDT, kahuruan dimimitan ku para tahanan di halaman. Teu lami, patugas anu dilengkepan ku pakakas anti huru hara lebet ka buruan sarta nyedekkeun narapidana maké gas cipanon. Pamadam kahuruan nyalametkeun antukna seuneu dina jam 11:35 peuting.

src: "The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect. They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income. In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day. The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as ""a trap"" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself."
mt: “Komentar-komentar éta, anu disiarkeun langsung ku televisi, nyaéta komentar pertama ti sumber-sumber Iran anu ngaku yen sanksi-sanksi éta tiasa ngabalukarkeun efek. Ieu sanksi-sanksi téh ngan tiasa ngarugrugkeun finansial sareng ngabatkeun eksport minyak mentah ti Éropa, ti mana perekonomian Iran menerima 80% pendapatan asingna. Dina laporan bulanana terakhirna, OPEC ngabéakkeun eksport minyak mentahna jadi 2,8 juta barel per hari, anu paling luhur dina dua dasawarsa. Pemimpin tertinggi Iran, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, ngarujuk kana ketergantungan minyak éta minangka “jebakan” anu datang ti jaman sebelum revolusi Islam Iran dina 1979 sareng ti mana Iran tiasa lepas diri.”
ref: "komentar eta, anu disiarkeun langsung di tv, nyaeta mimiti na sakabeh senior-senior Iran ngaku yen sanksi eta aya efekna. Éta kalebet pembatasan keuangan sareng larangan ku Uni Eropa kanggo ngirim lisah atah ka luar negri, nu ti mana ékonomi Iran kenging 80% panghasilan luar negrina. Di laporan bulanan terakhir, OPEC nyebatkeun yén ékspor bahan atah téh turun nepi ka pangrendahna salami dua dékade ieu, nyaeta 2.8 juta tong sapoéna. Pamingpin pangluhurna nagara éta, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, atos pernah ngajelaskeun yén katergantungan kana minyak téh ""perangkap"" dimimitian ti saacan revolusi islam di Iran taun 1979 sareng dimana nagara éta kedah ngabebaskeun dirina nyalira. The phrase from which the country should free itself"" is understood as ""from before the independence of Iran country""."

src: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope. After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll. French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters. Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.
mt: Di Perancis, prosés pilihna tradisionalna nyaéta: pilihna isolasi diri di ruangan, ngabukak lembaran kertas anu geus dicetak anu ngandung pamilihna pilihan, ka jero kantong. Sanggeus pamilihna dipastikeun identitasna, pamilihna nyingkahan kantongna ka kantong pilih sareng ngagambarkeun daftar pilih. Hukum Perancis ngabatasi prosésna. Ti 1988, kantong pilihna tiasa transparan supaya pamilih sareng panjaga bisa ngawaskeun yen kantongna tiasa hadé di awal pilih sareng kantongna tiasa ditambahkeun keur pamilihna anu geus dipastikeun sareng dihitung. Pamilihna tiasa ngirimkeun wakilna keur ngawaskeun prosésna. Di malam harie, pilihna dihitung ku wakil-wakilna di bawah pangawasan anu leuwih tegeh, anu ngagunakeun prosés anu khusus.
ref: Di Prancis, pemilu téh kurang nganggo téknologi: nu badé milih téh lebet ka hiji blik, bari nyandak kertas anu aya jalmi nu badé dipilihna teras éta dilebetkeun kana amplop. Saatos patugas mastikeun idéntitas pamilih, pamilih ngalebetkeun amplop kana kotak suara sareng nandatangan daptar pamilih. Hukum pamilihan umum Prancis sacara ketat ngatur prosésna. Ti saprak taun 1988, Kotak sora kudu dijieun transparan nu matak pamilih sareng pengawas tiasa ningali lamun teu aya amplop dina awal pemungutan sora jeung teu aya amplop nu ditambahkeun lian ti nu diitung jeung ti pamilih nu sah. Kandidat tiasa ngirimkeun wawakil kanggo nyaksian saban haturan ti prosés éta. Wengina, soanten diétang ku sukarélawan anu dihandap pangawasan ketat, nuturkeun aturan husus.

src: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi. Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV. One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.
mt: Jika konfirmasi, panyangka éta ngabenerkeun pangarungkakna Allen pikeun nyangka Musashi. Pasca peta dasar laut, panyangka éta katempo ngagunakeun ROV. Allen salah saurang paling kaya di dunya, Allen ngadakwéan sababaraha pikeun eksplorasi laut sareng mulai pangarungkakna pikeun nyangka Musashi ti minangka minatna di perang.
ref: Upami parantos dikonpirmasi, penemuan éta ngabereskeun penemuan Allen salila dalapan taun kanggo Musashi. Saatos pametaan dasar laut, bangké kapal éta kapendak nganggo ROV. Salah sahiji jalmi pangbeungharna di dunya, Allen dilaporkeun ngainvéstasi seueur kakayaan na pikeun éksplorasi laut teras mimitian pikeun mendakan Musashi tina minat saumur hirup dina perang.

src: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi. Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV. One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.
mt: Jika konfirmasi, panyangka éta ngabenerkeun pangarungkakna Allen pikeun nyangka Musashi. Pasca peta dasar laut, panyangka éta katempo ngagunakeun ROV. Allen salah saurang paling kaya di dunya, Allen ngadakwéan sababaraha pikeun eksplorasi laut sareng mulai pangarungkakna pikeun nyangka Musashi ti minangka minatna di perang.
ref: Upami parantos dikonpirmasi, penemuan éta ngabereskeun penemuan Allen salila dalapan taun kanggo Musashi. Saatos pametaan dasar laut, bangké kapal éta kapendak nganggo ROV. Salah sahiji jalmi pangbeungharna di dunya, Allen dilaporkeun ngainvéstasi seueur kakayaan na pikeun éksplorasi laut teras mimitian pikeun mendakan Musashi tina minat saumur hirup dina perang.

src: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant. Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water. According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant. Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.
mt: Berita televisi ngalaporkeun yen asap putih tina pabrik éta. Otoritas lokal ngabogaan warga di sekitar pabrik éta pikeun tetep di rumah, ngabogaan AC pikeun jangan dipaké sareng jangan minum air kran. Menurut Jepang nuklir biro, radioaktif cesium sareng iodin geus diidentifikasi di pabrik éta. Otoritas ngagambarkeun yen ieu ngabogaan yen kontainer nu ngandung uranium bahan bakar di tempat éta geus rusak sareng tiasa ngalelehan.
ref: Laporan tipi nunjukeun haseup bodas asalna tina pépélakan. Aparat satempat tos miwarang wargi nu linggih di sakitaran pabrik pikeun cicing di jero imah, mareman ac, sareng teu eeut ti cai keran. Numutkeun badan nuklir Jepang, cesium radioaktif sareng yodiumna parantos dipendakan dina pabrik. Pihak nu boga kawasa nganggap éta wadah anu keur nyimpen bahan bakar uranium di daérah éta tiasa waé geus retak jeung bocor.

src: "Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview, he said the new variant was ""very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."" Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers. In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa."
mt: Dr. Tony Moll ngadagangkeun Tuberkulosis Tahanan Drugekstrim (XDR-TB) di wewengkon Afrika Kidul KwaZulu-Natal. Dina wawancara, éta ngomong yen varian anyar éta ""sangat bingung jeung alamna ku sabab tingkat kematianna sangat tinggi."" Sajarahna, pasien bisa nginfeksi bug éta di rumah sakit, Dr. Moll pikir, jeung dua di antarana nyaéta karyawan rumah sakit. Dina hiji taun, seseorang anu nginfeksi bisa nginfeksi 10-15 kontak dekatna. Aya sababaraha persén XDR-TB di grup total 330.000 orang anu nginfeksi di hiji waktu di Afrika Kidul.
ref: "Dokter Tony Moll manggihan panyakit Tuberkolosis anu tahan pisan kana landong (XDR-TB) di propinsi Kwazulu-Natal, Afrika Kidul. Dina hiji wawancara, anjeunna nyebatkeun bentuk nu énggal téh""pikasieuneun pisan sareng mangkhawatirkeun kusabab angka mematikan na ageung."" Dr Moll nyangka sababaraha pasién panginten katularan panyakit éta teh di rumah sakit, sareng sahenteuna 2 nu katular téh nyaéta pagawé kaséhatan rumah sakit. Dina 1 waktu sataun, jalmi anu katépaan ku virus tiasa népatkeun 10 dugi ka 15 jalmi anu caket jeung anjeunna. Sanajan kitu, persentase XDR-TB dina sakumna jumplukan jalma kalayan TB sigana masih keneh rendah; 6,000 tina total 330,000 jalma nu kainféksi iraha waé dina hiji kaayaan di Afrika Kidul."

src: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions. It uses satellite-based technology as opposed to older ground-radar-based technology to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint aircraft with greater precision and give pilots more accurate information.
mt: NextGen nyaéta sistem FAA ngarandapan tiasa ngabuka jalur udara anu pendek sareng ngahormat jutaan galon bahan bakar sabulan jeung ngurang emisi karbon. Ieu ngagunakeun teknologi satelit anu béda ti teknologi lama anu ngagunakeun radar taneuh pikeun ngabuktikeun pesawat sareng ngabuktikeun informasi anu leuwih akurat pikeun pilot.
ref: Nextgen nyaeta sistem anu diklaim FAA nu matak bisa ngapungkeun kapal udara kalawan rute anu langkung pondok sarta ngahemat jutaan galon bahan huru saban warsih sarta motong emisi karbon. Ieu ngagunakeun téknologi berbasis satelit anu janten lawan tina téknologi berbasis radar darat anu leuwih lami keu ngatur lalu lintas hawa keur nunjukan posisi pesawat nu leuwih jelas sareng masihan inpo ka pilot nu leuwih akurat.

src: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.
mt: Historian ngalaporkeun keur FBI ngalakukeun keur ngabagi sumber daya dina kasus anu tiasa diselesaian, khususna kasus mobil tukang, jeung tujuan pikeun nambahkeun angka keberhasilan. Kongres ngabagi dana pikeun inisiatif obscenity dina taun 2005 jeung ngasumsi FBI ngabagi 10 agent pikeun pornografi dewasa.
ref: Sejarawan ngritik kabijakan FBI anu kapengker anu mokuskeun dina kasus anu gampil dibéréskeun, khususna kasus maling mobil, anu dimaksudkeun keur ningkatkeun tingkat kasuksesan agensi. Kongres mimiti ngabiayaan inisiatif ngeunaan tindakan nu jorang dina fiskal 2005 sareng nyatakeun yén FBI kedah ngayogikeun 10 agén kana pornografi sawawa.

src: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.
mt: JAS 39C Gripen ngalangkak di landasan panaon di sebrang 9:30 waktos satempat (0230 UTC) sareng meledak, ngabalikkeun bandara panaon ka penerbangan komersial. Pilotna disebutna Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Media lokal ngababarkeun laporan anu mobil panaon bandara ngalangkak sarta meledak.
ref: Kapal JAS 39 C Gripen rugrug kana landasan sakitar tabuh 9:30 enjing waktu lokal (0230 UTC) teras ngabeledug, nu nyebabkeun bandara tutup pikeun penerbangan komérsil. Pilot éta nyaéta pamimpin skuad Dilokrit Pattavee. Berita lokalan ngalaporkeun yen mobil pemadam kebakaran tiguling pas nyamperkeun.

src: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.
mt: Salila 1960-an, Brzezinski bekerja pikeun John F. Kennedy minangka nasehatan jeung lalu administrasi Lyndon B. Johnson. Dina pilihan 1976, manéhna nasehatkeun Carter ngeunaan kebijakan luar negeri, lalu jadi National Security Advisor (NSA) ti 1977 nepi ka 1981, ngagantikeun Henry Kissinger. Sebagai NSA, manéhna bantuan Carter dina diplomasi ngeunaan urusan dunya, saperti Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations through the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.
ref: Salami taun 1960an, Brzezinski damel kanggo John F. Kennedy salaku panaséhatna teras salajengna salaku pagawé administrasi kanggo Lyndon B. Johnson. Dina pemilihan taun 1976 anjeunna jadi penasehat Carter dina urusan kabijakan luar negeri, teras salajengna ngawula salaku National Security Advisor (NSA) ti taun 1977 nepi ka taun 1981,  ngagantikeun Henry Kissinger. Salaku NSA, anjeunna ngabantos Carter nguruskeun urusan hubungan diplomatis dunya, sapertos Camp David Accords, 1978; nganormalkeun hubungan AS-China dina akhir 1970an; Revolusi Iran, nu nyababkeun krisis penyanderaan Iran, 1979; sareng invasi Soviet di Afganistan, 1979.

src: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances. No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.
mt: Bobek lahir di ibu kota Kroasia, Zagreb, Bobek jadi terkenal nalika main pikeun Partizan Belgrade. Bobek gabung jeung tim éta taun 1945 jeung tetep ngabutuhkeun 1958. Dina waktu éta, Bobek nyerang 403 gol dina 468 penampilan. Sajaba ti éta, ti saprak Bobek teu pernah ngalakonan penampilan atawa nyerang gol pikeun klub tiap éta. Taun 1995 Bobek dipilih minangka pemain pangalusna dina sejarah Partizan.
ref: Wedal di ibukota Kroasia, Zagreb, Bobek janten kakoncara pas maén keur Partizan Belgrade. Anjeunna ngagabung jeung aranjeunna dina taun 1945 jeung bertahan nepi ka taun 1958. Waktos anjeunna masih gabung dina kalompok éta, anjeunna nyétak 403 gol saeunggeus 468 tanding. Teu aya jalmi anu kantos langkung sering tampil atanapi nyitak gol pikeun klub salain Bobek. Dina taun 1995 anjeunna kapilih salaku pamaén anu pangsaéna dina sajarah Partizan.

src: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor . This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means ""western claw."""
mt: Hesperonychus elizabethae nyaéta spésiés ti kulawarga Dromaeosauridae sareng mangrupa saudara tina Velociraptor. Hesperonychus ieu nyaéta burung panyerang anu boga bulu sareng boga darah panas. Hesperonychus ieu dipercaya boga kaki anu bisa dina dua sareng boga kuku anu leuwih gedé ti kuku Velociraptor. Kuku anu kadua éta ngabalukarkeun ngaran Hesperonychus anu hartina ""kuku kulon"".
ref: "Hesperonychus elizabethae nyaéta spésiés kulawarga Dromaeosauridae sareng misan Velociraptor. Manuk pamangsa anu pinuh ku bulu ieu, dipercaya geus bisa leumpang tegak make 2 suku jeung boga cakar sapertos Velociraptor. Cékér kaduana gede pisan, jadina anjeunna dipasihan nami Hesperonychus anu hartina ""Cékér Kulon""."

src: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year. A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said. The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives. The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.
mt: Minyakna 100 jalma anu hadir dina pesta, pikeun ngehormat anniversary pertama pasangan anu pernikahan éta diayakeun dina taun anu lalu. Acara resmi anniversary dijadwalkeun pikeun tanggal ngejeg, urang-urang ngomong. Pasangan éta nikah di Texas dina taun anu lalu sareng datang ka Buffalo pikeun ngehormat sareng keluarga sareng jalma-jalma anu aya. Lelaki 30 taun anu lahir di Buffalo, salah saurang ti opat jalma anu ngalaman tewas dina penembakan, tapi istri éta teu kalah.
ref: Sahenteuna aya 100 urang hadir dina pesta eta, kanggo ngarayakeun ulang taun nu ka hiji panganten anu dilaksanakeun sataun ka tukang. Acara ulang taun atos resmi dijadwalkeun kanggo kaping engké, saur pajabat. Panganten eta nikah di Texas 1 taun kamari sareng sumping ka Buffalo kanggo ngarayakeun sareng babaturanna sareng barayana. Salaki umur 30 taun, anu lahir di Buffalo, mangrupikeun 1 korban ti 4 korban anu maot dina penembakan, tapi pamajikanana henteu kunanaon.

ref: Sahenteuna aya 100 urang hadir dina pesta eta, kanggo ngarayakeun ulang taun nu ka hiji panganten anu dilaksanakeun sataun ka tukang. Acara ulang taun atos resmi dijadwalkeun kanggo kaping engké, saur pajabat. Panganten eta nikah di Texas 1 taun kamari sareng sumping ka Buffalo kanggo ngarayakeun sareng babaturanna sareng barayana. Salaki umur 30 taun, anu lahir di Buffalo, mangrupikeun 1 korban ti 4 korban anu maot dina penembakan, tapi pamajikanana henteu kunanaon.

src: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater. Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose. The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.
mt: Kapal Luno ngahaja 120-160 meter kubik bahan bakar di lantarnya nalika kapal ieu tigil sareng angin jeung gelombang ngaburkeun kapal ka jero pabrik. Helikopter ngadamel evakuasi ka dua belas awak kapal sareng luka anu satengahna nyaéta patah hidung. Kapal 100 meter ieu ngalayana pikeun ngumpulkeun bahan bakar biasana sareng awalna para pejabat ngarasa kapal ieu tiasa ngaburkeun bahan bakar.
ref: Luno ngagaduhan bahan bakar saloba 120-160 méter kubik dina kapal nalika kapalna ancur teras angin anu kuat sareng ombak nyorong kana témbok laut. Helikopter-helikopter nyalamatkeun dua belas awak teras hiji-hijina anu cidera nyaéta irungna potong. Kapal 100 meter eta keur di perjalanan kanggo nyandak kargo pupuk biasa jeung para pejabat mimiti na honcewang eta kapal bisi ngabahekeun muatan.

src: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship. French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He documented himself in a 1998 book. In the 1960s he headed back to newly-independent Algeria to teach film directing.
mt: Karya-karya Vautier di luar ngepalat film antara lain aksi puasa dina taun 1973 ngalawan anu dipandangna pencecaran politik. Hukum Perancis diganti. Aktivisme éta kawas balik ka umur 15 taun nalika éta nyambut dina Perang Dunia II. Éta dokumentasi diri éta dina buku 1998. Dina 1960-an éta balik ka Aljazair anu anyar merdeka pikeun ngepalat film.
ref: Prestasi Vautier sajaba janten sutradara nyaéta mogok dahar taun 1973 ngalawan hal anu anjeunna pandang salaku sénsor pulitik. Hukum Perancis atos dirobah. Aktivisme na balik deui ka umur 15 waktos anjeuna ngagabung jeung Parlawanan Perancis salami Perang Dunya II. Manéhna téh nyeratkeun kahirupanna dina kitab 1998. Dina 1960-an anjeunna balik ka Algeria anu nembé merdeka pikeun ngajarkeun ngarahkeun pilem.

src: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral. The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square. Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony. In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.
mt: Leuwih ti opat juta jalma pergi ka Roma pikeun ngadatangkeun upacara. Jumlah jalma anu hadir teu bisa dipungkasi, nu nyababkeun jalma-jalma teu bisa ngabutuhkeun upacara di Lapangan Santo Péter. Dua layar televisi gedé dipasang di tempat-tempat di Roma pikeun jalma-jalma ngeunaan upacara. Di kota-kota lian di Italia sareng di sakabéh dunya, khususna di Polandia, setup serupa dipaké, anu ditonton ku jumlah jalma anu luar biasa.
ref: Langkung ti 4 juta urang angkat ka Roma pikeun ngadatangan pamakaman Jumlah jalmi nu dongkap seueur pisan matak teu sadayana tiasa lebet ka astana di St. Peter's Square. Sababaraha tipi ageung dipasang di sababaraha tempat di Roma supados warga tiasa nyaksian upacara éta. Di seueur dayeuh sanes di Italia sarta di sakumna dunya, utamana di Polandia, pangaturan sarupa didamel, anu tos ditingali ku seueur jalmi.

src: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak. An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak. When the official arrived, the apartment exploded. No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock. No one was inside the apartment. At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.
mt: Menurut laporan, apartemen di jalan Macbeth meledak akibat kebocoran gas. Seorang pejabat dengan perusahaan gas sedang melaporkan ke tempat setelah tetangga memanggil tentang kebocoran gas. Ketika pejabat tiba, apartemen meledak. Tidak ada luka serius yang dilaporkan, tetapi setidaknya lima orang di tempat pada saat ledakan itu dirawat untuk gejala kagetan. Tidak ada orang di dalam apartemen. Pada saat itu, hampir 100 penduduk dikeluarkan dari daerah.
ref: Numutkeun laporan, imah susun di Jalan Macbeth téh kahuruan kusabab bocor gas. Hiji aparat perusahaan gas éta ngalaporkeun ka tempat kajadian saatos saurang tatangga nelepon perkawis kabocoran gas. Nalika patugas dugi, imah susunna ngabeledug. Teu aya anu cidera nu dilaporkeun, tapi sahenteuna aya lima urang di éta tempat pas ngabeledug dirawat ku margi ginggiapeun kénéh. Teu aya 1 jalma oge di leubeut apartemen. Dina waktos ieu, ampir 100 wargi diévakuasi ti wewengkon éta.

src: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver. Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face. Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium. Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.
mt: Korban éta nyaéta Nicholas Alden, 25, sareng Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback geus jadi tukang ngabawa mobil. Edgar Veguilla mibanda luka dina lengan sareng mulut sarta Kristoffer Schneider mibanda luka anu tiasa diobahkeun pikeun wajahna. Uka's senjata gagal nalika dipatutkeun ka kepala seseorang. Schneider ngadakékeun tesimén ku videolink ti basis USAF di tanah asalna.
ref: Korban nu maot nya eta Nicholas Alden, 25, jeung Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback nyaeta nu nyupir na. Edgar Veguilla cédera dina panangan sareng rahang upami Scheneider kudu ngajalanan oprasi ulang pamenteuna. Pakarang Uka gagal diarahkeun kana sirah jalmi kalima. Schneider nyeri teterusan, buta sabelah socana, kaleungitan hiji bagéan tangkorak sareng pameunteu anu didamel tina titanium. Schneider masihan kasaksian nganggo videolink ti pangkalan USAF di kampungna.

src: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics. Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.
mt: Golf sareng rugby bakal balik deui ka Olimpiade. Komite Olimpiade Internasional ngeusahkeun pikeun ngabutuhkeun dua olahraga éta dina pertemuan dina papan eksekutifna di Berlin dina poé éta. Rugby, anu khususna rugby union, sareng golf dipilihkeun tina lima olahraga séjénna anu tiasa dipilihkeun pikeun ngabutuhkeun Olimpiade. Squash, karate sareng olahraga roda nyoba pikeun ngabutuhkeun program Olimpiade ogé, anu dipilihkeun tina baseball sareng softball, anu dipilihkeun tina Olimpiade dina taun 2005. Pemilihan éta tiasa disetujikeun ku penuh IOC dina pertemuan dina bulan Oktober di Copenhagen.
ref: Golf sareng rugby bakal balik deui kana Olimpiade. Komite Olimpiade Internasional milih kanggo ngalebetkeun cabang olahraga dina pasamoan déwan éksékutipna di Berlin poé ieu. Rugbi, hususna rugbi union, sarta golf dipilih ti 5 olahraga lainna pikeun ditimbang-timbang kanggo ngiringan Olimpiade. Olahraga squash, karaté, sareng sapatu roda diusahakeun lebet kana Olimpiade sapertos bésbol sareng softball, anu dikaluarkeun tina Pertandingan Olimpiade di taun 2005. Pamilihan sora masih kedah disahkeun ku sadaya anggota IOC dina rapat sasih Oktober di Copenhagen.

src: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.
mt: Arthur Guinness ngagabungkeun kontrak 9.000 taun pikeun pabrik St James' Gate di Dublin, Irlandia. 250 taun sabalikna, Guinness geus jadi bisnis global anu ngahasilkeun 10 miliar euro (US$14.7 miliar) saban taun.
ref: Kaping 24 Séptémber, 1759, Arthur Guinness nanda tangan kontrak salila 9000 taun keur St James' Gate Brewery di Dublin, Irlandia. 250 taun saterusna, Guinness geus maju jadi bisnis nu mendunia ngahasilkeun leuwih ti 10 milyar euro ($14.7 milyar) per taunna.

src: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France. France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.
mt: Strain panyakit burung anu fatal keur manusa, H5N1, geus dipastikeun nginfeksi burung liar anu mati, anu katempo dina Senen, di rawa deukeut Lyon di wétan Perancis. Perancis éta jadi negara ka-7 di Uni Eropa anu ngalaman virus éta; sanggeus Austria, Jérman, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Yunani sareng Italia. Kasus panyakit H5N1 anu dicurigake di Kroasia sareng Dénmark geus teu dipastikeun.
ref: Rupi flu manuk anu bahaya keur jalmi, H5N1, atos dipastikeun ngainféksi entog liar anu paéh, kapanggih dinten Senén, di ranca cakeut Lyon di daérah wétan Perancis. Prancis nyaéta negara katujuh di Uni Éropa anu ripuh ku panyawat ieu; nuturkeun Austria, Jérman, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Yunani, jeung Italy. Kasus H5N1 anu dicurigai di Kroasia jeung Denmark tetep teu ka konpirmasi.

src: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment. According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest. Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.
mt: Pasukan perdamaian PBB, anu datang ka Haiti sabada gempa bumi 2010, dihujatkeun pikeun ngababarkeun panyakit éta, anu dimimitian deukeut kana kamp pasukan. Menurut gugatan, tumpukan tina sampah ti kamp pasukan PBB teu diolah, nu nyebabkeun bakteri masuk ka sungai Artibonite, salah sahiji sungai panggedéna di Haiti. Sabalikna ti datangna pasukan, Haiti teu ngalaman masalah anu patali jeung panyakit éta ti abad ka-19. Institut Haiti pikeun Keadilan sareng Demokrasi ngabahas studi independen anu ngajakkeun yakin pikeun pasukan Nepalese ti PBB teu ngarasa pikeun ngababarkeun panyakit éta ka Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, pakar PBB ngeunaan panyakit éta, nyatakeun panyakit éta dijadikeun ku pasukan.
ref: Pasukan perdamaian PBB, anu dugi di Haiti saatos gempa taun 2010, janten disalahkeun ku sumebarna panyawat anu mimiti kapendak caket markas tentara. Numutkeun kana gugatan hukum, limbah ti markas PBB teu bener-bener dibersihkeun, nyaéta nu nyebabkeun baktéri asup ka susukan Artibonite, salah sahiji nu panggedena di Haiti. Sateuacan datangna pasukan, Haiti can pernah ngalaman masalah anu berhubungan jeung panyawat ieu ti saprak taun 1800an. Lembaga Haiti kanggo Kaadilan sarta Demokrasi atos ngarujuk studi independen anu ngusulkeun pangjaga katengtreman batalion UN Nepal nu tanpa sadar ngabantun panyakit eta ka Haiti. Danielle Lantage, pakar panyawat di PBB, nyarios yén ieu pandemi meureun disababkeun ku pasukan anu miara katengtreman.

src: "The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation. ""It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible"", said a government spokesperson. The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect."
mt: "Pamaréntah Irlandia ngaharapkeun urgenan ti parlemén pikeun ngarégulasi situasi éta. src: "Christopher Garcia, a spokesperson of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism. The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the ""O"" to read lowercase ""e""."
mt: Christopher Garcia, seseorang ti Departemen Polisi Los Angeles ngomongkeun, anu diduga ti laki-laki éta tiasa diselidiki pikeun ngalanggaran, teuas pikeun vandalisme. Tanda éta teuas kaganggu fisik; modifikasi éta dilakukeun ngagunakeun tarpaulin hitam anu dihias jeung tanda-tanda damai sareng hati pikeun ngaganti ""O"" jadi ""e"".
ref: "Christopher Garcia, juru carios Departemen Pulisi Los Angeles, nyatakeun bahwasana kasangka lalaki keur ditaliti kusabab anjeuna asup henteu ijin lain karna vandalisme. Tanda éta henteu ruksak bentukna mah; dibenerkeunna nyaéta nganggo terpal hideung anu dihias ku tanda perdamaian sareng hate pikeun ngubah aksara ""O"" janten aksara alit ""e""."

src: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career. In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class. Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor. He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged. A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'
mt: Karno nyaéta tutor basa Inggris nu kawentar tapi kontroversial anu ngajar di Modern Education sareng King's Glory anu ngarandapan 9,000 murid nalika karirna puncak. Dina catetanna éta, éta ngagunakeun katoan anu sababaraha ti tiur tiur, sareng katelahna ngagunakeun katoan kasar dina kelas. Modern Education ngarandapan éta ngagunakeun iklan anu gedé di bus tanpa izin sareng ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan éta ngarandapan é
ref: Karno nyaéta guru Basa Inggris anu kasohor nanging kontroversial anu ngajar dihandap Atikan Modéren sareng King's Glory anu disebut-sebut gaduh 9,000 murid di puncak karirna. Dina catetanana anjeunna nganggo kecap-kecap anu di anggap ku sababaraha kolot anu kurang ajar, sareng anjeunna di kabarkeun ngucapkeun kecap-kecap nu kotor di kelas. Atikan modéren nuduh anjeunna nyetak iklan anu ageung di bus-bus tanpa ijin sareng ngabohong ku ngaku-ngaku anjeunna ketua guru lés Bahasa Inggris. Anjeunna sateuacana atos pernah dituduh ngalanggar hak cipta saméméhna, tapi henteu dihukum. Hiji alumni nyaritakeun nyaeta manehna 'osok ngagunakeun bahasa santai, ngajarkeun carana bobogohan, jeung sapertos babaturan jang murid.'

src: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far. Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers. The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.
mt: Polisi Filipina anu geus teu aktif ngahijack bus turis Hong Kong di ibu kota Filipina, Manila. Rolando Mendoza ngepel senapan M16na ka turis. Sababaraha tahanan geus diselamatkeun jeung saurang tahanan geus dipastikeun tilar dunya. Enam tahanan, kaasup anak-anak jeung lansia, geus dilepaskan awal, sarta fotografer Filipina. Fotografer ngeunaan lansia anu perlu ke kamar mandi. Mendoza geus ditembak.
ref: Saurang tilas pulisi Filipina nahan para turis Hong Kong kalawan ngabajak beus maranehanana di Manila, puseur dayeuh Filipina. Rolando Mendoza nembakeun bedil M16 ka turis. Sababaraha sandra tos diselamatkeun jeung sahenteuna genep nu tos ka konpirmasi maot sajauh ieu. 6 sandera, kaasup barudak sareng kolot, dibebaskeun tipayun, sareng fotografer Filipina ogé  . Para fotografer ngagentos hiji awewe anu tos kolot kusabab anjeunna kedah ka cai. Mendoza maot dibedil.

src: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.
mt: Brazil nyaéta negara katutunan Katolik Roma panggedéna di bumi, jeung Gereja Katolik Roma ngalawan konsisten pikeun legalisasi pernikahan homoseksual di negara éta. Kongres Nasional Brazil ngadébat legalisasi pikeun 10 taun, jeung pernikahan sipil aya sajén di Rio Grande do Sul. Rancangan asli ditulis ku mantan walikota São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. Rancangan anu diubah, ayeuna di tangan Roberto Jefferson. Protester ngaharapkeun ngumpulkeun tanda tangan 1,2 juta pikeun dipresentasikeun ka Kongres Nasional di bulan November.
ref: Brasil mangrupikeun nagara Katolik Romawi pangageungna di Dunya, tur Garéja Katolik Romawi salawasna teu satuju pikeun ngesahkeun nikah sasama jinis di nagara éta. Kongrés nasional Brazil debat soal légalisasi geus 10 taun, jeung kawinan sipil samacam éta téh sah ngan di Rio Grande do Sul hungkul. Rancangan undang-undang nu aslina di kintunkeun ku walikota Sao Paolo nu lawas, Marta Suplicy. Panerapan nu diajukeun, sanggeus di obah, ayeuna aya di Roberto Jefferson. Anu protés ngaharepkeun tiasa ngumpulkeun 1,2 juta tandatangan jang petisi pikeun dikintunkeun ka Kongrés Nasional pas bulan Nopémber.

src: "Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other. I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them,"" Armand Versace said."

src: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say. Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.
mt: Angin badut, anu aya 645 mil (1040 km) kulon ti pulo-pulo Cape Verde, tiasa ngabubarkeun sebelum ngancam wewengkon daratan, para pambakal ngomong. Fred ayeuna ngadung angin 105 mil per jam (165 km/h) sareng ngalir ka arah barat daya. Fred nyaéta angin badut anu paling kuat anu pernah ditempatkeun ka jero jeung kulon di Atlantik ti pernahna pikeun ngamotkeun gambar satelit, jeung ngan tigas angin badut anu paling kuat anu pernah ditempatkeun ka jero jeung kulon di Atlantik ti 35°W.
ref: Badai na, anu kira-kira sakitar 645 mil (1040 km) di kuloneun pulo Cape Verde, sigana bakal leungit saacan nepi daratan, ceuk peramal cuaca. Fred ayeuna kecepatan anginna sakitar 105 mil per jam (165 km/jam) keur gerak ka kalér wétan. Fred téh nyaéta angin puyuh anu pangkuatna nu pernah aya palebah kidul jeung wétan di Atlantik samenjak muncul di satelit, jeung ogé badai nu katilu panggedéna di wétan 35 W.

src: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies. This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios. The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.
mt: Standar 802.11n ngalakukeunna di 2.4Ghz sareng 5.0Ghz. Ieu tiasa ngabenerkeunna kana 802.11a, 802.11b sareng 802.11g, asupan yen stasiun pangarangna ngaduakeun radio. Kecepatan 802.11n leuwih luhur ti saurangna, maksimal teori 600Mbit/s.
ref: 802.11 anu standar tiasa beroprasi dina frékuénsi 2.4 Ghz atawa 5.0 Ghz. Ieu bakal ngijinkeun éta ngabalik sareng bisa kangge 802.11a, 802.11b sareng 802.11g, upami stasiun utamana ngagaduhan dua radio. Kecepatan 802.11n jauh leuwih tereh tibatan pangheulana jeung hasil teoritis maksimum 600Mbit/s.

src: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies. This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios. The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.
mt: Standar 802.11n ngalakukeunna di 2.4Ghz sareng 5.0Ghz. Ieu tiasa ngabenerkeunna kana 802.11a, 802.11b sareng 802.11g, asupan yen stasiun pangarangna ngaduakeun radio. Kecepatan 802.11n leuwih luhur ti saurangna, maksimal teori 600Mbit/s.
ref: 802.11 anu standar tiasa beroprasi dina frékuénsi 2.4 Ghz atawa 5.0 Ghz. Ieu bakal ngijinkeun éta ngabalik sareng bisa kangge 802.11a, 802.11b sareng 802.11g, upami stasiun utamana ngagaduhan dua radio. Kecepatan 802.11n jauh leuwih tereh tibatan pangheulana jeung hasil teoritis maksimum 600Mbit/s.

src: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt. He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.
mt: Olimpiade medal emas nyaéta pikeun nyalamét 100m sareng 200m gaya bebas sareng dina tiga relay di Commonwealth Games, tapi sababna kana keluhuranna fitnessna teu bisa dipastikeun. Anjeunna teu bisa ngarobah obat-obat anu dibutuhkeun pikeun ngalawan keluhurana, sababna obat-obat éta teu bisa dipaké di acara éta.
ref: Juara medali emas Olimpiade dijadwalkeun ngojay bébas 100m sareng 200m jeung dina tilu relay di Commonwealth Games, tapi kusabab ngeluh, kabugaran awakna diragukeun. Anjeunna moal tiasa nginum obat-obatan anu diperyogikeun pikeun ngungkulan kanyeri kusabab dilarang di Pertandingan.

src: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera. Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.
mt: Kartu gempa internasional US Geological Survey ngalaporkeun yen aya gempa di Iceland dina minggu sadruka. Kantor Meteorologi Iceland ogé ngalaporkeun yen aya gempa di Hekla dina 48 jam sadruka. Aktivitas gempa nu ngabalukarkeun perubahan fase éta ngalakukeun dina 10 Maret di sisi timur laut kaldera puncak gunung. Awan gelap anu teu patali jeung aktivitas gunung api ngalaporkeun di dasar gunung. Awan éta tiasa ngabalukarkeun kebingungan anu ngahaja ngalakukeun gempa.
ref: Peta gempa internasional ti Survéi Geologi Amérika Serikat nunjukkeun henteu aya gempa di Islandia saminggu saméméhna. Kantor Météorologi Islandia ogé ngabarkeun teu aya lini di wilayah Hekla salami 48 jam kapengker. Gempa bumi anu gede pisan anu ngakibatkeun parobahan fase kajadian tina 10 Maret ti belah timur laut kaldera puncak gunung berapi. Awan poék anu teu aya hubunganna sareng dilaporkeun aktivitas gunung api katingali di dasar gunung. Awan nampilkeun poténsi pikeun ngabingungkeun naha letusan parantos kajantenan.

src: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole. Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.
mt: Orbiter bulan Chandrayaan-1 ngéject MIPna, anu ngahurutkeun di permukaan bulan dina 1,5 kilometer per detik (3000 mil per jam), sareng suksés ngalumpatkeun di deukeut kutub selatan bulan. Selain ngabawa tiga alat ilmiah anu penting, MIPna ogé ngabawa gambar bendera nasional India, anu dicat di sababaraha sisi.
ref: Kapal tanpa panumpang nu keur ngorbit ka bulan Chandrayaan-1 ngaluarkeun Moon Impact Probe (MIP), anu ngaluncur ngaléwatan dataran bulan ku kecepatan 1.5 kilométer per detik (3000 mil per jam), teras suksés mendarat dekeut kutub kidul bulan. Salain mawa tilu instrumen ilmiah anu penting, kapal penjelajah bulan mawa ogé gambar bendéra nagara India, anu dicet dina kabéh sisi.

src: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July. The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos. The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides. Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year. Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.
mt: Kasus pertama panyakit éta dina musim éta di laporkeun dina akhir Juli. Panyakit éta dihantam ku babi, anu lantas ngalir ka manusa lewat nyamuk. Panyakit éta ngabalukarkeun pamaréntah India ngalakukeun tindakan anu di antarana nyambungkeun babi di daérah anu kacida dipangaruakeun, ngabagi ribuan jendela nyamuk sareng ngabakar pestisida. Jutaan vial vaksin encephalitis ogé dijanjikeun ku pamaréntah, anu bakal ngahasilkeun agénsi kesehatan pikeun niatkeun pikeun taun deukeut. Rencana pikeun vaksin anu bakal dihantaran ka daérah anu kacida dipangaruakeun dina taun éta diundurkeun sabab kurang dana sareng pangurangan prioritasna ti panyakit-panyakit séjén.
ref: Kasus mimiti panyawat ieu di usum ieu dilaporkeun di ahir juli. Panyakit ieu téh di bawa ku bagong, teras ditularkeun ka manusa liwat reungit. Ieu bala téh ngabalukarkeun pamaréntah India kudu ngukur sumebarna di wilayah tukang bagong anu terdampak kalawan serius, ngirimkeun rébuan reungit sarta nyemprotkeun péstisida. Pamaréntah atos ngajangjian jutaan botol vaksin encephalitis, anu tiasa ngabantuan nyiapkeun kasehatan agensi warsih payun. Rencana penyaluran vaksin ka area anu paling terdampak sacara historis taun ieu katunda margi kurangna dana jeung handapna prioritas dibandingkeun jeung panyawat lainna.

src: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011. A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday. The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future. Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.
mt: Usulan amandemén éta geus leuwih lila dipaké ku sababaraha rumah dina taun 2011. Perubahan geus dilakukeun dina sidang legislatif ieu, nalika kalimat kadua dihapus dulu ku Rumah Duma sareng kemudian dipaké ku Senat Senin. Kegagalan kalimat kadua, anu ngajelaskeun pikeun ngabatasi hubungan sipil anu sarupa, bisa mungkin nyingkahan pintu pikeun hubungan sipil dina mangsa deukeut. Sanggeus prosés, HJR-3 bakal dipelajari deui ku legislatif anu ditunjuk dina 2015 atawa 2016 pikeun tetep dina prosés.
ref: Amandemen anu diusulkeun parantos sukses di dua dewan taun 2011. Hiji parobahan didamel dina sidang legislatif ieu pas kalimah kadua dihapus langkung tipayun ku DPR sarta saterasna disahkeun dina wangun sarupa ku Sénat Senen. Kagagalan kalimah kadua, anu badé ngalarang sarékat sipil kanggo sami jenis kelamin, tiasa muka panto kanggo sarékat sipil ka payunna. Saatos prosés éta, HJR-3 bakal ditinjau deui ku législatif anu kapilih salajengna di 2015 atanapi 2016 pikeun tetep dina prosés.

src: """Panama Papers"" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this. There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned."
mt: “Panama Papers” nyaéta istilah umum pikeun sababaraha sepuluh juta dokumén ti firma hukum Panamá Mossack Fonseca, nu dihélok ka pers di musim semi 2016. Dokumén éta ngalirkeun patung-patung 1200 perusahaan bantalan anu dipaké pikeun ngahindarkeun pajak sareng aturan séjénna. Surat kabar Britania The Guardian ngajanjikeun Deutsche Bank ngeuaskeun sababaraha sepertiga tina perusahaan bantalan éta. Aya protés di sakabéh dunya, sababaraha tuntutan hukum, sareng pimpinan pamaréntahan Islandia sareng Pakistan ogé turun.
ref: "Dokumen Panama"" nyaeta istilah pikeun kira-kira 10 juta dokumen ti Kantor Hukum Mossack Fonseca ti Panama, nu bocor ka wartawan pas musim semi 2016. Dokumen éta nunjukeun opat belas bank nu ngabantu klién beunghar nyumputkeun miliaran dollar kekayaan keur ngahindar ti pajak jeung kawajiban nu sanésna. Koran Inggris The Guardian nyarankeun Deutsche Bank ngontrol kira-kira sapertilu ti 1200 perusahaan shell kanggo ngagapai ieu. Protes lumangsung di sakumna dunya, sababaraha tuntutan kriminal, teras pamingpin pamaréntahan Islandia jeung Pakistani duanana mundur."

src: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.
mt: Kecelakaan udara umum di Iran, anu ngadegna armada nu geus tuanya sareng nu dipeliharaanana leuwih saeutik pikeun operasi sipil sareng militer. Sanksi internasional ngabalukarkeun yen armada anyar tiasa dipikirkeun. Dina dinten Senen, helikopter polisi tiguling, nu ngabalukarkeun tiga jalma tewas sareng tiga jalma luka. Dina bulan nu saméméhna, Iran ngalaman panyakit udara pangbadagna dina taunna, nalika pesawat udara ngalaman kecelakaan nalika ngalangkahkan ka Armenia, nu ngabalukarkeun 168 jalma tewas. Bulan nu saméméhna, pesawat udara ngalaman kecelakaan nalika ngalangkahkan ka Mashhad sareng ngalangkahkan ka dinding, nu ngabalukarkeun 17 jalma tewas.
ref: Kacilakaan udara téh umum di Iran, kusabab kapalna tos lami sareng teu bener-bener dirawat bade sipil atawa militér. Sanksi internasional mutuskeun heunteu meunang meser kapal anyar. Awal minggon ieu, hiji helikopter polisi ragrag anu nyebabkeun tilu jalmi maot jeung tilu séjénna luka-luka. Sasih kamari Iran ngalaman bencana hawa anu paling parah di sababaraha taun nalika hiji pesawat anu ngapung ka Arménia ragrag, maéhan 168 jalmi di jero pesawat. Bulan anu sami nempo airliner nu sejen nyerbu hiji landasan di Mashhad sareng nyerang témbok, maéhan tujuh belas.

src: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
mt: Grup studi Iraq ngalaporkeun laporan éta dina 12.00 GMT dina poé éta. Laporan éta ngamimitan ku pangajuan pikeun ngadébatan terbuka sareng ngadegkeun konsensus di Amerika Serikat ngeunaan politik ka Middle East. Laporan éta ngajajal hampir kabéh aspek tina politik préséntasi ti Éksekutip ka Iraq sareng ngajajal pikeun ngaganti arah dina waktu nu aya. Pangajuan pikeun ngadegkeun diplomasi anyar tina diplomasi ka Iraq sareng ngadegkeun hubungan diplomatik jeung tetangna éta di antara 78 rekomendasi éta.
ref: Kelompok Diajar Iraq maparkeun laporana tabuh 12.00 GMT dinten ieu. Ieu ngingetkeun yén teu aya 1 pun anu tiasa ngajamin yén tindakan di Irak dina waktos ayeuna bakal ngeureunkeun perang sekte, ningkatna kakerasan, atanapi ngageser kana huru hara. Laporan eta diawalan ku nyuhungkeun debat terbuka jeung formasi konsensus dina United States ngeunaan kebijakan keur Timur Tengah. Laporan éta kritis pisan ti hampir sadaya aspék ngeunaan kebijakan ti Eksekutif ka Irak jeung ngabutuhkeun perubahan arah anu geura. Salah sahiji ti 78 rékoméndasina nyaéta inisiatip diplomatik kedah dilaksanakeun saméméh akhir taun kanggo ngamankeun perwatesan Iraq ti serangan musuh sareng mulai deui hubungan diplomatik sareng nagara tatangga.

The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
mt: Grup studi Iraq ngalaporkeun laporan éta dina 12.00 GMT dina poé éta. Laporan éta ngamimitan ku pangajuan pikeun ngadébatan terbuka sareng ngadegkeun konsensus di Amerika Serikat ngeunaan politik ka Middle East. Laporan éta ngajajal hampir kabéh aspek tina politik préséntasi ti Éksekutip ka Iraq sareng ngajajal pikeun ngaganti arah dina waktu nu aya. Pangajuan pikeun ngadegkeun diplomasi anyar tina diplomasi ka Iraq sareng ngadegkeun hubungan diplomatik jeung tetangna éta di antara 78 rekomendasi éta.
ref: Kelompok Diajar Iraq maparkeun laporana tabuh 12.00 GMT dinten ieu. Ieu ngingetkeun yén teu aya 1 pun anu tiasa ngajamin yén tindakan di Irak dina waktos ayeuna bakal ngeureunkeun perang sekte, ningkatna kakerasan, atanapi ngageser kana huru hara. Laporan eta diawalan ku nyuhungkeun debat terbuka jeung formasi konsensus dina United States ngeunaan kebijakan keur Timur Tengah. Laporan éta kritis pisan ti hampir sadaya aspék ngeunaan kebijakan ti Eksekutif ka Irak jeung ngabutuhkeun perubahan arah anu geura. Salah sahiji ti 78 rékoméndasina nyaéta inisiatip diplomatik kedah dilaksanakeun saméméh akhir taun kanggo ngamankeun perwatesan Iraq ti serangan musuh sareng mulai deui hubungan diplomatik sareng nagara tatangga.

src: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54. The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.
mt: Judo Jepang Hitoshi Saito, pamenang dua medali emas Olimpiade, tilar dunya dina umur 54 taun. Penyebab tilar dunya éta nyaéta kanker saluran empedu. Éta tilar dunya di Osaka dina Senen. Salain jadi pemenang Olimpiade sareng juara dunya, Saito ogé jadi ketua komite pelatihan Judo Federasi Jepang nalika tilar dunya.
ref: Atlit judoka Jepang Hitoshi Saito, pinunjul dua medali emas Olimpiade, nilar dina umur 54 taun. Panyabab pupusna diumumkeun nyaéta kusabab kanker saluran émpedu intahepatic. Anjeunna pupus di Osaka dinten Salasa. Kitu oge urut jawara Olimpiade sarta Dunya, Saito nyaéta pupuhu komite palatihan Féderasi Judo Sakumna Jepang dina waktos pupusna.

src: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions. He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.
mt: Salila perjalanan éta, Iwasaki ngalaman masalah di tempat-tempat anu béda. Iwasaki dirampok ku bajak laut, diserang ku anjing rabies di Tibet, kabur nikah di Nepal sareng ditahan di India.
ref: Salila perjalanan na, Iwasaki ngalaman masalah dina seueur waktosna. Anjeunna dirampok ku bajak laut, diserang ku anjing anu gélo di Tibet, kabur ti pernikahan di Nepal jeung ditangkep di India.

src: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.
mt: Giancarlo Fisichella nyebabkeun mobilna tigil jeung balapan éta teu bisa dipungkasi. Rekan tim Fernando Alonso ngahasilkeun hasil paling luhur dina balapan, tapi teu bisa dipungkasi pas ngarobah ban. Michael Schumacher teu bisa dipungkasi pas ngarobah ban, sabab tibatan ngalawan dina balapan.
ref: Giancarlo Fisichella kaleungitan kendali mobilna sarta teu lila ereun balapna pas karak dimulai. Batur hiji timna Fernando Alonso anu mingpin sapanjang balapan, tapi akhirna eureun saatos pit-stop, kamungkinan disebabkeun ku roda hareupna tisoledad ka katuhu. Michael Schumacher ngabereskeun balapan teu  lami saatos Alonso, kusabab suspensi na rusak pas pertarungan di balapan eta.

src: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged. In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.
mt: Dina 3 bulan pungsi, leuwih ti 80 tahanan dirilis ti fasilitas pendaftaran tanpa dihukum. Dina bulan April ieu, tahanan sementara dihukumkeun ku hakim Glynn pikeun ngahukumkeun fasilitas pendaftaran pikeun ngahasilkeun rilis ti anu ditahan leuwih ti 24 jam tina masukna anu teu menerima pangadilan ku komisaris pangadilan. Komisaris pangadilan ngahukumkeun bai, jikakeun, sareng formalisasi hukuman anu dihukumkeun ku pejabat panghukum. Hukuman éta dijieun dina sistem komputer nagara anu kasusna dijalajah. Pangadilan ogé ngahukumkeun tanggal pikeun hak tahanan pikeun pangadilan leutik.
ref: Dina 3 sasih anu kapengker, langkung ti 80 tahanan dibebaskeun tina fasilitas Perpolahan Tengah tanpa biaya resmi. Dina sasih April taun ieu, paréntah keur penahanan sementara dikaluarkeun ku Hakim Glynn ka pasilitas éta pikeun ngabébaskeun jalmi-jalmi anu ditahan langkung ti 24 jam saatos panarimaan aranjeuna anu teu narima sidang ti komisaris pangadilan. Komisaris netepkeun jaminan, lamun dipasihan, teras ngaresmikeun tungtutan anu diajukeun ku patugas nu néwak. Tuduhan kasebat saterusna diasupkeun ka jero sistem komputer nagara bagian dimana kasus éta dilacak. Sidang ogé nandaan tanggal hak na tersangka pikeun diadili langkung gancang.

src: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election. Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.
mt: Lodin ogé ngomongkeun yen para pejabat ngabatalkeun pilihan dua pikeun ngabébaskeun warga Afganistan tina biaya sareng risiko keamanan pilihan deui. Diplomat ngomongkeun yen ieu ngalawan konstitusi Afganistan.
ref: Lodin ogé nyebutkeun yén para pajabat mutuskeun kanggo ngabolaykeun puteran kadua sangkan nyalametkeun urang Afghanistan tina resiko waragad sarta kaamanan pamilihan lianna. Diplomat nyatakeun bahwasana aranjeunna manggihan babaraha anu teu jelas dina konstitusi Afghanistan nu mutuskeun pamilihan salaku hiji hal nu teu perlu. Bareda jeung laporan tiheula anu nyaritakeun bahwa ngabatalkeun pamilihan bertentangan jeung konstitusi.

src: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed ""Political Agents"" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."
mt: “Dina 1947, Pakistan merdeka ti pamaréntahan Britania, presiden Pakistan ngahakmilan “Political Agents” pikeun ngurus FATA, anu ngahakmilan kontrol autonomi anu deukeut pikeun wewengkon éta. Agent-agent éta tiasa ngahakmilan kontrol pikeun pamaréntahan sareng jasa-jasa peradilan dina Pasal 247 Konstitusi Pakistan.”
ref: "Samenjak Pakistan merdeka ti kekuasaan Inggris di taun 1947, Presiden Pakistan nunjuk ""Agen Politik"" keur marintah FATA, anu ngalakuken kontrol otonom gede di daerah eta. Agén-agén ieu anu tanggung jawab kanggo nyadiakeun layanan pamaréntah sarta peradilan dumasar kana Pasal 247 Konstitusi Pakistan."

src: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.
mt: Film éta, anu ngamék Ryan Gosling sareng Emma Stone, menerima nominasi dina kabéh kategori. Gosling sareng Stone menerima nominasi pikeun Aktor sareng Aktris masing-masing. Nominasi séjénna ngan kabéh pikeun Film, Sutradara, Sinematografi, Desain Busana, Film-editing, Musik Asli, Desain Produksi, Editing Suara, Mixing Suara sareng Naskah Asli. Dua lagu ti film éta, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) sareng City of Stars, menerima nominasi pikeun lagu asli. Studio Lionsgate menerima 26 nominasi — leuwih ti studio séjénna.
ref: Film anu dibintangan ku Ryan Gosling jeung Emma Stone narima nominasi di babaraha kategori utama. Gosling sareng Stone masing-masing janten aktor sareng aktris terbaik. Nominasi séjén kaasup Pilem Panghadéna, Sutradara, Sinématografi, Rarancang Kostum, Pangropéa Pilem, Penata Musik, Rarancang Produksi, Pangropéa Sora, Adumanis Sora sarta Skénario Asli. 2 lagu tina filem, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) jeung City of Stars, meunang nominasi keur lagu asli nu pang alusna. Lionsgate Studio meunang 26 nominasi -- langkung ti studio nu lian na.

src: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.
mt: NHK ogé ngalaporkeun yen PLTN Kashiwazaki Kariwa di prefektur Niigata operasional biasa. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. ngalaporkeun teu aya efek ti panyebaran jeung reaktor 1 sareng 2 di PLTN Shika nyaéta ditutup. Di laporan éta, 9400 rumah di wewengkon éta teu bisa ngahasilkeun air jeung sakitar 100 rumah teu bisa ngahasilkeun listrik. Jalan-jalan di wewengkon éta teu bisa dipaké, layanan kereta api di wewengkon éta teu bisa dipaké, jeung bandara Noto di prefektur Ishikawa teu bisa dipaké.
ref: NHK ngalaporkeun pembangkit listrik tenaga nuklir Kashiwazaki Kariwa di Niigata Prefektur beroperasi normal. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. ngalaporkeun teu aya pangaruh ti lini eta sareng réaktor Nomer 1 sarta 2 di pembangkit listrik tanagi nuklir Shika ditutup. Dilaporkeun yén kira-kira 9400 imah di daérah éta teu aya cai jeung sakitar 100 teu aya listrik. Sajumlah jalan rusak, layanan karéta pegat di daerah-daerah nu kapangaruh, jeung Bandara Noto di Prefektur Ishikawa ogé tetep ditutup.

mt: NHK ogé ngalaporkeun yen PLTN Kashiwazaki Kariwa di prefektur Niigata operasional biasa. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. ngalaporkeun teu aya efek ti panyebaran jeung reaktor 1 sareng 2 di PLTN Shika nyaéta ditutup. Di laporan éta, 9400 rumah di wewengkon éta teu bisa ngahasilkeun air jeung sakitar 100 rumah teu bisa ngahasilkeun listrik. Jalan-jalan di wewengkon éta teu bisa dipaké, layanan kereta api di wewengkon éta teu bisa dipaké, jeung bandara Noto di prefektur Ishikawa teu bisa dipaké.
ref: NHK ngalaporkeun pembangkit listrik tenaga nuklir Kashiwazaki Kariwa di Niigata Prefektur beroperasi normal. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. ngalaporkeun teu aya pangaruh ti lini eta sareng réaktor Nomer 1 sarta 2 di pembangkit listrik tanagi nuklir Shika ditutup. Dilaporkeun yén kira-kira 9400 imah di daérah éta teu aya cai jeung sakitar 100 teu aya listrik. Sajumlah jalan rusak, layanan karéta pegat di daerah-daerah nu kapangaruh, jeung Bandara Noto di Prefektur Ishikawa ogé tetep ditutup.

src: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.
mt: Berita, menurut kebocoran, bakal ngabahas masalah perbatasan, anu Palestina ngarasa perlu didasarkeun di batas sebelum Perang Tengah Timur 1967. Topik séjén anu bakal dibahas ngabahas ngeunaan kota suci Yerusalem anu sakral pikeun kedua bangsa sareng masalah lembah Yordan. Israel ngajajahkeun presensi militer anu tetep di lembah Yordan pikeun sepuluh taun sasampurna perjanjian ditandatangani sementara PA setuju pikeun meninggalkan presensi anu tetep pikeun lima taun.
ref: Dokumen éta, ceuk warta anu bocor, bakal patali kana pasalisihan wates nagara, anu dipikahoyong ku Palestina dumasar kana wates saméméh Perang Timur Tengah 1967. Topik-topik sanes anu dicakup ngalaporkeun kaasup oge kaayaan masa anu bakal sumping ti Yerusalem anu sakral kanggo kadua nagara sareng masalah Jordan Valley. Israél nungtut neraskeun ayana militér di lebak salami sapuluh taun saatos perjanjian na ditanda tangan nalika PA satuju keur ninggalkeun ayana militer ngan ukur lima taun.

src: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."
mt: Ma lahir di Hong Kong, Ma ngalajari di New York University sareng Harvard Law School sareng saban waktu ngadamel kartu permanen warga Amerika ""green card"". Hsieh ngimplikeun dina pilihan umumna yen Ma tiasa ngalakukeun kabur ti nagara nalika waktu krisis. Hsieh ogé ngajakkeun yen Ma nyaéta style tibatan substansi. Dina sababaraha pangacaraan, Ma tiasa ngalakukeun kana platform anu ngaharapkeun hubungan anu leuwih deukeut jeung daratan Cina.
ref: "Babar di Hong Kong, Ma kuliah di Universitas New York sareng Institut Hukum Harvard teras pernah gaduh ""green card"", nyaéta ijin linggih salamina di Amerika. Hsieh nyiratkeun nalika pamilihan éta Ma  panginten kabur ninggalkeun nagara salila krisis éta. Hsieh ogé nyatakeun yén Ma anu fotogénik téh langkung gaya wungkul tibatan watak aslina. Sanajan beunang tuduhan-tuduhan eta, Ma meunang babari di platform anu ngadukung hubungan anu leuwih deukeut ka daratan Cina."
