src: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.
mt: Kaputusan éta ditetepkeun ku para warga nu ngadatangkeun tanda tangan pikeun ngadatangkeun bantuan hukum pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun ngadatangkeun pikeun
ref: Saatos katingali seueur kulawarga anu néangan bantuan hukum keur ngalawan pangusiran, hiji rapat diayakeun kaping 20 Maret di East Bay Community Law Center keur korban panipuan padumukan. Nalika nu nyéwa nyaritakeun anu tos kajadian ka aranjeuna, seseueurna kulawargi nu kaajak nyadar upami Carolyn Wilson ti OHA parantos maok acis jaminan aranjeuna, teras kabur wéh ka luar kota. Panyewa di Lockwood Gardens percaya yén aya kamungkinan 40 atawa leuwih kulawarga nu nyanghareupan pangusiran, sabab aranjeunna terang yén pulisi OHA ogé nalungtik perumahan umum di Oakland nu tiasa kajiret dina panipuan perumahan.

src: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.
mt: Pasusulan balapan, Keselowski tetep jadi pamimpin pikeun juara penerbangan 2,250 poin. Tujuh poin di belakangna, Johnson jadi urut kadua 2,243. Dina urut ketiga, Hamlin 20 poin di belakang, tapi lima di depanna Bowyer. Kahne sareng Truex, Jr. jadi urut kelima sareng urut keenam 2,220 sareng 2,207 poin. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, sareng Harvick ngabentuk urut-urutan top-ten pikeun juara penerbangan sareng masih aya opat balapan anu teu dipungkas.
ref: dinu balap eta, Keselowski jadi pamuncak Drivers' Championship ku 2,250 poin Tinggaleun tujuh poin, Johnson aya di urutan ka dua kalawan 2,243. Di urutan katilu, Hamlin katinggaleun dua puluh poin, tapi lima poin payuneun Bowyer. Kahne sareng Truex, Jr. aya di urutan kalima sareng kagenep, masing masing tos ngempelkeun 2.220 sareng 2.207 poin. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, sareng Harvick ngeusian posisi sapuluh besar di Kejuaraan Balap anu dimana aya keneh sesa opat kali balap deui di musim ieu.

src: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.
mt: Hal ieu dipikanyaho jadi kalima kalina dina sejarah, manéhna ngalaman bahan kimia anu dipastikeun jadi bahan martian jatuh ka Bumi. Dari 24,000 meteorit anu dipastikeun jatuh ka Bumi, ngan 34 anu dipastikeun jadi bahan martian. 15 tina bahan éta dipakékeun pikeun hujan meteorite dina bulan Juli. Beberapa bahan, anu teu asak di Bumi, dipasarekeun ti US$11,000 ka $22,500 per ounce, anu ngan 10 kali leuwih mahal ti harga emas.
ref: Ieu dipercaya janten kalima kalina dina sajarah yén jalma-jalma parantos diperhatoskeun naon bahan kimia mars anu dikonfirmasi turun ka Bumi. Ti kira-kira 24,000 météorit anu dipikanyaho tos labuh ka Bumi, ngan kira-kira 34 anu atos dipastikeun asalna ti Mars. Lima belas batu ieu teh mangrupikeun hasil tina hujan meteor di bulan Juli kamari. Sababaraha batu, anu jarang pisan aya di Bumi, tiasa dijual ti $11,000 AS dugi ka $22,500 per ons-na, sakitar sapuluh kali lipet ti harga emas.

src: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.
mt: Schumacher anu nyerahkeun diri taun 2006 sanggeus ngalakonan kana juara Formula 1 sapuluh kali, anu bakal ngagantikeun Felipe Massa anu luka beurat dina kepalana. Massa lila bakal ngalakonan saripta musim 2009.
ref: Schumacer anu pénsiun di taun 2006 saatos kéngingkeun kajawaraan Formula 1 7 kali, dijadwalkeun ngagentos Felipe Massa anu nuju cilaka. Pembalap Brasil cilaka parah tina sirah saatos tabrakan dina pahelatan Hungarian Grand Prix 2009. Massa diperkirakeun teu ngiringan sahenteuna usum 2009.

src: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.
mt: Saméméhna, AOL tiasa ngalakukeun jeung ngagunakeun pasar IM dina tempo anu bebas, alatan panggunaan éta leuwih loba di Amerika Serikat. Dina aranjean ieu, kebebasan éta bisa pungkasan. Jumlah pangguna Yahoo! sareng Microsoft bisa ngahampir jumlah pangguna AOL.
ref: Dugi ka ayeuna, AOL parantos ngagerakeun sareng ngembangkeun pasar IM ku lajuna nyalira, kusabab dianggé ku saantéro Amérika Serikat. Kusabab panataan éta, kabébasan ieu téh kamungkinan bakal moal aya deui. Jumlah nu nganggo Yahoo! sareng Microsoft anu digabungkeun bakal saingan sareng jumlah pelanggan AOL.

Kusabab panataan éta, kabébasan ieu téh kamungkinan bakal moal aya deui. Jumlah nu nganggo Yahoo! sareng Microsoft anu digabungkeun bakal saingan sareng jumlah pelanggan AOL.

src: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.
mt: Kapal bom mobil meledug di kantor polisi di Gaziantep, Turki dina pagi hari tadi, nu nyebabkeun dua polisi tewas sareng lapan puluh dua jalma lianna luka. Kantor gubernur ngalaporkeun lapan puluh dua jalma tadi polisi. Polisi ngalaporkeun yen tukang daftar Daesh (ISIL) anu dipercaya tiasa jadi tukang bertanggung jawab pikeun aksénan éta.
ref: Hiji bom mobil diledakeun dina markas pulisi di Gaziantep, Turki kamari isuk, maehan 2 patugas pulisi sareng nyilakakeun langkung ti duapuluh jalmi nu sanes. Kantor gubernur nyatakeun salapan belas jalmi anu cidera téh nyaéta aparat pulisi. Polisi nyarios aranjeunna curiga ka tersangka militan Daesh (ISIL) anu bertanggung jawab dina serangan éta.

src: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.
mt: Gubernur Massachusetts mitra Mitt Romney ngalakukeun pilihan umum partéi Républikan Florida dina Rabu jeung ngahasilkeun 46 persén ti suara. Mantan Ketua Rapat Umum Amerika Serikat Newt Gingrich datang dina urut kadua jeung 32 persén. Sebagian ti 50 delegasi Florida ngahasilkeun pilihan umum, ngahasilkeun Romney jadi deui pilihan umum partéi Républikan.
ref: Tilas gubernur Massachusetts Mitt Romney meunang pemilu présiden partai republik Florida dina dinten salasa kalawan langkung ti 46 persén soanten. Urut juru ngomong Gedung Putih Newt Gingrich aya di posisi kadua ku 32 persen. Salaku nagara bagéan anu unggul, Florida nyandak lima puluh atlitna ka Romney, ngadorong anjeunna maju janten calon anu pangpayuna pikeun nominasi Partéi Républik.

src: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."
mt: "Pamimpin DPR lama Newt Gingrich, gubernur Texas Rick Perry, sareng anggota DPR Michele Bachmann finis di urut-urutan katilu, katelung sareng katujuh. Pas hasilna keluar, Gingrich ngabéntang Santorum, tapi ngadéngékeun Romney, anu di mana ieu kampanye negatifna dipakékeun di Iowa ka Newt Gingrich. Perry ngabéntang yen "Aku bakal balik ka Texas pikeun ngabéntang hasilna ti kampanye éta, ngabéntang apa anu jalma bisa ngalakukeun di jalma-jalma ieu pilihan", tapi sabalikna nyarios yen "Aku bakal tetep ngalakukeun di jalma-jalma ieu sareng ngalakukeun di pilihan South Carolina tanggal 21 Januari."
ref: "Tilas ketua DPR New Gingrich, Gubernur Texas Rick Perry, jeung anggota kongres Michelle Bachmann masing-masing diurutan ka opat, lima, jeung ka genep. Saatos hasilna kaluar, Gingrich muji Santorum, tapi anjeunna rada ambek ka Romney kusabab iklan nu ngagogoréngna disiarkeun di Iowa ngalawan Gingrich. Perry nyatakeun bahwa anjeunna bakal ""balik deui ka texas ker nganilai hasil kaukus wengi ieu, nentukeun upami aya jalan keur anjeunna dina pamilihan ieu"", tapi salajeungna anjeunna nyarios bakal tetep dina pamilihan éta jeung berjuang di kaping 21 Januari keur pamilihan Carolina Kidul. Bachmann, anu meunang dina jajak panyawang Ames Straw bulan Agustus, mutuskeun pikeun ngeureunkeun kampanyeuna."

src: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."
mt: "Pamimpin DPR lama Newt Gingrich, gubernur Texas Rick Perry, sareng anggota DPR Michele Bachmann finis di urut-urutan katilu, katelung sareng katujuh. Pas hasilna keluar, Gingrich ngabéntang Santorum, tapi ngadéngékeun Romney, anu di mana ieu kampanye negatifna dipakékeun di Iowa ka Newt Gingrich. Perry ngabéntang yen "Aku bakal balik ka Texas pikeun ngabéntang hasilna ti kampanye éta, ngabéntang apa anu jalma bisa ngalakukeun di jalma-jalma ieu pilihan", tapi sabalikna nyarios yen "Aku bakal tetep ngalakukeun di jalma-jalma ieu sareng ngalakukeun di pilihan South Carolina tanggal 21 Januari."
ref: "Tilas ketua DPR New Gingrich, Gubernur Texas Rick Perry, jeung anggota kongres Michelle Bachmann masing-masing diurutan ka opat, lima, jeung ka genep. Saatos hasilna kaluar, Gingrich muji Santorum, tapi anjeunna rada ambek ka Romney kusabab iklan nu ngagogoréngna disiarkeun di Iowa ngalawan Gingrich. Perry nyatakeun bahwa anjeunna bakal ""balik deui ka texas ker nganilai hasil kaukus wengi ieu, nentukeun upami aya jalan keur anjeunna dina pamilihan ieu"", tapi salajeungna anjeunna nyarios bakal tetep dina pamilihan éta jeung berjuang di kaping 21 Januari keur pamilihan Carolina Kidul. Bachmann, anu meunang dina jajak panyawang Ames Straw bulan Agustus, mutuskeun pikeun ngeureunkeun kampanyeuna."

src: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."
mt: “Situs stasiun web ngarangkeun acara éta minangka “radio teater kuna jeung spin anyar jeung gejala anu ngawerang!”. Dina awalna, acara éta dipintonkeun di situs radio internet TogiNet Radio, situs anu fokusna di radio tawar. Dina akhir 2015, TogiNet ngadegkeun AstroNet Radio minangka stasiun anak. Acara éta asalna ngagunakeun aktor suara amatir, lokal di East Texas.
ref: "Stasiun radio eta ngagambarkeun pintonan eta minangka ""teater radio sakola sepuh kalawan puteran culun anu anyar sarta kabina-bina!"" Mimitina, program ieu ngan ukur disiarkeun dina situs radio internet TogiNet Radio anu parantos lami mengudara, éta teh situs anu difokuskeun kana radio wicara. Dina ahir 2015, Toginet ngadegkeun Astronet Radio minangka stasiun anak parusahaan. Acarana mimitina nampilkeun palaku sora pemula, wargi lokal Texas wétan."

src: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.
mt: Para penyerang Mumbai datang ku kapal ngeunaan 26 Nopémber 2008, ngahabarkan jeungna kitu bahan peledak, senjata otomatis sareng ngahit objek-objek anu loba di antarana stasion kereta api Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus sareng hotel Taj Mahal. David Headley ngumpulkeun informasi sareng ngumpulkeun informasi anu tiasa ngabantu operasi ku 10 penyerang ti grup militan Pakistan Laskhar-e-Taiba. Serangan éta ngabalukarkeun tekanan anu loba antara India sareng Pakistan.
ref: Penyerang Kota Mumbai dugi pikeun kapal dina kaping 26 November 2008, mawa granat Jeung senjata otomatis pikeun nembak loba target kaasup ririungan dina stasiun karéta api Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus sareng hotel kakoncara Hotel Taj Mahal. Tenjoan sareng pangumpulan informasi ti David Headley ngabantosan berlangsungna operasi panembakan ku 10 jagal tembak ti grup militan Pakistan anu gaduh nami Laskhar-e-Taiba. Serangan éta nempatkeun tekanan anu gedé dina hubungan India jeung Pakistan.

src: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. src: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.
mt: Salila pekan lalaki, Naked News ngabéntangan yén manéhna bakal nambahkeun mandat basa internasionalna pikeun ngababarkeun berita, jeung tiga program anyar. Manéhna geus ngababarkeun berita dina basa Inggris sareng Jepang, organisasi global éta bakal ngaluncurkeun program berita dina basa Spanyol, Italia, sareng Koréa, pikeun televisi, web, sareng perangkat mobile.
ref: Minggu kamari, Naked News nyebarkeun yén aranjeunna bakal seueur ningkatkeun mandat basa internasional kanggo pelaporan berita, kalawan tilu siaran anyar. Saatos ngalaporkeun dina basa Inggris sareng Jepang, organisasi dunya ayeuna nerbitkeun program basa Spanyol, Itali, sareng Koréa, pikeun tipi, situs, sareng télpon sélulér.

src: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.
mt: Salajengna, Carpanedo ngalakukeun dua lomba individu di Kejiranan éta. Lomba kahijina nyaéta Slalom, anu hasilna nyaéta Did Not Finish dina runna mungkana. 36 tina 116 kompetitor anu hasilna ieu dina lomba éta. Lomba séjénna, Giant Slalom, Carpanedo ngahasilkeun urutan ka-10 dina grup perempuan dina runna kombinasi 4:41.30, 2:11.60 menit leuwih lila ti pamenangna, Claudia Loesch ti Austria, sareng 1:09.02 menit leuwih lila ti urutan ka-9, Gyöngyi Dani ti Hungaria. Empat atlit perempuan dina grup dina Giant Slalom gagal ngahasilkeun runna, sareng 45 tina 117 total atlit dina Giant Slalom gagal ngahasilkeun urutan dina lomba éta.
ref: Di luar acara dinten Rebo, Carpanedo ngiluan 2 balapan peorangan di Kejuaraan. Mimitian keur anjeunna nyaeta Slalom, dimana anjeunna teu nepi akhir dina balapan mimitina. 36 ti 116 peserta nu sanes nampi hasil nu sami di balapan eta. Dina pertandingan nu sanés, Giant Slalom, katingal anjeunna réngsé di tempat kasapuluh kalayan waktos gabungan sakabeh pertandingan 4:41.30, 2:11.60 menit langkung laun ti juara kahiji Austrian Claudia Loesch jeung 1:09.02 menit ti juara kasalapan Gyöngyi Dani nu dongkap ti Hungaria. Opat pemaén ski di grup istri téh gagal ngaréngsékeun lombana, teras 45 ti sadaya 117 pemaén teu kéngéng peringkat di perlombaan éta.

src: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.
mt: Di Rabu, Liga Baskét Profesional Amerika Serikat (NBA) ngadropkeun musimna ti alasan pati ngeunaan COVID-19. Keputusan NBA diikuti ku pemain Utah Jazz nu positif COVID-19.
ref: Dina Rebo, Persatuan Bola Basket Amerika Serikat (NBA) nunda musim baskét ahli margi prihatin ngeunaan COVID-19. Kaputusan NBA ieu kusabab hasil tes pamaen Utah Jazz anu positif beunang virus COVID-19.

src: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.
mt: Jiwa Pamaén Dina Poé éta nyaéta Alex Ovechkin ti Washington Capitals. Anjeunna ngahasilkeun 2 gol sareng 2 asist dina kamenangan Washington 5-3 ngalawan Atlanta Thrashers. Asist Ovechkin anu kahiji dina poé éta nyaéta asist pikeun gol pamungkas ti rookie Nicklas Backstrom; gol anu kahijina dina poé éta nyaéta gol ka-60na dina musim éta, anu jadi gol ka-60na dina musim anu paling luhur ti 1995-96, nalika Jaromir Jagr sareng Mario Lemieux masing-masing ngahasilkeun gol ka-60na.
ref: Pamaen Dinten ieu nyaeta Alex Ovechkin ti Washington Capitals. Anjeunna nyétak 2 gol sareng 2 bantosan dina kamenangan 5-3 Washington ka Atlanta Thrashers. Umpat mimiti Ovechkin's di pertandingan wengi ieu nyaéta gol kameunangan ku pemaén muda Nicklas Backstrom; Gol kadua anjeunna éta téh gol ka 60 anjeunna di musim ieu, anjeunna janten pamaén kahiji anu nyetak 60 gol langkung dina samusim ti saprak 1995 - 96, anu kantos oge diraih ku Jaromir Jagr sareng Mario Lemieux.

src: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.
mt: Bank Northern Rock geus di nasionalisasi dina taun 2008 sabada diungkapkeun yen perusahaan éta geus menerima bantuan darurat ti pamaréntah Inggris. Northern Rock geus butuh bantuan sababna perusahaan éta geus terkena krisis hipotek subprime dina taun 2007. Sir Richard Branson grup Virgin geus ngajadikeun tawaran pikeun bank éta sabada bank éta di nasionalisasi. Dina taun 2010, sabada di nasionalisasi, bank Northern Rock plc geus dipisahkeun ti perusahaan asset management Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin geus ngajadikeun tawaran pikeun bank Northern Rock, teu perusahaan asset management éta.
ref: Bank Northern Rock parantos dinasionalisasi di taun 2008 saatos bewara lamun pausahaan nampi dukungan darurat ti Pamaréntah Inggris Raya. Batu Kaler parantos ngabutuhkeun dukungan kusabab paparanna nalika krisis hipotek subprima taun 2007. Grup Budha Sir Richard Branson ngalebetkeun tawaran kanggo bank anu ditolak sateuacan nasionalisasi bank. Taun 2010, nalika dinasionalisasi, bank jalan raya Northern Rock  Plc ayeuna dipisahkeun ti 'bank jahat', Northern Rock (Manajémen Asét). Virgin ngan ngagaleuh 'bank anu saé' di Northern Rock, sanes perusahaan manajemén asét.

src: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.
mt: Bank Northern Rock geus di nasionalisasi dina taun 2008 sabada diungkapkeun yen perusahaan éta geus menerima bantuan darurat ti pamaréntah Inggris. Northern Rock geus butuh bantuan sababna perusahaan éta geus terkena krisis hipotek subprime dina taun 2007. Sir Richard Branson grup Virgin geus ngajadikeun tawaran pikeun bank éta sabada bank éta di nasionalisasi. Dina taun 2010, sabada di nasionalisasi, bank Northern Rock plc geus dipisahkeun ti perusahaan asset management Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin geus ngajadikeun tawaran pikeun bank Northern Rock, teu perusahaan asset management éta.
ref: Bank Northern Rock parantos dinasionalisasi di taun 2008 saatos bewara lamun pausahaan nampi dukungan darurat ti Pamaréntah Inggris Raya. Batu Kaler parantos ngabutuhkeun dukungan kusabab paparanna nalika krisis hipotek subprima taun 2007. Grup Budha Sir Richard Branson ngalebetkeun tawaran kanggo bank anu ditolak sateuacan nasionalisasi bank. Taun 2010, nalika dinasionalisasi, bank jalan raya Northern Rock  Plc ayeuna dipisahkeun ti 'bank jahat', Northern Rock (Manajémen Asét). Virgin ngan ngagaleuh 'bank anu saé' di Northern Rock, sanes perusahaan manajemén asét.

src: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.
mt: Keputusan Mr. Rudd pikeun nandatangkeun perjanjian iklim Kyoto nyebabkeun AS, anu kini jadi negara nu paling ngawinangna, teu nandatangkeun perjanjian éta. Pamaréntah konservatif Australia tina jaman sadia teu nandatangkeun Kyoto, anu ngarandapan pikeun ékonomi jeung kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana kana
ref: Kaputusan Pak Rudd pikeun nandatangan perjanjian iklik Kyoto ngasingkeun Amerika Serikat, anu ayeuna bakal janten hiji-hijina nagara maju anu henteu ngaratifikasi perjanjian eta. Tilas pamaréntahan konservatif Australia nampik kanggo meratifikasi Kyoto, nyarios yén éta bakal ngaruksak ékonomi kalawan kagumantungan anu ageung kana ékspor batubara, sedengkeun nagara sapertos India sareng Tiongkok henteu terikat ku udagan émisi.

src: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.
mt: Penembak dina uji coba pencegahan hama tambahan bakal dipaténan ku rangers, saperti uji coba éta dipaténan sareng diévaluasi kana kawasana. Dina hiji patungan antara NPWS sareng Asosiasi Penembak Olahraga Australia (NSW) Inc, volunteer nu kualifikasi dipilih, dina program olahraga penembak Asosiasi. Menurut Mick O'Flynn, Direktur Park Aktif jeung Warisan jeung NPWS, penembak opat nu dipilih pikeun operasi penembakan munggaran menerima instruksi aman sareng pelatihan nu komprehensif.
ref: Panémbak dina uji cobi pengendalian hama tambahan kedah diawasi sacara heureut ku penjaga, margi uji cobi dipantau sareng épektivitasna dinilei. Dina kamitraan NPWS jeung Asosiasi Penembak Olahraga Australia (NSW) Inc., relawan anu nyumponan syarat direkrut di bawah program perburuan Asosiasi Penembak Olahraga. Nurutkeun Mick O'Flynn, Direktur Palaksana Perlindungan Taman jeung Pusaka sareng NOWS, 4 panémbak nu atos dipilih kanggo operas panémbakan nu kahiji téh tos nampi wawaran kanggo kaamanan sareng atos dilatih ogé.

src: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."
mt: “Dumasar fosil ieu, éta ngabédakeunna leuwih awal ti anu dipikanyaho ku bukti molekuler. Ieu ngajadikeun sababaraha hal pikeun diulang,” nyarios Berhane Asfaw, peneliti di Rift Valley Research Service di Éthiopia sareng penulis jajak ieu.
ref: "Dumasarkeun fosil iyeu, berarti pamisahanna leuwih awal tibatan anu ditunjukkeun ku bukti molekuler. Éta hartosna sadayana kedah dipulangkeun,"" saur panaliti di Layanan Panalungtikan Rift Valley di Étiopia sareng salah sahiji panulis panalungtikan, Berhane Asfaw."

src: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.
mt: Dina pintonan keynote dina acara Tokyo Game Show, presiden Nintendo Satoru Iwata ngababarkeun desain kontroler pikeun konsol anyar Nintendo Revolution. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.
ref: Dina presentasi poe Kemis ku Tokyo Game Show, presiden Nintendo Satoru Iwata ngaluarkeun desain pengontrol kanggo konsol Nintendo Revolution anu anyar. Sarupa jeung remot TV, pangontrol make dua sensor anu aya di deukeut pangguna TV pikeun ngukur posisina dina ruangan tilu dimensi. Ieu bakal nyieun pamaén ngendalikeun tindakan sareng gerakan na dina pidéo gém ku cara ngalihkeun alat na ka udara.

src: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.
mt: Berita awal ti Xinhua China ngalaporkeun kapalna dihijak. Berita ngejelaskeun kapalna dihijak tiasa ngalap ancaman bom sareng diarahkeun balik ka Afghanistan, anu mendarat di Kandahar. Berita awal ngalaporkeun kapalna dihijak tiasa diarahkeun balik ka Afghanistan pas kapalna ditolak pendaratan darurat di Ürümqi.
ref: Sateuacanna, media berita Cina, Xinhua, ngalaporkeun bakal aya kapal anu dibajak. Laporan anyar nyatakeun yén pesawat nampi ancaman bom ku kituna penerbangan  dialihkeun deui ka Afghanistan sareng pesawat kasebut ngadarat di Kandahar. Laporan saacanna nyebarkeun bahwa kapal eta dibalikkeun deui ka Afganistan pas beres ditolak keur mendarat darurat di Urumqi.

src: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""
mt: "Dina dinten Senen, Sara Danius, sekretaris permanén komite Nobel pikeun sastra di Akademi Swédia, ngumumkeun publik di program radio di Sveriges Radio di Swédia, komite, teu bisa nyambung jeung Bob Dylan langsung ngeunaan pikeun ngabéntangan hadiah Nobel pikeun sastra 2016, teu ngalakukeun upaya pikeun nyambung jeung éta. Danius ngomong, ""Sekarang kana kami teu ngalakukeun apa-apa. Saya ngajak sareng ngirim email ka kolaborator paling deukeutna sareng menerima jawaban nu sangat ramah. Pikeun sekarang, ieu kana pasti cukup."""
ref: "Dinten Senén, Sara Danius, sekretaris permanén Komite Nobel pikeun Sastra di Akademi Swedia, umum diumumkeun salila hiji program radio dina Sveriges Radio di Swedia nu panitia, teu tiasa ngahontal langsung Bob Dylan ngeunaan unggul 2016 Nobel Prize dina karya Sastra, geus ditinggalkeun usaha anak pikeun ngahontal manéhna. Danius nyarios, ""Ayeuna urang henteu ngalakukeun nanaon. Abdi parantos nelepon jeung ngirim surél ka kolaborator anu pangdeketna jeung anjeunna sareng waleranna téh soméah pisan. Kanggo ayeuna, éta cekap."""

src: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""
mt: “Pamimpin AS George W. Bush ngabersiksa kabébasan éta. Pamimpin Bush Gordon Johndroe ngabersiksa Korea Kalér “”sanggeusna jadi langkah nu gedé pikeun tujuan ngabersiksa denuclearisasi Korea Kalér nu bisa dipastikeun.””
ref: "Presiden Amerika Serikat George W. Bush ngabageakeun bewara éta. Juru bicara Bush Gordon Johndroe nyebut yen jangji Korea Utara ""lengkah anu mantep pikeun tujuan denuklirisasi semenanjung Korea anu bisa diverifikasi."""

src: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."
mt: "Dina taun 1956 Słania pindah ka Swédia, di mana tiga taun sabalikna dia mulai kerja pikeun Kantor Pos Swédia sareng jadi pamimpin paharja. Dia ngahasilkeun leuwih ti 1.000 stempel pikeun Swédia sareng 28 negara séjénna. Karya éta nyaéta kualitas anu diakui sareng rinci, nyaéta dia salah sahiji tina nu ngahasilkeun stempel anu jadi "nama rumah" di antara filatelist. Beuratna ngahasilkeun stempel 1.000 nyaéta "Great Deeds by Swedish Kings" ku David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl dina taun 2000, anu dipikawanoh ku Guinness Book of World Records. Dia ogé dipaké pikeun ngaharja banknote di sakabéh negara, conto anyar tina karya éta nyaéta potret Perdana Menteri di depan uang kanada $5 sareng $100."
ref: "Dina 1956 Slaina ngalih ka Swedia, dimana 3 taun saatosna téh anjeun mimiti damel di kantor pos Swedia sareng janten tukang ngukir utama anjeunna. Anjeunna ngahasilkeun langkung ti 1,000 perangko kanggo Swedia sarta 28 nagara lianna. Karyana gaduh kualitas sareng rinci anjeunna mangrupikeun 1 ti sababaraha nu lain ""ngaran somah"" di antara philatelists. Sababaraha ngahususkeun pikeun ngumpulkeun pagawéanna nyalira. Perangkona anu ka 1.000 nyaéta ""Perlakuan Hadé Raja Swedia"" anu luar biasa ku David Klocker Ehrenstrahl di 2000, anu lebet ka daftar Buku Rékor Dunya Guinness. Anjeunna ogé kallebet dina ngukir artos kanggo sababaraha nagara, salah sahiji contona nyaéta gambar perdana menteri dina payun artos $5 sareng $100 dollar Kanada anu anyar."

src: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.
mt: 800 mil Trans-Alaska Pipeline System ditutup sabab ngalirna bahan bakar mentah ngalirna ratusan barel di luar Fairbanks, Alaska. Kegagalan listrik sabab tes sistem komando api rutin ngabalikkeun katup-katup pencegahan ngalirkeun bahan bakar mentah ngalirna di dekat stasiun pompa Fort Greely 9. Katup-katup ngalirkeun ngabalikkeun tekenan pencegahan pikeun sistem anu bahan bakar mentah ngalirna di padu anu bisa ngahasilkeun 55.000 barel (2.3 juta galon). Sababaraha sore Jumat, katup-katup ngalirkeun masih ngalirkeun mungkin tina pambesaran panas di luar tanki. Area pencegahan séjén di bawah tanki anu bisa ngahasilkeun 104.500 barel masih teu dipenuhi.
ref: Sistem jalur pipa trans-Alaska anu panjang na 800 mil teh ditutup heula kusabab aya minyak atah bahe di Fairbank kidul, Alaska. Listrik konslét saatos nguji sistem paréntah-seuneu rutin nyababkeun klep pelepas kabuka lega sareng minyak tanah mudal caket pompa Fort Greely 9. Pamukaan katup tiasa ngalepaskeun tekanan keur sistem sareng ngalirkeun oli kana tangki nu ngaliwatan bantalan nu tiasa nampung 55.000 tong (2,3 juta galon). Dugi ka Rebo soré, liang hawa tank masih keneh bocor kamungkianan kusabab hawa panas dina jero tank naék. area tambihan paranti nunda barang nu sejenna di handap ieu bisa nampung 104,500 tong eta ge can ka eusian kabeh

Listrik konslét saatos nguji sistem paréntah-seuneu rutin nyababkeun klep pelepas kabuka lega sareng minyak tanah mudal caket pompa Fort Greely 9. Pamukaan katup tiasa ngalepaskeun tekanan keur sistem sareng ngalirkeun oli kana tangki nu ngaliwatan bantalan nu tiasa nampung 55.000 tong (2,3 juta galon). Dugi ka Rebo soré, liang hawa tank masih keneh bocor kamungkianan kusabab hawa panas dina jero tank naék. area tambihan paranti nunda barang nu sejenna di handap ieu bisa nampung 104,500 tong eta ge can ka eusian kabeh

src: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.
mt: Korps Insinyur AS ngéstimasi yen 6 inci hujan bisa ngarobekkeun levee anu geus kacida rusak. The Ninth Ward, anu ngalaman banjir hingga 20 kaki dina Hurricane Katrina, kiwari ngalaman banjir hingga pinggul ti levee anu geus kacida rusak. Air tiasa ngalir leuwih luhur ti levee dina bagian 100 kaki.
ref: Korps insinyur A.S ngira-ngira curah hujan 6 inci tiasa nembus tanggul anu samemehna geus ruksak. Bangsal Kasalapan, anu ngalaman caah saluhur 20 suku salila Badai Katrina, ayeuna karendem cai saluhur cangkéng kusabab tanggul di deukeutna na ngaluap. Cai ngaleber dina tanggul dina bagian anu lebarna 100 kaki.

src: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.
mt: Hamilton ngabéwarakeun Howard University Hospital ngabuktikeun pasien éta dina kondisi stabil. Pasien éta geus ka Nigeria, di mana kasus virus Ebola geus lumangsung. Rumah sakit geus ngalakukeun protokol pikeun kontrol inféksi, anu ngahasilkeun pasien tina warga lian pikeun ngahindarkeun inféksi.
ref: Hamilton mastikeun Howard University Hospital ngaku pasien dina kaayan sae Pasién éta pernah indit ka Nigeria, anu dimana pirus Ebola muncul. Rumah sakit tos ngiringan protokol keur ngontrol penyebaran, kaasup dina misahkeun pasien ti nu sanés keur nyegah kamungkinan nyebarkeun ka batur.

src: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.
mt: Komet mungkin tiasa jadi sumber panyadiaan banyu ka bumi bareng jeung bahan organik anu tiasa ngahasilkeun protéin sareng ngahasilkeun kahirupan. Para ilmuan ngaharap pikeun ngerti kana cara bumi ngahasilkeun, khususna cara bumi ngahasilkeun, sabab komet ngalakonan tabrakan jeung bumi dina jaman dulu.
ref: Komet panginten tiasa janten sumber pangiriman cai ka bumi bareng jeung bahan organic anu tiasa ngabentuk protein sareng ngadukung kahirupan. Para élmuwan hoyong terang kumaha mimitina planet kabentuk, utamina kumaha Bumi kabentuk, saprak komet nabrak Bumi basa kapungkur.

src: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours. There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.
mt: While otoritas teu yakin kana kualitas anu bisa dipercaya, Maryland Transportaion Authority ngagunakeun tutupan ku pangaruh FBI. Dump trucks dipaké pikeun ngablocki jalan masuk sareng bantuan ti 80 polisi aya pikeun ngadireksi mobilis keur ngalakukeun detour. Aya teu ngalaman kacatetan lalu lintas anu teu jelas di jalan lingkar, jalur alternatif kota.
ref: Samentara aparat teu yakin kana ancaman éta, Aparat Transportasi Maryland nutup ku ngadesak FBI. Treuk sampah dimanfaatkeun pikeun nutupan lawang torowongan jeung 80 pulisi siap ngabantos kanggo ngarahkeun pengendara motor supados malik arah. Teu aya katelatan patalimarga anu dilaporkeun di jalur beltway, jalur alternatip dayeuh.

src: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."
mt: "Fotograferna diangkut ka Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, di mana anjeunna ngalaman kematian. Anjeunna umurna di sakitar 20-an. Dina pernyataan, Bieber ngomong "Sedangkan anjeunna teu hadir atawa langsung ngalakukeun kecelakaan tragis éta, pikiran sareng doa anjeunna pikeun kulawarga korban." Situs berita hiburan TMZ ngertikeun yen fotograferna ngaganggu mobil polisi di sisi séjén Sepulveda Boulevard sareng nyoba nyokot gambar sebelum ngalangkahan jalan sareng ngaganggu, nu ngabalukarkeun polisi California Highway Patrol nu ngalakukeun stop ngomong pikeun balik ka sisi séjén, dua kali. Menurut polisi, tukang mobil anu ngalakukeun kecelakaan ngan tiasa teu dipidana."
ref: "Fotografer dicandak ka Rumah Sakit Ronald Reagan UCLA, dimana anjeunna pupus. Anjeunna dilaporkeun usiana 20 taunan. Dina hiji pernyataan, Bieber nyatakeun ""sanajan abdi teu aya didinya sareng teu terlibat dina kacilakaan tragis eta, abdi turut belasungkawa ka kaluwargi korban."" Situs web wartos hiburan TMZ ngartos yen fotografer ngeureunkeun tumpakan na di sisi sanes Sepulveda Boulevard sarta usaha kanggo nyokot gambar ti pangeureunan pulisi sateuacan nyeberang jalan sarta neruskeun, nyorong patugas pulisi patroli jalan tol California anu ngalakukeun ngaeureunkeun lalar-liwat kanggo miwarang na balik,dua kali. Numutkeun pulisi, supir kendaraan anu nabrak fotografer eta moal mungkin nyanghareupan tungtutan pidana."

src: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."
mt: "Arias ngalaporkeun positif pikeun kasus leutikna, Arias ngalaporkeun. Kasusna stabil, tapi dia bakal diisolasi di rumah pikeun sababaraha poé. ""Apart ti panas jeung nyeri tenggorokan, Aku ngefaham jeung dina bentuk anu bagus pikeun ngalakukeun kerjana ku telekomunikasi. Aku ngalaman pikeun kambali ka kabéh tugasna dina Senen,"" Arias ngalaporkeun dina pernyataan."
ref: "Arias parantos diuji positip jang virus hampang, saur Présidén Menteri Rodrigo Arias. Kondisi présiden teh stabil, tapi anjeunna bakal diisolasi di bumina sababaraha dinten. Iwal ti harééng jeung peurih tikoro, urang ngarasa cageur jeung nuluykeun padamelan ti jarak jauh. Kuring ngarepkeun bakal balik deui ka pagawéan kuring dinten Senén,"" saur Arias dina hiji pernyataan."

src: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.
mt: Di puncakna, Tropis Gonu, anu ngaranana tina kantong daun palem di basa Maldives, ngahasilkeun angin berkecepatan 240 kilometer per jam (149 mil per jam). Ku saban awal dina, anginna ngahasilkeun 83 km/h, sareng diprediksikeun bakal lemah.
ref: Dina puncakna, Angin Gonu Tropis, anu namina dicandak ti sakantung daun palem dina basa Maladewa, ngahontal angin anu tuluy 240 kilometer per jam (149 mil per jam). Dina awal poe ayeuna, angin sakitar 83 km / jam, sareng diperkirakeun bakal terus ngeleuleuskeun.

src: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.
mt: Red tide disababkeun ku konsentrasi Karenia brevis nu leuwih luhur ti normal, hiji organisme sel tunggal anu alami. Faktor alami bisa nginterseksi pikeun ngahasilkeun kondisi anu ideal, anu ngahasilkeun konsentrasi alga anu ngalaman peningkatan drastis. Alga éta ngahasil neurotoksin anu bisa ngeblok saraf dina manusa sareng ikan. Ikan sering kali mati sabab konsentrasi neurotoksin anu luhur di perairan. Manusa bisa dipengaruhi ku ngehentikeun bau perairan anu dihembuskeun ku angin sareng gelombang.
ref: Ombak beureum disababkeun ku konsentrasi Karenia brevis anu langkung luhur ti normal, organisme laut bersel tunggal anu lumangsung sacara alami. Faktor alami tiasa pangaruh keur ngahasilkeun kaayaan nu ideal, nu matak ganggang jumlahna gancang pisan nambahna. Alga ngahasilkeun neurotoksin anu bisa ngarusak saraf jelema jeung lauk. Lauk sering paéh kusabab loba racun di jero cai. Manusa tiasa katepaan tina ngahirup cai anu tos katepaan anu kacandak ku angin sareng ombak.

src: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."
mt: "Felicia, hiji kategori 4 ngarajin dina skala Saffir-Simpson, lemah jadi depresi tropis saméméh ngabubarkeun dina Selasa. Sisa-sisa éta ngahasilkeun hujan di sababaraha pulo, tapi nepi ka ayeuna, teu aya laporan ngeunaan kerusakan atawa banjir. Hujan anu ngahasilkeun 6,34 inci di Oahu, disebutkeun salaku ""beneficial"". Sababaraha hujan éta disertai badai petir sareng sinar kilat."
ref: "Felicia, pernah jadi kategori 4 badai Saffir-Simpson ngalemah janten depresi tropis sateuacan ngaleungit dinten Salasa. Sésa badai éta ngahasilkeun hujan di kalolobaan pulo, sanaos dugi ka ayeuna, teu aya karusakan atanapi banjir nu dilaporkeun. Curah hujan nepi 6,34 inci gauge di Oahu. Iyeu dianggap ""nguntungkeun"". Sababaraha kali hujan dibarengan ku angin tarik jeung sering dibarengan ku kilat kingkilaban."

src: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
mt: Piquet Jr. rugrug dina 2008 Singapore Grand Prix sabada pit stop awal Fernando Alonso, nu ngahasilkeun mobil keur aman. Sabada mobil-mobil di depan Alonso ngalakukeun bahan bakar di bawah mobil keur aman, dia ngalakukeun ngalangkahan paket pikeun ngahasilkeun kemenangan. Piquet Jr. dipecat sabada 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
ref: Piquet Jr. tabrakan di balapan Grand Prix Singapura di taun 2008 saatos eureun langkung gancang di pit stop nu mimiti pikeun Fernando Alonso, nu matak nyieun mobil kaamanan turun tangan. Nalika mobil-mobil di payuneun Alonso lebet pikeun ngisi bénsin di handap mobil kaamanan, teras anjeunna nyusul keur menangkeun balapan. Piquet Jr. dipecat saeunggeus Grand Priz Hungaria taun 2009.

src: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
mt: Studi anu dipublikasikeun dina Jumat dina majalah Science ngabahas ngeunaan formasi spésiés burung anyar di pulo Galápagos Ekuador. Para ilmuan ti Universitas Princeton di Amerika jeung Universitas Uppsala di Swédia ngabahas spésiés anyar éta ngalaman évolusi dina dua generasi, walaupun prosés éta geus dipikanyaho tiasa ngalaman dina waktu nu leuwih lama, sababna tibatan burung Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, jeung burung cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris, ngadeg di Galápagos.
ref: Hasil panalitian anu diterbitkeun poe Kemis di Jurnal Sains ngalaporkeun pembentukan spésies manuk anyar di Kapuloan Galapagos, Ekuador. Panaliti ti Universitas Princeton di Amérika Serikat sareng Universitas Uppsala di Swédia ngalaporkeun spésiés anyar anu berevolusi ngan dina dua generasi, sanajan proses ieu téh ngabutuhkeun waktos nu kantun lami, kusabab pengembangbiakan antara Finch Darwin éndemik, Geospiza fortes, sareng kaktus Finch Imigran, Geospiza conirostris.

Para ilmuan ti Universitas Princeton di Amerika jeung Universitas Uppsala di Swédia ngabahas spésiés anyar éta ngalaman évolusi dina dua generasi, walaupun prosés éta geus dipikanyaho tiasa ngalaman dina waktu nu leuwih lama, sababna tibatan burung Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, jeung burung cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris, ngadeg di Galápagos.
ref: Hasil panalitian anu diterbitkeun poe Kemis di Jurnal Sains ngalaporkeun pembentukan spésies manuk anyar di Kapuloan Galapagos, Ekuador. Panaliti ti Universitas Princeton di Amérika Serikat sareng Universitas Uppsala di Swédia ngalaporkeun spésiés anyar anu berevolusi ngan dina dua generasi, sanajan proses ieu téh ngabutuhkeun waktos nu kantun lami, kusabab pengembangbiakan antara Finch Darwin éndemik, Geospiza fortes, sareng kaktus Finch Imigran, Geospiza conirostris.

src: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.
mt: Acara seni ogé bagian ti kampanye Dinas Kota Bucharest anu ngajangjakan gambaran kota Romania minangka metropolis kreatif sareng warna-warni. Kota éta bakal jadi kota munggaran di Éropa Tenggara anu ngahost CowParade, acara seni publik panggedéna di dunya, antara Juni sareng Agustus taun ieu.
ref: Acara artistik éta téh mangrupikeun bagian kampanye ti Balé kota Bucharest anu ngupayakeun ngaluncurkeun deui citra ibukota Romania sebagai kota metropolitan anu berwarna sareng kreatip. Kota ieu bakal janten kota anu pangpayunna di tenggara Eropa anu janten tuan rumah CowParade, acara seni umum pangageungna sadunya, antara bulan Juni sareng Agustus taun ayeuna.

src: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.
mt: Kapal éta geus ngahaja ka Irkutsk sareng dioperasikeun ku pasukan dalem. Sareng ngalakukeun pamariksaan. Il-76 geus jadi komponén penting ti pasukan Rusia sareng Uni Soviet ti taun 1970-an, sareng geus nampi pamariksaan serius di Rusia dina bulan Oktober 7. Pada tanggal 7 Oktober, mesinna terpisah ti landasan tanpa nyerang.
ref: Pesawat ieu angkat ka Irkutsk sareng dioprasikeun ku pasukan jero. Penyelidikan diayakeun pikeun nalungtik. Pasawat militer Il-76 mangrupikeun komponen utama pikeun kakuatan militer Rusia sareng Soviet ti saprak taun 1970an, sareng tos ngalaman kacilakaan serius di Rusia bulan kamari. Kaping  7 Oktober, hiji mesin kapisah pas mulai ngapung, tanpa nyebabkeun cidera. Rusia teras nyetop Il-76s saatos kacilakaan éta.

src: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.
mt: Sebelum The Simpsons Simon bekerja di beberapa acara di posisi-posisi béda. Dina 1980-an dia bekerja di acara-acara saperti Taxi, Cheers, sareng The Tracy Ullman Show. Dina 1989 dia bantuan ngadegkeun The Simpsons sareng Brooks sareng Groening, sareng dia tanggung jawab pikeun nyerangkeun tim nulisna acara. Dina 1993 dia ngalakukeun pindah ti acara éta, tapi dia ngagantung gelar pikeun produsén eksekutif, sareng dia ngalakukeun pikeun menerima ratusan juta dolar ti setiap musim pikeun royalti.
ref: Sateuacanna The Simpsons Simon tos gawe dina sababaraha acara dina rupa-rupa jabatan. Dina taun 1980an anjeuna gawé dina acara-acara siga Taxi, Cheers, jeung Tracy Ullman Show. Dina taun 1989 anjeunna ngabantosan nyiptakeun The Simpsons babarengan Brooks sareng Groening, jeung boga tanggung jawab ngarékrut tim panulis munggaran jang acara éta. Sanajan ninggalkeun tina acara di taun 1993, anjeunna masih nyekel gelar produser éksekutif, sarta tuluy narima honor sapuluh juta dolar unggal usumna.

src: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.
mt: Fluke ngarangkeun yén upaya ti sababaraha pikeun ngabasmikeun para wanoja tina ngomongkeun pikeun kasehatan wanoja teu berhasil. Éta konklusi diturunkeun ku sabab jumlah positif komentar sareng pujian anu dikirim ka éta ku wanoja sareng pria nu ngomongkeun yén obat kontrasepsi tiasa dianggap minangka keperluan medis.
ref: Fluke nyeratkeun yén usaha sababaraha jalmi pikeun ngahalangan istri nyarios ngeunaan kesehatan istri téh teu aya hasil. Anjeunna ngagaduhan kacindekan ieu kusabab seueur komentar positip sareng dukungan anu di kirimkeun ka dua awéwé sareng lalaki anu ngadesek yén ubar kontrasépsi dianggap kabutuhan medis.

src: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."
mt: “Ieu bakal ngalakukeun saperti banyu. Ieu transparan saperti banyu. Jadi, kalayan kalian ngalakukeun di pantai, kalian bakal bisa nempo ka bawah, ka batu-batu batu atawa gumpalan-gumpalan anu aya di dasar. Sakumaha anu kami tahu, aya hiji planét anu ngalakukeun dinamika leuwih luhur ti Titan, jeung ngaranana Bumi,” tambah Stofan.
ref: "iyeu bakal siga cai. Transparan siga sakumaha cai"". Jadi, lamun maneh nangtung disisi laut, maneh tiasa ningali kerikil jeung babatuan di hanap laut. Sakumaha anu urang terang, ngan aya hiji awak planét anu ningalikeun dinamisme leuwih ti Titan, namina téh Bumi,"" saur Stofan."

src: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."
mt: “Ieu bakal ngalakukeun saperti banyu. Ieu transparan saperti banyu. Jadi, kalayan kalian ngalakukeun di pantai, kalian bakal bisa nempo ka bawah, ka batu-batu batu atawa gumpalan-gumpalan anu aya di dasar. Sakumaha anu kami tahu, aya hiji planét anu ngalakukeun dinamika leuwih luhur ti Titan, jeung ngaranana Bumi,” tambah Stofan.
ref: "iyeu bakal siga cai. Transparan siga sakumaha cai"". Jadi, lamun maneh nangtung disisi laut, maneh tiasa ningali kerikil jeung babatuan di hanap laut. Sakumaha anu urang terang, ngan aya hiji awak planét anu ningalikeun dinamisme leuwih ti Titan, namina téh Bumi,"" saur Stofan."

src: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.
mt: Kabéhna ngabuktikeun yén saeutikna dinosaurus ngarandam bulu, teori anu geus umum, tapi nyadiakeun rincian fosil umumna tiasa, saperti warna sareng aranjean tiga dimensi.. Ilmuan ngajakkeun yén bulu éta warnana cokelat di bagian atos sareng bagian bawahna warnana pala atawa warnana carotenoid. Manggihan éta ogé ngabuktikeun évolusi bulu di burung. Ku sabab bulu éta teu ngahasil rachis, tapi aya barb sareng barbules, para ilmuan ngajakkeun yén rachisna tiasa jadi évolusi ngeunaan sabada barb sareng barbulesna. Struktur bulu éta nyadiakeun yén buluna tiasa teu dipaké pikeun nglungguhkeun, tapi pikeun nyalurkeun panas atawa pikeun ngagambarkeun. Para ilmuan ngajakkeun yén, ku sabab éta nyaéta ekor tina dinosaurus nu masih bungsu, sampelna ngabuktikeun bulu anu geus dewasa sareng teu ngabuktikeun bulu anak.
ref: Hal iyeu teu ngan mastikeun lamun aya sababaraha dinosaurus anu boga bulu, hiji teori anu geus nyebar, tapi teu tiasa nunjukeun detail fosil anu cukup, siga warna jeung susunan 3 dimensina. Élmuwan nyatakeun yén bulu sato éta luhurna coklat kastanye nanging bagéan handapna pias atanapi karotenoid. Pendakan éta masihan wawasan dina parobahan bulu-bulu manuk. Kusabab bulu dinosaurus henteu gaduh poros anu saé perkembanganana, anu disebut rachis, tapi gaduh ciri-ciri bulu sanesna - cucuk sareng barbules - panaliti nyimpulkeun yén rachis sigana mah hasil tina épolusi langkung ahir tibatan ciri-ciri nu lainna. Struktur bulu na nunjukkeun yén éta henteu dianggo kanggo hiber tapi pikeun ngaturan suhu atanapi tampilan. Panalungtik ngusulkeun yén, sanaos ieu buntut dinosaurus anu ngora, conto ieu nunjukkeun bulu anu déwasa sanés bulu hayam. Para peneliti mikeun gambaran yen, sanaos ieu teh buntut dinosaurus anom, sampel nembongkeun bulu sawawa sarta sanes anak.

src: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.
mt: Salah sahiji vaksin eksperimental tiasa ngurangkeun mortalitas Ebola, nepi ka kiwari, teu aya obat anu jelas ditunjukkeun cocog pikeun ngubaran inféksi anu aya. Salah sahiji campuran antarobat, ZMapp, mimiti ngabogaan janji dina lapangan, tapi studi formal ngabogaan manfaat anu kurang ti anu diharapkeun pikeun ngahambat kematian. Dina PALM trial, ZMapp jadi kontrol, anu hartina ilmuan ngagunakeun éta pikeun dasar jeung dibandingkeun tiga obat séjénna jeung éta.
ref: Sanaos aya hiji vaksin hasil ékspérimen anu mungkin bakal tiasa ngirangan jumlah korban jiwa akibat ebola, tapi dugi ka kiwari, teu acan aya landong anu jelas kabuktosan tiasa ngalandongan inféksina. Hiji koktail antibodi, ZMapp, mimitina katingali ngajanjikeun di lapangan, nanging studi resmi nunjukkeun yén manpaatna langkung alit tibatan anu dipilarian, nyaéta nyegah pati. Dina tés PALM, ZMapp lalakon salaku kontrol, anu hartosna élmuwan nganggo éta salaku titik awal pikeun ngabandingkeun tilu parawatan sanés.

src: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each. Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.
mt: Di Senén, para ilmuwan ti Sekolah Médik Universitas Stanford ngababarkeun alat diagnostik anyar nu bisa ngabédakeun sel ku tipe: chip kecil nu bisa diproduksi ku printer standar tipe inkjet pikeun mungkin 1 sen AS tiap-tiap. Para peneliti nu ngahimpun ngomong ieu bisa ngabawa deteksi dini kanker, tuberkulosis, HIV jeung malaria ka pasien di nagara nu ngan mibanda pendapatan, di mana lalakon hidup pikeun kanker payudara bisa jadi setengah ti nagara nu mibanda pendapatan.
ref: Dina dinten Senen, para ilmuan ti Universitas Stanford Fakultas Kedokteran ngumumkeun manggihan alat diagnosa anyar anu tiasa misahkeun sel didasarkeun jenisna: chip leutik anu tiasa dicetak ngagunakeun printer inkjet standar sareng biaya masing-masing sakitar hiji sen Dollar Amerika. Nu mimpin penelitian éta nyarios bahwa ieu téh tiasa ngadeteksi kanker, tbc, HIV sareng malaria leuwih awal keur pasien di negara miskin, anu dimana tingkat bertahan hidup na jang panyakit kos kanker payudaya ngan saukur satengah ti negara-negara nu beunghar.

src: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.
mt: Ilmuan ngadatangkeun bentuk tanah anu dipingpinkeun di permukaan bulan anu katelah lobate scarps anu tiasa hasil tina bulan ngurang lila. Bentuk tanah éta katelah dipingpinkeun di bulan jeung tiasa ngabuktikeun yén gejala geologis anu ngahasilkeunna tiasa ngabutuhkeun waktu anu lila. Teori éta ngadepi klaim yén bulan teu ngalaman gejala geologis.
ref: Para élmuwan atos mendakan bentang alam anu ancur di dataran bulan nu disebat lobate scarps sigana kusabab bulan ngaalitan saalit-saalit. Tanda ieu katingali di sadaya bulan sareng katempo di cuaca anu minimal, nunjukkeun yén kajadian geologis anu nyiptakeuna hasil anu anyar. Teori ieu bertentangan sareng claim yén bulan henteu ngagaduhan kagiatan géologis.

Teori ieu bertentangan sareng claim yén bulan henteu ngagaduhan kagiatan géologis.

src: "Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son. She is in custody pending indictment and trial, but any eyewitness evidence may be tainted because her image has been widely published. This is common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed publication of photos as potentially prejudicial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes ""journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."" Crown Office, which is in overall charge of prosecutions, has indicated to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until indictment."
mt: "Adekoya geus di Edinburgh Sheriff Court dihukum mati pikeun ngarobekna anakna. Anjeunna di tahanan pikeun dihukum, tapi saksi mata bisa jadi terkontaminasi sabab gambarana geus dipublikasikeun. Hal ieu biasa di tempat séjén di Inggris tapi yuridika Skotlandia béda jeung dihukum. Profesor Pamela Ferguson ti Universitas Dundee ngabéak ""jurnalis tiasa ngalakonan hal anu berbahaya jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngabéak gambaran jeung ngab
ref: "Adekoya parantos di Pangadilan Edinburgh Sheriff dituduh kalayan ngabunuh putrana. Anjeunna keur ditahan sareng nungguan dakwaan sareng sidang, tapi buktos saksi mata rada kacemar kusabab gambar anjeunna tos seueur dipublikasikeun. Iyeu biasa dilakukan ditempat lain di Inggris tapi peradilan Skotlandia garawe sacara bareda jeung pengadilan ngaranggap publikasi foto berpotensi ngarugikeun. Profesor Pamela Ferguson ti Universitas Dundee nyatet ""wartawan sigana leumpang dina garis anu bahaya lamun nyebarkeun foto tersangka jsb."" Kantor Mahkota, nu mana nyekel tanggung jawab dina penuntutan, tos nunjukkeun ka wartawan yén moal aya koméntar salajengna dugi ka dakwaan."

src: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week. The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.
mt: Salain ti salju anu teu bisa dihancurkeun, kondisi cuaca anu ekstrem geus ngahambat upaya-upaya pikeun ngahimpikeun. Pittman méré saran anu ngabahas yén kondisi ieu teu bakal ngahasilkeun hasil anu bagus nepi ka waktu anu bakal datangna dina minggu anu bakal datang. Jumlah sareng tebalna salju anu teu bisa dihancurkeun, menurut Pittman, nyaéta anu paling burukna dina 15 taun anu kahirupanana.
ref: Salain es anu ancur, cuaca anu jore oge ngahambat upaya panyelametan. Pittman masihan terang yén ieu moal ningkat dugi ka minggu payun. Jumlah sareng kandelna lapisan és, numutkeun ka Pittman, mangrupikeun anu paling parah pikeun tukang moro anjing laut dina 15 taun.

src: "Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases. He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the ""settled law of the land"", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings. He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon."
mt: Roberts teu ngabédaan kapan dia ngarasa yén keur ngabutuhkeun kajadian, soal nu penting nalika ngabahas éthik ti abortus, ngabédaan yén ieu téh "hukum nu geus jadi" ti Roe v. Wade, ngabédaan pentingna hukum ti Mahkamah Agung nu geus jadi, anu ngabédaan yén dia percaya hak nu ngabutuhkeun privasi anu diimplikasikeun ku Roe.
ref: "Roberts teges nolak nyarios perihal iraha kahirupan dimimitian, hiji pertanyaan penting lamun mikirkeun tentang étika aborsi, nyarios yén teu pantes koméntar dina kasus nu spésipik siga éta. Nanging, manehna ngulangi deui pernyataan sateuacana margi Roe v. Wade nyaeta ""hukum tata negara"" nekankeun pentingna kaputusan Mahkamah Agung anu konsisten. Anjeunna ogé negaskeun bahwa anjeunna percaya ka hak privasi tersirat anu ngagantung kana kaputusan Roe."

src: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target. Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight. Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.
mt: Di 8:46 pagi, hiji hush jadi nyata di kota, nu ngabédakeun waktu éta jeung hiji jet ngalanggar targetna. Dua tiis lampu geus diatur pikeun ngalampahkeun ka langit. Konstruksi masih berlangsung pikeun lima gedung tinggi anyar di tempat, sareng pusat transportasi sareng taman peringatan di tengah.
ref: Pas tepat tabuh 8:46 enjing, nalika dayeuh keur sepi pisan, nyirian waktos anu pas pikeun kapal jet mimiti ngahantem sasaranna. 2 senter atos di pasang pikeun nyorot ka langit sapeupeuting. Pamekaran lima gedong pancakar langit anyar nuju lumangsung di lokasi, sareng pusat transportasi sarta astana di tengahna.

src: "All of the cave entrances, which were named ""The Seven Sisters"", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves. ""They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground,"" said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona."
mt: “Saratusna pintu masuk gua, anu disebut “The Seven Sisters”, leuwih luhur ti 100-250 meter (328-820 feet) di diameterna. Gambar inframerah ngalirkeun yén variasi suhu ti malam jeung poé ngabuktikeun yén éta téh gua. “Mereka lebih dingin dari permukaan sekitarnya di siang hari dan lebih hangat di malam hari. Perilaku termal mereka tidak seimbang seperti gua-gua besar di Bumi yang sering mempertahankan suhu yang cukup konstan, tetapi konsisten dengan lubang-lubang dalam tanah yang dalam ini,” kata Glen Cushing dari United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team dan dari Northern Arizona University yang terletak di Flagstaff, Arizona.”
ref: "Sadayana lawang guha, anu dingaranan ""The 7 Sister"", sahenteuna 100 dugi 250 meter (328 dugi ka 820 kaki) dina diameter. Gambar infrared nunjukeun perubahan suhu ti beurang sareng peuting nunjukeun bahwa sigana éta téh guha. éta langkung tiis tibatan permukaan sakuriling siang sareng haneutna wengi. Laku-lampah suhu panasna teu stabil sapertos goa-goa ageung di Bumi nu suhuna stabil, tapi ieu janten stabil kusabab liang-liang jero dina taneuh,"" saur Glen Cushing di Survey Geologi Amérika Sarékat (SGAS) Tim Astrogéologi sareng Univérsitas Arizona Kalér aya di Flagstaff, Arizona."

src: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd. The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast. His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.
mt: Manusia anu diduga nyerang ngagunakeun mobil tiga roda anu dipasang bom masuk ka dalem kumpulan manusa. Manusia anu diduga ngabedugkeun bom éta ditahan, sanggeus ngalaman luka ti pambédugna. src: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak. For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak. It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago. The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.
mt: Tim rugby union Afrika Kidul ngalakonan kana tim All Blacks (Selandia Anyar) dina pertandingan Tri Nations di Royal Bafokeng Stadium di Rustenburg, Afrika Kidul. Skor akhirna nyaéta kana hiji poin, 21-20, nu ngubungkeun jangkungan menang 15 pertandingan All Blacks. Pada Springboks, éta nyatakeun jangkungan kalah 5 pertandingan. Pertandingan finalna nyaéta dua minggu lalu, nalika All Blacks geus ngalakonan kana Australia. Pertandingan finalna tiasa dilakonan di Ellis Park di Johannesburg minggu deukeut, nalika Springboks ngalakonan kana Australia.
ref: Afrika Selatan ngelehkeun All Blacks (Selandia Baru) di pertandingan rugby union Tri Nations di stadion Royal Bakofeng di Rustenburg, Afrika Selatan. Skor paneuri ngan béda hiji poin, nyaéta 21 - 20. Ieu ngeureunkeun 15 kamenangan tutuluyan All Black. Pikeun Springboks, atos réngsé tilas éléh 5 patandingan. Éta pertandingan pamungkas pikeun All Blacks, anu atos menangkeun piala dua minggu katukang. Pertandingan pamungkas ti kompetisi eta bakal diayakeun di Ellis Park di Johannesburg minggon payun, pas Springboks ngalawan Australia.

src: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters. Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.
mt: Stasiun tetep ngalakukeun posisi éta, sabab kalahna gyroscope dina misi stasiun angkasa, nepi ka akhir spacewalk. Chiao sareng Sharipov ngabéakkeun yén jarakna tina thruster posisi normal stasiun. Kontrol tanah Rusia aktifkeun jet sareng posisi normal stasiun dipulihkeun.
ref: Stasion luar angkasa teh netep tina kabiasaanana, kungsi kaleungitan giroskop dina tugas, nepi ka akhir spacewalk. Chiao sareng Sharipov ngalaporkeun, maranehna araya dina jarak anu aman ti mesin pendorong pangatur katinggian. Kontrol darat Rusia ngaktifkeun jet sareng malikkeun kaayaan stasiun janten normal.

src: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges. This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.
mt: Kasus éta dihukum di Virginia sabab ieu nyaéta rumahna ISP (Internet Service Provider) AOL, perusahaan anu ngajakkeun hukum. Ieu mangrupa kasus kahiji anu dihukum ku undang-undang anu ditarima dina taun 2003 pikeun ngurung spam (e-mail tina sumber anu teu diharapkeun) tina masuk ka kotak surat para pengguna.
ref: Kasus ieu dituntut di Virginia kusabab éta téh tempat asal keur penyedia layanan internét nu terkenal AOL, perusahaan anu micu tuduhan. Ieu anu pangmimitina hukuman nganggo undang-undang anu tos disahkeun di taun 2003 pikeun ngalarang Imél masal atawa spam, améh pangguna teu narima imel nu teu dipikahayang.

src: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla. Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.
mt: Vidal, umur 28 taun, ngabogaan 49 pertandingan pikeun klub éta ti mangsa 2003.
ref: 28 taun Vidal gabung ka Barca tilu musim katukang, ti Sevilla. Samenjak pindah ka ibukota Catalan, Vidal geus maén 49 pertandingan keur tim.

src: Jarque was practicing during pre-season training at Coverciano in Italy earlier in the day. He was staying in the team hotel ahead of a match planned for Sunday against Bolonia. He was staying in the team hotel ahead of a match planned for Sunday against Bolonia.
mt: Jarque ngalakukeun latihan di Coverciano di Italia dina dinten Senen. Anjeunna ngalindung di hotel timna pikeun pertandingan nu dijadwalkeun pikeun Senen ngalawan Bolonia.
ref: Jarque harita nuju latian dina latian pra-musim di Coverciano, di Italia. anjeunna cicing di hotél tim sateuacan pertandingan anu dijadwalkeun dinten Minggu ngalawan Bolonia Anjeunna netep di hotel tim sateuacan pertandingan anu direncanakeun kanggo Minggu ngalawan Bolonia.

src: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement. Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.
mt: Ombak tsunami teu diumumkeun, jeung menurut agénsi géofisika Jakarta, ombak tsunami teu diumumkeun sabab gempa teu ngalakukeun syarat 6.5 magnitudo. Dumasar tina teu aya ancaman ombak tsunami, warga mulai panik jeung mulai ngelakukeun bisnis jeung rumah.
ref: teu aya nu masihan pepeling ngeunaan tsunami jeung ceunah ceuk Badan Geofisika Jakarta, moal aya pepeling ngeunaan tsunami kusabab lini na teh teu nepi kak 6.5 magnitudo. Sanajan teu aya ancaman tsunami, wargi parantos panik sareng langsung niggalkeun usaha sareng imahna.
