src: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else. The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.
mt: Para ilmuan ngabogaan yén Surya ngalakonan prinsip dasar anu sarua jeung bintang-bintang séjénna: Aktivitas bintang-bintang dina sistim éta katelah dipicu ku luminositasna, rotasina, sareng tiap-tiap hal séjénna. Luminositas sareng rotasi dipakékeunkeun pikeun ngabogaan nomer Rossby, anu patali jeung aliran plasma. Nomer Rossby anu leutik, bintangna leuwih aktif pikeun ngalakonan reversi magnetik.
ref: Aranjeuna manggihan lamun matahari beroperasi numutkeun prinsip anu sami sareng bentang anu sanes; Aktifitas kabeh bentang dina sistem kapendak didorong ku cahayana, rotasina sorangan, eta hungkul. Luminositas sareng rotasi dianggo pikeun nangtukeun nomor bintang Rossby , anu nyambung jeung aliran plasma. Beuki leutik bilangan Rossby-na, beuki kurang aktif béntangna nu patali jeung pembalikan magnétna.

src: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008. Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch. At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.
mt: Ti 1.400 jalma anu dipilihkeun sebelum pilihan umum fédéral 2010, anu ngadébatkeun Australia jadi républik tumbuh ku 8 persén ti 2008. Perdana Menteri Julia Gillard ngarasa Australia jadi républik nalika akhir pamaréntahan Ratu Elizabeth II. 34 persén ti jalma-jalma anu dipilihkeun ngadébatkeun Australia jadi républik nalika akhir pamaréntahan Ratu Elizabeth II. Di pihak nu panghandapna, 29 persén ti jalma-jalma anu dipilihkeun ngadébatkeun Australia jadi républik secepetna, sarta 31 persén ngadébatkeun Australia jadi républik teu pernah.
ref: Tina 1.400 urang ditaliti sateuacan pamilihan federal 2010, jalma anu nentang Australia anu janten republik tumuwuh 8 persén ti taun 2008. Dina kampanye pamilihan umum federal 2010, Perdana Menteri Sementawis Julia Gillard nganyatakeun yen anjeunna percaya Australia bakal janten républik dina akhir pamaréntahan Ratu Elizabeth II. 34 persen jalma dina polling di gaduh pendapat ieu, nyaeta hoyong Ratu Elizabeth II janten monarkis pamungkas di Australia. Dina polling ekstrim, 29 persén jalma anu ditaliti percaya yén Australia kudu janten républik sagancang-gancangna, sedengkeun 31 persén dipercaya Australia henteu tiasa janten républik.

src: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation. Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.
mt: Leslie Aun, seseorang pikeun Komen Foundation, ngomong yén organisasi éta ngadopsi aturan anyar anu teu ngabagi dana atawa grant ka organisasi anu keur diusut ku hukum. Komen ngalakukeun aturan éta ku sabab Planned Parenthood keur diusut ku Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns ngusutkeun yen pajak dipaké pikeun ngabagi dana pikeun aborsi ku Planned Parenthood dina peranana minangka ketua subkomite Oversight and Investigations, anu di bawah naungan House Energy and Commerce Committee.
ref: Leslie Aun, juru nyarios Komen Foundation, nuturkeun margi organisasi eta nerapkeun aturan anyar anu heunteu masihan hibah atanapi ngadanaan organisasi-organisasi anu keur diselidiki secara hukum. Kabijakan Komentar ngadiskualifikasi rencana parental kusabab panilitian anu ngantosan kumaha parencanaan parentitas nyéépkeun sareng ngalaporkeun artosna ku Perwakilan Cliff Strearns. Stearns keur menyidak perkawis duit pajak anu dipake kanggo ngadanaan aborsi tina Planned Parenthood kumargi anjeunna  sebagai ketua Subkomite Pengawasan jeung Investigasi, anu dihandapeun paguyuban Komite Energi jeung Perdagangan DPR.

src: "The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone. Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, ""We have arrested five persons who raped the Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop"". The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces."
mt: "Polisi Madhya Pradesh ngadatangan laptop sareng telepon seluler nu dirampok. Wakil Inspektur Jenderal D K Arya ngomong, ""Kami ngadatangan lima urang anu ngarép si wanita Swiss sareng ngadatangan telepon sareng laptopna"". Urang-urang anu dirampok nyaéta Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar sareng Vishnu Kanjar. Polisi superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki ngomong, urang-urang anu dirampok tampil di pengadilan sareng wajahna ditutup."
ref: "Pulisi Madhya Pradesh manggih laptop jeung HP anu dicolong. Wakil Inspektorat Jeneral D Arya nyarios, ""Kami parantos néwak lima jalmi anu merkosa awéwé Swiss sareng nyalameutkeun hp sareng laptopna"". Nami jalmi-jalmi anu jadi terdakwa nyaeta Baba kanjar, Bhutha kanjar, Rampro kanjar, Gaza kanjar jeung Vishnu kanjar. Inspektur pulisi Chandra Shekhar Solanki nyarios tersangka dongkap ka pengadilan nutupan beungeutna."

src: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards. Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.
mt: Masalah dimimitian dina tanggal 1 Januari nalika puluhan warga lokal ngadatangkeun ka kantor pos Obanazawa yén mérék teu menerima kartu Tahun Baru tradisional sareng régulér. Dina kemudian hari, kantor pos ngaluarkeun pamflet pikeun warga sareng media setelah ngadatangkeun yén anak lalaki éta ngabungkeun leuwih ti 600 dokumén pos, anu ngajangkeut 429 kartu Tahun Baru, anu teu disampaan ka penerima.
ref: Masalahna dimimitian dina 1 Januari, nakila warga lokal mimiti ngeluh ka kantor pos Obanazawa yén aranjeunna henteu nampi kartu tadisional sareng kartu taun baru anu biasa. Kamari, kantor pos ngahapunteun ka para wargi sarta média saatos mendakan yén budak éta nyumputkeun langkung ti 600 dokumén pos, kalebet 429 kartu pos Taun Anyar, anu henteu dikirimkeun ka panarima anu dituju.

src: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set. Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6. Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.
mt: Murray kalah dina set munggaran dina tie break sabada kedua pria ngahasilkeun setiap pelayanan. Del Potro ngahasilkeun keunggulan awal dina set kadua, tapi ieu ogé butuh tie break setelah ngahasilkeun 6-6. Potro menerima perawatan ka pundakna dina titik ieu tapi bisa ngabalik ka permainan.
ref: Murray éléh di babak mimiti dina pertandingan panentu saatos duanana nyekel masing-masing sérpis di babak éta. Del Potro sempet menang di set kadua, tapi ieu oge kudu istirahat seri pas nepi 6-6. Potro sempet diubaran taktak na pas harita jeung akhirna sanggup neruskeun pertandinganna.

src: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set. Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6. Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.
mt: Murray kalah dina set munggaran dina tie break sabada kedua pria ngahasilkeun setiap pelayanan. Del Potro ngahasilkeun keunggulan awal dina set kadua, tapi ieu ogé butuh tie break setelah ngahasilkeun 6-6. Potro menerima perawatan ka pundakna dina titik ieu tapi bisa ngabalik ka permainan.

src: "Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety. Perry specifically said, ""There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."" The governor also stated, ""Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."" He went on to say, ""This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."""
mt: “Dina hiji rapat bersama para pejabat, dia ngajamin warga Texas yén langkah-langkah geus diimpikeun pikeun ngabébaskeun kana amanana publik. Perry khusus ngomong, ““Aya hiji tempat di dunya anu leuwih luhur dipersiapkeun pikeun ngahadapi tantangan anu dipidangkeun dina kasus ieu.””” Gubernur ogé ngomong, ““Hari ieu, kami ngalaman yén anak-anak sekolah geus diidentifikasi yén geus ngalaman kontak jeung pasien.”” Dia ngalakukeun, ““Kasus ieu serius. Yakin yén sistem kami bekerja sebaik-baikna.””
ref: "Dibaturan ku para pejabat, anjeunna mastikeun ka urang Téxas yén léngkah-léngkah pikeun nangtayungan kaamanan umum geus dilaksanakeun. Perry sacara spésipik ngomong yén ""Aya tempat-tempat di dunya anu sasaéna nyiapkeun diri nyanghareupan tangtangan anu wedal ti perkawis ieu. Gubernur ogé nyatakeun, ""Dinten ieu, urang apal yén sababaraha budak murangkalih anu sakola parantos kanyahoan yén aranjeunna ogé parantos kontak sareng pasien."" Anjeunna neruskeun nyarios, ""Perkawis ieu téh serius. Yakin wéh yén sistem urang téh berfungsi sakumaha semestina."""

src: "Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety. Perry specifically said, ""There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."" The governor also stated, ""Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."" He went on to say, ""This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."""
mt: “Dina hiji rapat bersama para pejabat, dia ngajamin warga Texas yén langkah-langkah geus diimpikeun pikeun ngabébaskeun kana amanana publik. Perry khusus ngomong, ““Aya hiji tempat di dunya anu leuwih luhur dipersiapkeun pikeun ngahadapi tantangan anu dipidangkeun dina kasus ieu.””” Gubernur ogé ngomong, ““Hari ieu, kami ngalaman yén anak-anak sekolah geus diidentifikasi yén geus ngalaman kontak jeung pasien.”” Dia ngalakukeun, ““Kasus ieu serius. Yakin yén sistem kami bekerja sebaik-baikna.””
ref: "Dibaturan ku para pejabat, anjeunna mastikeun ka urang Téxas yén léngkah-léngkah pikeun nangtayungan kaamanan umum geus dilaksanakeun. Perry sacara spésipik ngomong yén ""Aya tempat-tempat di dunya anu sasaéna nyiapkeun diri nyanghareupan tangtangan anu wedal ti perkawis ieu. Gubernur ogé nyatakeun, ""Dinten ieu, urang apal yén sababaraha budak murangkalih anu sakola parantos kanyahoan yén aranjeunna ogé parantos kontak sareng pasien."" Anjeunna neruskeun nyarios, ""Perkawis ieu téh serius. Yakin wéh yén sistem urang téh berfungsi sakumaha semestina."""

src: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988. Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat). Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.
mt: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988. Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat). Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.
ref: Jauh sateuacan The Daily Show sareng The Colbert Report, Heck sareng Johnson atos ngabayangkeun publikasi anu bakal ngaparodikeun berita sareng pembaca berita, pas aranjeunna masih janten mahasiswa di UW taun 1988. Ti saprak diadegkeun, The Onion tos janten karajaan parodi anu leres, kalayan edisi cetak, halaman web anu gaduh 5 juta pangunjung unik di sasih Oktober, iklan nyalira, jaringan warta 24 jam, podcast, sareng atlas dunya anu anyar dibuka anu dipasihan nami Dunya Urang nu Bodo. Al Gore sareng Jendral Tommy Franks sok ngobrol santi pikeun ngobrolkeun judul berita karesep maranehanana (Anu dipikaresep Gore mah nyaeta pas The Onion ngawartakeun manehna sareng Tipper pernah ewean nu raos pisan saatos eleh di pemilu universitasna taun 2000). Panulisna seueur anu masihan pengaruh anu ageung kana acara berita parodi Jon Stewart sareng Stephen Colbert.

src: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence. Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall. At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up. Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.
mt: Protes dimimitian sakitar tabuh 11:00 waktu lokal (UTC+1) di Whitehall deukeut tina pintu masuk polisi di Downing Street, tempat tinggal resmi Perdana Menteri. Sareng tabuh 11:00, para protesor ngablockade lalakuan di Whitehall. Di tabuh 11:20, polisi ngajak para protesor pindah deui ka jalan, anu ngabahas yén polisi butuh ngabalance hak protes sareng lalakuan anu ngahampang. Sakitar tabuh 11:29, protes ngalir ka Whitehall, leuwih deukeut ti Trafalgar Square, ka Strand, leuwih deukeut ti Aldwych sareng ka Kingsway ka arah Holborn, di mana Partai Konservatif ngalaksanakeun Forum Musim Semi di Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.
ref: eta protes mimiti der tabuh 11:00 waktos satempat (UTC+1) di sebrang Whitehall, polisi ngajaga tempat asup ka Downing Street, tempat cicingna Perdana Menteri Saatos tabuh 11:00 jalmi nu protes minuhan jeung nyetop jalanan dina bagian gerbong kalér di Whitehall. Jam 11:20, polisi ménta pendémo pindah ka trotoar, ngomong bahwa anjeunna kudu nyaimbangkeun hak keur demo jeung kalancaran jalan. Kira-kira tabuh 11.29, anu protés sadayana gerak ka Whitehall, ngaliwatan Trafalgar Square, teras maju sapanjang Strand, teras ngaliwatan Aldwych naék ka Kingsway ngarah ka Holborn anu dimana Partéi Konsérvatif ngayakeun Forum Usum Semi di hotél Grand Connaught Rooms.

src: """We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic,"" he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days. Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes."

Dr. Ehud Ur, profésor bidang kedokteran di Universitas Dalhousie di Halifax, Nova Scotia sareng ketua divisi klinis sareng ilmiah ti Asosiasi Diabétés Kanada ngingetkeun yén panalungtikan ieu karék permulaan hungkul. src: The Twin Otter had been trying to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but had aborted once already. About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared. The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors. The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.
mt: Kapal Twin Otter geus nyoba nyerang landasan di Kokoda dina Senen minangka Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, tapi geus ngabatol saha-saha. Dina waktu anu teu kénéh, kapal éta geus ngalanggar landasan ti penerbangan kadua. Lokasi tumbuhi kapal éta ditempatkeun dina dinten Senen jeung teu bisa diakses ku sabab hirupna anu teu bisa dijangkau.
ref: Twin Otter nyobian ngadarat di Kokoda kamari salaku Maskapai PNG jeung nomor penerbangan CG4684 tapi kantos sakali dibatalkeun. Sakitar sapuluh menit pas waktuna ngadarat pas pisan saacan kapal éta ngaleungit kadua kalina. Tempat kacilakaan kapendak dinten ieu sareng lokasina hésé diakses nepikeun ka dua polisi diturunkeun ka leuweung pikeun naék ka tempat kajadian jeung malarian anu salamet. Prosés néang éta kawagel ku cuaca awon anu ogé jadi kusabab pendaratan dibatalkeun.

src: """Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene, as people tried to break windows in order to get out. People were hitting the panes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable. One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window,"" said survivor Franciszek Kowal."
mt: “Sangat beruntung, aja kénéh ngalaman, tapi aya seseorang anu ngalakukeun adegan mengerikan, minangka jalma-jalma nyoba nyobrok jendela pikeun keluar. Jalma-jalma ngagunakeun kursi pikeun nyobrok jendela, tapi jendela éta teu bisa dipatah. Salah sahiji jendela akhirna patah, jeung jalma-jalma mulai keluar lewat jendela,” ngomong penumpang Franciszek Kowal.
ref: "Untung teu aya kajadian nanaon ka kuring, tapi kuring ningali adegan anu pikasieuneun, sabab jalma coba ngarusak jandela pikeun kaluar. Jarelema ngagebugan pigura jandéla ku korsi, tapi jandélana teu tiasa rusak. Salah sahiji panel tungtungna peupeus, teras aranjeuna mulai kaluar liwat jandela, ""saur anu salamet Franciszek Kowal."

src: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday. As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.
mt: Angin tropis Danielle, angin tropis kaopat dina musim angin tropis Atlantik 2010, ngahasil di Atlantik Timur. Angin éta, anu lokasina kira-kira 3.000 mil di luar Miami, Florida, ngahasil angin ti 40 mil per jam (64 kph). Ilmuan di Pusat Angin Tropis Nasional ngabaguskeun Danielle bakal jadi angin hurikan di Rabu. Karena angin éta jauh ti daratan, teu bisa dipikirkeunna dampakna ka Amerika Serikat atawa Karibia.
ref: Badai Tropis Danielle, badai kaopat anu ngarana musim badai Atlantik 2010, geus kabentuk di Samudra Atlantik wetan. Topan anu lokasina sakitar 3.000 mil ti Miami, Florida, gaduh kecepatan angin maksimum 40 mph (64kph). Élmuwan di Pusat Badai Nasional ngaduga Danielle bakal nguatan janten topan dinten Rebo. Kusabab badaina jauh ti darat, masih hésé pikeun nganilai dampak poténsial ka Amérika Serikat atanapi Karibia.

src: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill. Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted. There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.
mt: Dr. Lee ogé ngomongkeun konflikna ngeunaan berita anu anak-anak di Turki kini geus ngalaman infeksi virus influenza A(H5N1) anu ngan ngan ngan geus ngalaman panyakit. Béda studi ngabahas yén panyakit éta kudu leuwih ngancem sebelumna tiasa ngabalukarkeun pandém global, katukur katukur. Aya konflik yén pasien tiasa ngabalukarkeun infeksi leuwih loba ku ngalakonan rutin harianna jikalau gejala influenza ngan ngan ngan.
ref: Dr. Lee ogé nembongkeun kasalempangna ngeunaan laporan yén murangkalih dina Turki atos terinfeksi flu bagong A (H5N1) tapi teu udur. Babaraha penelitian ngungkapkeun nyaeta panyawat eta kuduna heunteu maehan samemeh bisa nyebabkeun epidemi global, saurna. Aya kasalempang yén pasién tiasa nularkeun langkung seueur jalmi kalayan upami tetep ngajalankeun kagiatan sapopoé lamun gejala fluna teu ripuh.

src: As of the night of August 9, the eye of Morakot was about seventy kilometres away from the Chinese province of Fujian. The typhoon is estimated to be moving toward China at eleven kph.
mt: Kapuloan Taiwan ngalaporkeun yen mata Morakot jauhna 70 km ti wewengkung Cina Fujian. Morakot dipikirna ngalangkawat Cina dina 11 kph.
ref: Dina 9 Agustus peuting, pusat badai Morakot aya sakitar tujuh puluh kilometer ti provinsi Fujian, Tiongkok. Puting beliung dipastikeun nimpa China dina kecepatan sabelas kilométer per jam.

src: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.
mt: Presiden AS George W. Bush tiba di Singapura dina pagawéan tanggal 16 Nopémber, ngahasilkeun turunna minggaru Asia. Éta dijadikeun pikeun ngahadang pamimpin Singapura Wong Kan Seng sareng ngomongkeun masalah perdagangan sareng terorisme. Sanggeus minggaru minggaru dina pilihan umum, Bush ngomongkeun ka umum ngeunaan perluasan perdagangan di Asia.
ref: Présidén Amérika Serikat George W. Bush sumping di Singapura subuh kaping 16 Nopémber, mimitian wisata saminggu anjeunna di Asia. Anjeuna di tampi ku Wakil Perdana Menteri Singapura Wong Kan Seng teras ngadiskusikeun isu perdagangan sareng térorisme babarengan Perdana Menteri Singapura Lee Hsien Loong. Saatos saminggu éléh dina pertengahan pemilu, Bush ngomong ka panongton ngeunaan ékspansi dagang di Asia.

src: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages. An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.
mt: Announcement dina dinten éta ogé nambah komitmen pamaréntah anu diumumkeun dina bulan Maret taun ieu pikeun ngabéntangan gerbong tambahan. Gerbong tambahan 300 éta ngahasilkeun jumlah gerbong total 1,300 anu tiasa dipaké pikeun ngurangi kepadatan.
ref: Bewara dinten ieu oge manjangkeun komitmen pamarentah anu dilakukeun di bulan Maret taun ayeuna kanggo ngabiayaan gerbong tambahan. Tambihan 300 gerbong ngajadikeun total 1.300 gerbong jang ngabereskeun kapinuhan penumpang.

src: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday. It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October. The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.
mt: Martelly ngadegkeun CEP anyar ti sangaosna lima anggota dina Senen. Ieu mangrupa CEP kaopatna Martelly dina opat taun. Dina bulan nu lila, komisi présidénsial ngarekomendukeun CEP kaopatna Martelly ngaréngsékeun, salaku bagian tina paket tindakan pikeun ngarobah nagara ka arah éleksi anyar. Komisi éta mangrupa Martelly sapanjang protés anti-rejim nu kadang-kadang ngabalukarkeun tindakan kekerasan nu dimimitian dina Oktober. Protés éta dimimitian ku kagagalan pikeun ngalaksanakeun éleksi, sababaraha di antarana ti 2011.
ref: Martelly ngalantik Dewan Pamilihan Sementara (CEP) anu jumlahna salapan urang basa dinten kamari. Ieu teh CEP kalima Martelly dina 4 warsih. Sasih kamari komisi kepresidenan ngarekomendasikeun pengunduran diri CEP saacanna salaku bagian tina paket tindakan pikeun ngamajukeun negara di pemilu nu anyar. Komisi nyaéta réspon Martelly kana protés anti-rézim anu nyebar dina Oktober. Protes anu sakapeung dibarungan kekerasan eta dipicu ku kagagalan ngayakeun pemilihan umum, sababaraha di antarana saprak 2011.

src: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes. We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.
mt: USA Gymnastics ngabogaan pikeun Surat USOC jeung menerima kebutuhan mutlak ti keluarga Olimpiade pikeun ngamimitian lingkungan aman pikeun kabéh atlitna. Kami setuju jeung pernyataan USOC anu ngabogaan yén minatna atlit jeung klub, jeung olahragana, mungkin dipaké pikeun ngalangkahkeun perubahan nu boga arti dina organisasi, alih-alih decertification. USA Gymnastics ngabogaan pikeun panyelidikan nu mandiri anu tiasa ngabogaan cahaya pikeun ngabogaan bagaimana abusa nu dipaké dina proporsi anu dipaké sanggeus kacurangan ku para korban Larry Nassar bisa teu dipedulikeun pikeun saéngga lama jeung ngabogaan perubahan nu boga arti jeung nu boga arti. USA Gymnastics jeung USOC boga tujuan nu sarua — ngamimitian olahraga gymnastics, jeung lianna, anu aman sabab kabéh atlitna tiasa ngamimitian mimpi di lingkungan aman, positif jeung empowered.
ref: Kelompok Senam USA ngadukung surat Komite Olimpiade Amérika Serikat sareng narima sagala kabutuhan keur kaluwargi Olimpiade supados tiasa ngapromosikeun lingkungan nu aman keur atlet urang sadaya. Urang satuju sareng pernyataan USOC téh kapentingan atlit sareng klub urang, sareng olahragana, tiasa langkung saé kalayan maju jeung parobahan anu berarti di organisasi urang, tibatan penghapusan sértipikasi. Organisasi Senam USA ngadukung panyilidikan mandiri anu tiasa nyorot soal panyalahgunaan proporsi anu digambarkeun ku wantunna ku para penyintas Larry Nassar nepi ka teu kanyahoan sakitu lami sareng mencakup parobahan anu sesuai sareng diperlukeun. Organisasi Senam Nasional AS sareng USOC gaduh tujuan anu sami - ngusahakeun olahraga senam, sareng sajabana, saaman mungkin pikeun atlit nuturkeun impianna di lingkungan anu aman, positip sareng diberdayakeun.

src: "The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, ""The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship"". An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan."
mt: "Angkatan Laut AS ogé ngabéakakeun kasus éta. Dina pernyataan, ""Kru ayeuna ngalakukeun pikeun ngabédakeun cara anu tiasa aman pikeun ngahasilkeun kapal éta."" Kapal tipe Avenger kelas penanggulangan ranjau, kapal éta ngalayana ka Puerto Princesa di Palawan. Kapal éta ngabéakakeun kana Pasukan Laut AS ka tujuh sareng bérés di Sasebo, Nagasaki di Jepang."
ref: "Angkatan Laut AS oge nyarios lamun aranjeunna oge nuju mariksaan kajadian eta. Maranehna oge marere pernyataan, ""Awak kapal keur garawe neangan metode anu pang tepatna jang ngangkatkeun kapal jeung aman"". Kapal nu nyegah ranjau sakelas Avenger, kapalna keur di jalan ka Puerto Princesa di Palawan. Éta ditugaskeun ka Armada Katujuh Angkatan Laut AS anu markasna di Sasebo, Nagasaki di Jepang."

src: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria. The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.
mt: Kadua dina, Donald Trump, présidén AS, ngumumkeun dina pernyataan anu disampaan ku sekretaris pers, yén pasukan AS bakal ngeluarkeun Suriah. Umumna éta diumumkeun sabada Trump ngadahar telepon jeung Recep Tayyip Erdoğan, présidén Turki. Turki ogé bakal ngabagi tanggung jawab ngeureunkeun tahanan ISIS anu ditangkep, anu, pernyataan éta ngomong, nagara-nagara Eropa geus ngabéakkeun.
ref: Dinten Minggon siang, Presiden Amérika Donald Trump dina kalimah pernyataan nu dikintunkeun ku sekretarisna, nyarios yén tentara Amérika bakal ninggalkeun Syria. Pengumuman éta dicarioskeun saatos Trump nelpon présidén Turki Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turki ogé bakal ngurus pejuang ISIS anu ditangkep, saur pernyataan éta, nagara -nagara Éropa parantos nampik pikeun dibalikkeun.

src: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist. The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire. Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.
mt: Pasukan koalisi sareng pasukan Afganistan ngalakukeun pindah ka daérah éta pikeun nyegah tempat éta sareng pasukan koalisi séjén tiasa dipaké pikeun ngabantu. Kecelakaan éta ngarasa di daérah nu jauh di luhur di daérah gunung, jeung dipercaya yén kecelakaan éta tiasa jadi hasil tina panembakan tina musuh. Upaya pikeun nyaritakeun tempat éta dipatutkeun ku cuaca nu buruk sareng daérah nu kasar.
ref: Pasukan koalisi sareng pasukan Afghanistan pindah ka daérah éta pikeun ngamankeun lokasi sareng pesawat koalisi sanes tos dikirim pikeun ngabantosan. Kacalakaan kajadian di daerah pegunungan, jeung dipercaya akibat serangan musuh. Usaha néangan lokasi kacilakaan kahalang ku cuaca butut jeung medan anu lungkawing.

src: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted. This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats. As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub. Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.
mt: Kaputusan ngabangun dam taun 1963, banjir musiman anu ngababarkeun pasir di sepanjang sungai dihentikeun. Pasir éta tiasa dipaké pikeun ngahasilkeun sandbar sareng pantai, anu jadi habitat hirupan. Hasilna, dua spésiés ikan jadi punah, dua lian jadi punah, diantarana ikan chub. Walaupun tinggi air ngan bakal naik sakitar dua méter, para pejabat ngarasa yén ieu bakal cukup pikeun ngahasilkeun sandbar anu erosi di sepanjang sungai.
ref: Saatos bendungan di wangun di 1963, usum banjir anu bakal nyebarkeun sedimen panjang walungan di eureunkeun. Sédimén ieu diperyogikeun pikeun nyieun gundukan pasir jeung basisir nu gunana pikeun habitat sato liar. Hasilna, 2 spesies lauk janten punah sareng 2 anu sanesna terancam punah, kalebet humpback chub. Sanaos tingkat cai ngan bakal naék sababaraha meter saatos banjir, para pejabat ngarepkeun éta bakal cekap bisa ngabalikeun keusik anu ngikis ka hilir.

src: "The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that ""extremists from Somalia"" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up ""prominent landmarks"" in Ethiopia and Kenya."
mt: Konsulat Amerika Serikat di Nairobi, Kenya ngalaporkeun yen "ekstremis ti Somalia" nyiapkeun pikeun ngalakonkeun serangan bom bunuh diri di Kenya sareng Ethiopia. Amerika Serikat ngabéakna mibanda informasi ti sumber anu teu disebutkeun, anu ngabahas ngeunaan penggunaan bom bunuh diri pikeun ngabakar "tandang-tandang terkenal" di Ethiopia sareng Kenya.
ref: "Kedutaan Besar Amerika Serikat anu aya di Nairobi, Kénya ngaluarkeun peringatan yén ""ékstrémis ti Somalia"" ngarencanakeun serangan bom bunuh diri di Kénya sareng Éthiopia. A.S. nyatakeun yén nampi inpormasi ti sumber anu henteu didedahkeun sacara khusus anu nyebatkeun panggunaan pengebom bunuh diri pikeun ngancurkeun ""Landmark penting"" di Étiopia sareng Kenya."

src: "The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption. As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years. A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show ""Zoungla"" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption. Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour."
mt: "Hukumwan Yunani nu kasohor, Sakis Kechagioglou sareng George Nikolakopoulos geus di tahan di penjara Korydallus di Athena, sabab dihukum ku sabab ngarobah jeung korupsi. Sababna, skandal gedé di antara komunitas hukum Yunani geus diungkabkeun ku ngaluarkeun tindakan ilegal anu dilakukeun ku hakim, hukumwan, notaris sareng advokat di jaman saduluran. Beulah beulahna, sabada informasi anu dipublikasikeun ku jurnalis Makis Triantafylopoulos di acara televisi populer ""Zoungla"" di Alpha TV, anggota parlemén sareng hukumwan, Petros Mantouvalos dihukum ku sabab anggota kantornya geus ngarobah jeung korupsi. Saterusna, hakim top Evangelos Kalousis dihukum ku sabab korupsi sareng perilaku jeung degeneratif."
ref: "Pengacara Yunani nu terkenal, Sakis Kechagioglou jeung George Nikolakopoulus téh dipenjara di penjara Korydallus, Athena, sabab aranjeunna kanyahoan gratifikasi jeung korupsi. kusabab ieu, masalah gede di komunitas legal Yunani naek ku paparan aksi illegal anu dilakukeun ku hakim, sareng para pengacara di taun-taun katukang Sababaraha minggu lalu, saatos inpo éta diterbitkeun ku wartawan Makis Triantafylopoulos di acara tv nu terkenal ""Zoungla"" di Alpha TV, member parlemen jeung pengacara, Petros Mantouvalos diturunkeun jabatanna ti kantorna sabab pipiluen dina gratifikasi jeung korupsi nu ilégal. Salaku tambahan, hakim anu luhur Evangelos Kalousis dipenjara sabab anjeunna kanyahoan korupsi sareng paripolah anu goreng."

src: "The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption. As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years. A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show ""Zoungla"" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption. Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour."
mt: "Hukumwan Yunani nu kasohor, Sakis Kechagioglou sareng George Nikolakopoulos geus di tahan di penjara Korydallus di Athena, sabab dihukum ku sabab ngarobah jeung korupsi. Sababna, skandal gedé di antara komunitas hukum Yunani geus diungkabkeun ku ngaluarkeun tindakan ilegal anu dilakukeun ku hakim, hukumwan, notaris sareng advokat di jaman saduluran. Beulah beulahna, sabada informasi anu dipublikasikeun ku jurnalis Makis Triantafylopoulos di acara televisi populer ""Zoungla"" di Alpha TV, anggota parlemén sareng hukumwan, Petros Mantouvalos dihukum ku sabab anggota kantornya geus ngarobah jeung korupsi. Saterusna, hakim top Evangelos Kalousis dihukum ku sabab korupsi sareng perilaku jeung degeneratif."

Salaku tambahan, hakim anu luhur Evangelos Kalousis dipenjara sabab anjeunna kanyahoan korupsi sareng paripolah anu goreng."

src: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes. Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership. But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.
mt: Robin Uthappa ngahasilkeun skor pangalusna, 70 run dina 41 bola ku ngahit 11 empat sareng 2 enam. Batsman tengah, Sachin Tendulkar sareng Rahul Dravid, ngahasilkeun kumpulan 100 run. Tapi, sanggeus nyebabkeun wicket kapal, India ngahasilkeun 36 run sareng nyebabkeun 7 wicket pikeun ngahasilkeun inningna.
ref: Robin Uthappa ngadamel skor babak anu pangluhurna, 70 runs ku ngan 41 bal ku neunggeul 11 opat poin sareng 2 genep poin. Panakol kriket pertengahan, Sachin Tendulkar sareng Rahul Dravid, nampilkeun permaenan anu sae sareng nyetak saratus angka ku duaan. Tapi, saprak éléh kaptén wicket India ngan nyieun 36 lumpatan, éléh 7 wicket pikeun ngeureunkeun babak.

src: "Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month. ""He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."" The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media."

src: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was unhurt in the accident.
mt: Peter Lenz, seorang pembalap sepeda motor berusia 13 tahun, telah meninggal dunia setelah terlibat dalam kecelakaan di Indianapolis Motor Speedway. Sementara di lap panasnya, Lenz jatuh dari sepeda motor, dan kemudian terkena pembalap Xavier Zayat. Dia segera diperhatikan oleh staf medis di trek dan diangkut ke rumah sakit lokal di mana kemudian dia meninggal. Zayat tidak terluka dalam kecelakaan.
ref: Peter Lenz, pembalap motor umur 13 taun, pupus saatos tabrakan di Indianapolis Motor Speedway. Nalika dina pangkonan pamanasan , Lenz murag tina sapédah na, teras ditarajang ku sasami pembalap Xavier Zayat. Anjeunna langsung di rawat ku staf medis di tempat sareng di angkut ka rumah sakit lokal dimana anjeunna teras maot. Zayat heunteu raheut dina kacilakaan eta.

src: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event. It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have. For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.

src: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices. Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.
mt: Kini penerbangan udara henteu dipikirkeun langsung ku maskapai tanpa mimiti ngabandingkeun hargana. Kadang-kadang penerbangan éta bisa ngaharga béda-béda di agregator-agregator jeung henteu ngabutuhkeun pikeun ngabandingkeun hasil pikeun ngabutuhkeun.
ref: Ayeuna perjalanan udara jarang dipesen langsung ngalangkungan maskapai saacan milarian heula sareng ngabandingkeun hargana. Kadang penerbangan anu sarua oge hargana bisa beda dina sababaraha agregator jeung ngabayar keur ngabandingkeun nu muncul terus jeung oge ningali tina situs web saacan mesen.

src: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair. On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem. If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs. The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.
mt: Perusahaan kurir dipayun pikeun nyalurkeun barang lewat jalan anu siga. Kadang-kadang, waktu téh penting pikeun dokumén bisnis, barang dagang atawa bagian pikeun perbaikan anu siga. Di jalur-jalur anu siga, perusahaan-perusahaan gedéna mibanda pesawatna, tapi di jalur-jalur séjén sareng perusahaan-perusahaan séjén, aya masalah. Jika éta nyerangkeun barang lewat udara, di jalur-jalur siga, éta bisa ngahasilkeun dina poé-poé pikeun lewat unloading sareng imigrasi. Cara siga pikeun ngahasilkeun éta lewat siga pikeun nyalurkeun barangna minangka barang cek, anu siga, éta nyaéta di mana kana kana.
ref: Pausahaan kurir dibayar awis kanggo ngirimkeun barang kalawan énggal. Rémén ogé, waktos penting pisan kalawan dokumen bisnis, barang dagangan atawa suku cadang kanggo perbaikan anu nyedek. Di rute-rute tangtu, pangusahaan anu leuwih gede boga kapal sorangan, tapi jang rute lainna jeung pangusahaan anu leuwih leutik, aya masalah. Upami aranjeunna ngirimkeun barang ku angkutan udara, dina sababaraha rute, éta tiasa diperyogikeun sababaraha dinteun pikeun ngabongkar muatanna sareng sajabana. Hiji-hijina cara méh leuwih gancang nyaéta ngirimkeun dina koper. aturan maskapai moal ngijinkeun aranjeunna ngirim barang lamun teu aya panumpangna, anu jadi tujuan anjeun.

src: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully. Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.
mt: Anda perlu pilih maskapai penerbangan pilihan penerbangan paling sering di aliansi anu béda. Walaupun mungkin anda pikir anu logis pilih maskapai penerbangan anu paling sering anda terbang, anda perlu sadar yen hak-hak anu ditawarkeun sering kali béda sareng poin penerbangan paling sering mungkin leuwih gencar di maskapai penerbangan anu béda di aliansi anu sarua.
ref: Anjeun kedah milih maskapai Frequent Flyer anjeun dina gabungan sareng ati-ati. Sanaos anjeun mikir yén ngiringan maskapai anu anjeun anggo paling seueurna nyaéta intuitif, anjeun kudu sadar yén kaistiméwaan anu ditawarkeun sering béda jeung poin-poin frequent flyer tiasa langkung gampang diala dina maskapai anu béda tapi dina aliansi anu sami.

src: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully. Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.

Walaupun mungkin anda pikir anu logis pilih maskapai penerbangan anu paling sering anda terbang, anda perlu sadar yen hak-hak anu ditawarkeun sering kali béda sareng poin penerbangan paling sering mungkin leuwih gencar di maskapai penerbangan anu béda di aliansi anu sarua.

src: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important. Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol. Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.
mt: Minum minuman beralkohol dangan moderasi. Alkohol ngarugrugkeun sababaraha jalma, jeung ngerti batasna nyaéta nu penting. Bisa jadi panjang umur kesehatan tina nginum terlalu banyak bisa ngabalukarkeun kerusakan hati jeung bisa jadi buta jeung kematian. Potensi bahaya nyaéta nambah nalika nginum minuman beralkohol anu ngalaman produksi ilegal. Minuman beralkohol ilegal bisa ngandung berbagai macam impuritas berbahaya, termasuk methanol, anu bisa buta atawa kematian bahkan dalam dosis kecil.
ref: Nginum inuma beralkohol sacukupna. Alkohol ngaruhna béda-béda ka tiap jalmi, sareng apal watesan anjeun téh penting pisan. Kajadian kasehatan jangka paos anu manawi ti ngaleueut kaleuleuwihan tiasa kaasup karuksakan hate sarta sumawonten kebutaan sarta tiwasna. Bahaya potensial meningkat sabot mengonsumsi alkohol anu diproduksi sacara teu legal. Inuman ilegal tiasa ngandung bahan-bahan anu nyilakakeun nu salah sahijina metanol, anu bisa nyieun jalma buta sareng maot sanajan dosisna saeutik.

src: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam. The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.
mt: Kawasan Canal District (Basa Walanda: Grachtengordel) nyaéta kawasan terkenal abad ka-17 anu ngabingkung Binnenstad Amsterdam. Kabéh kawasan éta diangkat jadi Situs Warisan Dunia UNESCO pikeun nilai budaya sareng sejarahna anu unik, sareng nilai propertina di antara anu pangluhurna di nagara.
ref: Distrik Kanal (basa Belanda: Grachtengordel) nyaéta kawasan kasohor abad ka-17 anu ngurilingan Binnenstad, Amsterdam. Sadaya kabupaten ditunjuk salaku Warga Warisan Dunia UNESCO kusabab nilai budaya sareng sajarah anu unik, sareng péta milikana paling luhur di nagara éta.

src: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam. The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.

src: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile. A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake. The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.
mt: Phnom Krom, 12 km barat daya Siem Reap. Kuil puncak gunung ieu dibangun di akhir abad ka-9, nalika jaman Raja Yasovarman. Atmosfer kagangguan ku kuil sareng pemandangan di atas Danau Tonle Sap ngabutuhkeun pikeun ngalakukeun pendakian ka gunung. Kunjungan ka tempat ieu tiasa di kombinasikeun jeung perjalanan ka danau. Paspor anu ngabutuhkeun pikeun masuk ka kuil, jadi jangan lupa pikeun ngabawa paspor ka Tonle Sap.
ref: Phnom Krom, 12 km belah kidul na Siem Reap. Kuil di puncak gunung ieu diwangun di akhir abad ka 9, pas jaman pamarentahan Raja Yasovarman. Suasana pura anu suram ditambih pemandangan situ Tonle Sap bakal ngadamel pangalaman naék ka bukit moal tiasa dipohokeun. Ngunjungan ka situs éta tiasa dibarengkeun kalayan merenah sareng numpak parahu ka situ. Urang peryogi Angkor Pass kanggo lebet ka kuil, jadi ulah hilap nyandak paspor pas anjeun ka arah Tonle Sap.

src: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole. Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea. A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter. Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice. Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.
mt: Antartika nyaéta tempat anu paling beunghar di Bumi, jeung ngabentang di sekeliling Kutub Kidul. Kunjungan wisata mah mahal, ngaharapkeun fisik fit, jeung ngan bisa ngalakukeun dina musim Nov-Feb, jeung umumna terbatas di Semenanjung, Pulau-pulau sareng Laut Ross. Sajumlah staf ngahuni di musim panas di sababaraha dasar anu umumna di daérah-daérah éta; jumlah kecil ngahuni di musim dingin. Antartika daratan nyaéta dataran anu beunghar jeung dihulik ku 2-3 km es. Perjalanan udara spesialis kadang-kadang ngalakukeun keur gunung, atawa pikeun ngahampirkeun Kutub, anu ngadegkeun dasar anu gedé.
ref: Antartika nyaeta tempat anu paling tiis di Bumi jeung ayana di sakuriling kutub nu Kidul. Kunjungan wisata téh awis, ngabutuhkeun kabugaran fisik, ngan tiasa dilakukeun dina halodo atawa bulan November-Februari, sareng biasana diwatesan ngan ka Semenanjung, Kapuloan sareng Laut Ross. Babaraha rebu staff cicing di dieu keur usum panas di sakuriling opat lusin pangkalan anu sabagian gede araya di daerah eta; ngan saeutik anu ngendong di usum tiris. padalaman Antartika mangrupikeun dataran anu panjangna 2-3 km anu katutupan ku es. Tur udara spesialis kadang indit ka pedalaman, pikeun neteg gunung atanapi ngahontal Kutub, anu gaduh dasar anu ageung.

src: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education. As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times. Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.
mt: Observatorium pre-modern umumna teu dipaké deui, jeung mung mibanda fungsi museum, atawa tempat pendidikan. Karena polusi cahaya dina jaman éta teu jadi masalah anu sarua jeung ayeuna, observatorium éta umumna lokasina di kota atawa di kampus, anu leuwih gampang dijangkau ti observatorium anu dibangun dina jaman modérn. Teleskop penelitian modérn umumna leuwih gedé, jeung lokasina di tempat anu jauh, jeung anu ngahasilkeun kondisi atmosfir anu sarua.
ref: Observatorium anu pra-modéren biasana tinggaleun jaman, tapi tetep janten musium, atanapi loka pendidikan. Kusabab polusi cahaya di jaman kajayaan na sanés jinis masalah ayeuna, aranjeunna biasana aya di kota atanapi di kampus, langkung gampang kahontal tibatan anu diwangun dina jaman modéren. Teleskop panilitian nu moderen teh nyaeta pasilitas ageung di daerah kampung anu cuacana alus.

src: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas. North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. They are almost all sandy beaches with safe swimming, and most have shade provided by pohutukawa trees. Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland. These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe.
mt: Salah sahiji pantai di Auckland, Selandia Anyar, nyaéta pantai Mission Bay, di mana aya hiji taman anu dipaké pikeun olahraga.
ref: Aya seueur pantai, kusabab Auckland gaduh 2 palabuan. Anu paling kasohorna aya di 3 kawasan. Pantai North Shore (di distrik harbok kidul) nu aya di Samudra Pasifik jeung nu ngabentang ti Long Bay di kidul nepi ka Devonport di kaler. Hampir kabeh pantai keusikna aman jang ngojay jeung iyuh margi tatangkalan pohutukawa. Pantai Tamaki Drive aya di Palabuan Waitemata, di pinggireun kota kelas luhur Mission Bay sareng Saint Heliers di Central Auckland. Ieu pantai kaluarga anu kadang ramé ku toko-toko anu alus ngajajar sisi cai. Ngojay aman.

src: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population. There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike. Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis. Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.
mt: Harus dipikirkeun yén kana tempat éta nyaéta situs makam masal, anu ogé situs anu ngandung arti nu hampir ngabenerkeun pikeun bagian penting ti populasi dunya. Aya masih loba lalaki sareng awéwé anu masih hidup anu ngalaman waktu éta, jeung loba anu ngadahar kana lalaki sareng awéwé anu ngalaman kematian atawa dipaksa kerja di tempat éta, Yahudi sareng non-Yahudi. Tiasa dipakékeun dina tempat éta jeung sisi nu ngahormat, ngabenerkeun sareng ngabenerkeun. Jangan ngomong hal-hal anu ngajengkeun kana Holocaust atawa Nazi. Jangan ngabenerkeun tempat éta ku ngarobah atawa ngagrisi.
ref: Punten émut yén anjeun ngadatangan situs kuburan masal, ogé situs ieu gaduh makna anu teu kaitung kangge kalolobaan penduduk di dunya. Seeur kénéh lalaki sareng awéwé anu salamet sareng linggih di dieu, sareng seueur ogé anu gaduh jalmi nu dipikacinta anu dibunuh atanapi di paksa gawe dugi ka maot didinya, badé urang Yahudi atanapi non-Yahudi. Perlakukeun situs iyeu jeung pinuh martabat, khidmat, jeung rasa hormat sapantesna. Ulah ngajadikeun Holocaust atawa Nazi salaku banyolan. Ulah ngarusak loka kalawan nandaan atawa nyoret-nyoret grafiti ka jero struktur.

src: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating. They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.
mt: Basa bantu nyaéta basa anu dijieun pikeun ngahalangkeun komunikasi antara urang-urang anu séjén, anu teu bisa ngomong basa séjén. Ieu béda jeung basa franca, anu nyaéta basa alamiah anu jadi dominan pikeun komunikasi antara urang-urang anu séjén.
ref: Auxiliary languages nyaeta basa jijieunan nu dianggo keur tujuan ngagampangkeun komunikasi kanggo jalmi-jalmi anu jigana gaduh masalah dina berkomunikasi. Aranjeunna dipisahkeun ti lingua francas, anu mangrupikeun basa alami atanapi organik anu parantos janten dominan pikeun 1 sareng sababaraha alesan minangka cara komunikasi antawis panyatur basa anu sanés.

src: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected. Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).
mt: Jika melintasi Laut Baltik Utara di musim dingin, cek lokasi kabin, karena melewati es menyebabkan suara yang sangat menakutkan bagi mereka yang paling terpengaruh. Saint Petersburg cruises termasuk waktu di kota. Penumpang kapal pesiar bebas dari persyaratan visa (cek syarat-syaratnya).
ref: Upami ngaléwat ka Baltic Kalér di musim dingin, pariksa lokasi kabin, sababna ngaléwatan és téh sok seeur suara bising nu bakal ngaganggu anjeun. Palayaran Saint Petersburg kalebet waktos di kota. Panumpang pesiar di bébaskeun tina sarat visa (parios saratna).

src: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish. However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language. Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities. Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
mt: Barcelona resmi ngagunakeun basa Catalan sareng basa Spanyol. Sauténa nyaritakeun basa Catalan, saprakurangna ngaharapkeun basa Catalan, sareng hampir kabéh ngaharapkeun basa Spanyol. Aya deui, tanda-tanda umum dipakékeun dina basa Catalan sababna éta basa jadi basa resmi. Aya deui, basa Spanyol dipakékeun dina transportasi umum sareng fasilitas séjénna. Pangumuman régulér dina Metro dipakékeun dina basa Catalan, tapi gangguan tina jalur anu teu régulér dipakékeun dina sistem otomatis dina sababaraha basa, di antarana basa Spanyol, basa Inggris, basa Perancis, basa Arab sareng basa Jepang.
ref: Bahasa resmi Barcelona nyaeta Catalan sareng Spanyol. Hampir satengahna leuwih milih nyarios nganggo bahasa Catalan, kumargi seueur jalmi anu ngartos, sareng hampir sadaya jalmi nganggo na bahasa Spanyol. Tapi, kalolobaan tanda-tanda ngan dipintonkeun ku basa Katalan saukur sabab atos ditetepkeun ku hukum éta teh janten basa resmi kahiji. nanging, Bahasa Spanyol teh geus loba nu make dina transportasi umum jeung fasilitas nu sejena Pangumuman di Metro biasana diumumkeun dina basa Catalan, tapi upami aya gangguan anu teu direncanakeun diumumkeun ku sistem anu otomatis dina sababaraha basa kalebet basa Spanyol, basa Inggris,basa Perancis, Arab sareng basa Jepang.

src: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish. However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language. Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities. Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
mt: Barcelona resmi ngagunakeun basa Catalan sareng basa Spanyol. Sauténa nyaritakeun basa Catalan, saprakurangna ngaharapkeun basa Catalan, sareng hampir kabéh ngaharapkeun basa Spanyol. Aya deui, tanda-tanda umum dipakékeun dina basa Catalan sababna éta basa jadi basa resmi. Aya deui, basa Spanyol dipakékeun dina transportasi umum sareng fasilitas séjénna. Pangumuman régulér dina Metro dipakékeun dina basa Catalan, tapi gangguan tina jalur anu teu régulér dipakékeun dina sistem otomatis dina sababaraha basa, di antarana basa Spanyol, basa Inggris, basa Perancis, basa Arab sareng basa Jepang.
ref: Bahasa resmi Barcelona nyaeta Catalan sareng Spanyol. Hampir satengahna leuwih milih nyarios nganggo bahasa Catalan, kumargi seueur jalmi anu ngartos, sareng hampir sadaya jalmi nganggo na bahasa Spanyol. Tapi, kalolobaan tanda-tanda ngan dipintonkeun ku basa Katalan saukur sabab atos ditetepkeun ku hukum éta teh janten basa resmi kahiji. nanging, Bahasa Spanyol teh geus loba nu make dina transportasi umum jeung fasilitas nu sejena Pangumuman di Metro biasana diumumkeun dina basa Catalan, tapi upami aya gangguan anu teu direncanakeun diumumkeun ku sistem anu otomatis dina sababaraha basa kalebet basa Spanyol, basa Inggris,basa Perancis, Arab sareng basa Jepang.

src: In developed countries today, providing deluxe bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art-form. At the top end, B&Bs obviously compete mainly on two main things: bedding and breakfast. Accordingly, at the finest such establishments one is apt to find the most luxurious bedding, maybe a handmade quilt or an antique bed. Breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish. The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.
mt: Di negara-negara nu beunghar ayeuna, nyadiakeun tempat tidur jeung sarapan mah diangkat jadi seni. Di puncakna, B&Bs tiasa ngahadang kompetisi di dua hal utama: tempat tidur jeung sarapan. Akibatna, di tempat-tempat B&B nu paling bagus, tempat tidur mah tiasa ngahasilkeun tempat tidur nu paling mewah, mungkin kaus tangan atawa tempat tidur antik. Sarapan mah tiasa ngahasilkeun kagunan musiman ti wewengkén atawa masakan khusus ti tuan rumah. Tempatna mah tiasa jadi bangunan bersejarah jeung antik, taman anu dirawat jeung kolam renang.
ref: Di nagara maju ayeuna, nyayogikeun tempat kulem sareng sarapan mewah téh parantos di tingkatkeun janten salah sahiji bentuk seni. Pamustunganana, B&B jelas bersaing utamina dina 2 poin utama: ranjang sareng sarapan. Ku sabab éta, di tempat-tempat anu panghadéna siga kitu, jalmi biasana mendakan kasur anu pangméwahna, atawa simbut jieunan leungeun atawa ranjang anu antik. Sarapan tiasa kalebet hidangan musiman daérah atanapi tuangeun ciri khas pribumi. Tataanna tiasa mangrupikeun gedong kolot bersajarah kalayan parabot antik, pakarangan anu dijaga saé tur aya kolam renang.

src: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.
mt: Kota Beijing di Cina bakal jadi kota tuan rumah Olimpiade Musim Dingin 2022, anu bakal jadi kota munggaran anu ngahost Olimpiade musim panas sareng musim dingin. Beijing bakal ngahost upacara pembukaan sareng upacara penutupan sareng acara es di dalam. Acara ski séjénna bakal di Taizicheng ski area di Zhangjiakou, 220 km (140 mil) ti Beijing.
ref: Kota Beijing di Cina bakal jadi tuan rumah Olimpiade Usum Tiris taun 2022, anu bakal ngajadikeun Beijing janten kota munggaran anu ngayakeun Olimpiade usum panas jeung usum tiris sakaligus. Beijing bakal janten tuan rumah di upacara pamuka sareng pamungkas acara es jero ruhang. Acara ski sanésna bakal diayakeun di aréa ski Taizicheng di Zhangjiakou, kira-kira 220 km (140 mil) ti Béijing.

src: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal. Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.
mt: Flu burung, atawa anu leuwih resmi avian influenza, tiasa ngajamahkeun manusa sareng burung. Leuwih kurang ti hiji ribu kasus anu pernah dilaporkeun keur manusa, tapi sababaraha di antarana tiasa fatal. Banyakna anu ngalibetkeun manusa anu nyambung jeung ayam, tapi aya ogé risiko keur burung ngebet.
ref: Flu manuk, atawa leuwih dikenal ku flu unggas, tiasa ngainféksi manuk sareng mamalia. Leuwih saeutik ti sarébu kasus dilaporkeun dina manusa, tapi sabagianana parah. Lolobana ngalibatkeun jalma-jalma anu damel ngurus unggas, tapi aya ogé anu résiko pikeun jalmi nun ningalian manuk-manuk.

src: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get. The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes. Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.
mt: Viking ngagunakeun jalur air Rusia pikeun leuwih deukeut ka Laut Hitam sareng Laut Kaspi. Bagian tina jalur éta tiasa dipaké. Cek keperluan kawajiban spésial, anu mungkin teu gampang pikeun dipiké.
ref: Viking nganggo jalur laut Rusia pikeun angkat ka Laut Hideung sareng Laut Kaspia. Sabagian jalur ieu téh nepi ka ayeuna masih tiasa dianggo. Pariksa kamungkinan kudu gaduh ijin khusus, anu panginten sesah ditampi. White Sea-Baltic Canal téh ngahubungkeun Arctic Ocean ka Baltic Sea, ngaliwatan Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga jeung Saint Petersbrug, lolobana dihubungkeun jeung walungan sareng situ. Situ Onega ogé nyambung ka Volga, janten sumping ti Laut Caspian liwat Russia masih tiasa dilakukeun.

src: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle. In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains. On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.
mt: Kontrol imigrasi biasana jadi stop pertama nalika turun ti pesawat, kapal, atawa mobil. Dina beberesan lintas batas, kontrol biasana dilakukeun dina mobil beberesan sareng kudu ngahasilkeun ID valid nalika naik mobil beberesan. Dina mobil beberesan tidur, paspor biasana dikumpulkeun ku konduktor supaya kalian teu dipingpinkeun nalika tidur.
ref: Pos pamariksaa imigrasi biasana panglirenan mimiti nalika turun ti pesawat, kapal, atanapi kendaraan anu sanes. Dina sababaraha karéta lintas-nagara, pamariksaan dilaksanakeun dina karéta anu keur jalan sareng anjeun kedah gaduh kartu idéntitas anu diakui lamun numpak salah sahiji karéta éta. Nalika bobo dina karéta wengi, paspor tiasa dikumpulkeun ka konduktor supados anjeun henteu kaganggu pas nuju bobo..

src: "Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving. But being placed in the ""high tropics"" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely)."
mt: Singapura umumna hiji tempat anu aman jeung nyaman pikeun dihuni, jeung tiasa dipaké sababaraha barang. Tapi, Singapura aya di "tropis tinggi" nu ngan 2 derajat di luhur garis katungkulan, tiasa dipaké sababaraha barang.
ref: "Umumna Singapura mangrupa tempat anu aman pisan sareng gampang pikeun napigasi, teras anjeun tiasa mésér nanaon waé saatos sumping. Tapi ku margi ditempatkeun di daérah ""tropis luhur"" ngan sawatara darajat kaléreun katulistiwa, anjeun kedah kuat ngarasakeun panasna (salawasna) sareng panonpoé anu kuat (nalika langit lénglang, langkung langki)."

src: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria. Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer. Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee. If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.
mt: Kue Jerman umumna bagus, jeung di Bavaria, umumna leuwih luhur jeung boga ragam, sarua jeung kue-kue di negara tetanggana kidulna, Austria. Kue buah umumna aya, jeung apel dipanggang jadi kue ti saprak taun, jeung ceri sareng plum munculna dina musim panas. Boga kue-kue Jerman ogé ngahasilkeun almon, hazelnut, jeung kacang-kacang ti pohon lianna. Kue-kue populer umumna nangtukeun kacampur jeung kopi kuat. Jika kalian geus ngahaja kue-kue leutik tapi luhur, coba kue-kue Berliner, Pfannkuchen atawa Krapfen.
ref: kue-kue kering ti Jerman raos pisan, sareng di Bavaria, bede-beda sareng kaya pisan rasana, sami siga tatangga palih kiduleun na nyaeta Austria Kueh buah nyaeta hal nu biasa, sareng apel anu dipalah janten kuéh sapanjang taun, teras céri sareng plum nu mecenghul nalika usum panas. Seueur tuangeun Jérman anu dipanggang sok ayaan kacang almon, kacang hazel, jeung kacang-kacang nu sanesna. Kuéh-kuéh anu kasohor biasana sok dipasangkeun jeung sagelas kopi lekoh. Upami anjeun hoyong pastry  anu alit tapi seer rasana, cobian  we pastry nu namina teh tergantung kana daérah na, kadang disebut na teh Berliner, Pfannkuchen atanapi Krapfen.

src: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that. Basically, they fall into two categories: Either work while you travel or try and limit your expenses. This article is focused on the latter. For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to push expenses down close to zero, see minimum budget travel. The advice assumes that travellers do not steal, trespass, participate in the illegal market, beg, or otherwise exploit other people for their own gain.
mt: Jika kalian geus ngalaman dunya pikeun murah, pikeun keperluan, gaya hidup atawa tantangan, aya sababaraha cara pikeun ngalakukeunna. Umumna, éta jadi dua kategori: atawa kerja sarta ngalakukeun perjalanan atawa nyumponan pikeun ngurangi ékspénsi. Artikel ieu geus fokus pikeun kategori séjénna. Pikeun anu geus ngalakukeun pikeun ngurangi ékspénsi ka sakitar nol, lihat perjalanan pikeun anggaran minimum. Saran ieu ngabutuhkeun anu teu ngarobah, ngalakukeun tindakan tatu, ngalakukeun pasar ilegal, ngalakukeun, atawa ngalakukeun tindakan séjénna pikeun kepentingan pikeun ngalakukeunna.
ref: Upami anjeun hoyong ameung ningalan dunya tapi irit, pikeun kabutuhan, gaya atanapi tantangan, aya sababaraha cara pikeun ngalaksanakeuna. Dasarna, anjeun ka golongkeun kana 2 kategori, dianggo nalika anjeun ngarambat atanapi nyobian ngawatesan biaya anjeun. Tulisan ieu difokuskeun anu terakhir. Kanggo maranehanana anu rela ngorbankeun kanyamanan, wanci, sarta kapastian kanggo nyorong pengeluaran nu paling saeutik, tingal anggaran minimum. Naséhat sapertos kitu nganggap yén palancong ulah maok, ngeliwatan bates, ilubiung dina pasar ilegal, ngemis, atanapi ngaeksploitiasi batur pikeun kapentingan sorangan.

src: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain. If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate. Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise. Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.
mt: Jarak antara Point Marion jeung Fairmont nyadiakeun kondisi paling ngalanggaran pikeun ngeganggu mobil di jalan Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, ngalir leuwih loba lewat daérah hutan isolat. Jika kalian teu asupan pikeun ngeganggu di jalan daérah, jaga pikiran kalian: lereng curam, lebar jalan, jeung lengkung tajam dominan. Spesipikasi kecepatan anu diatur di luar biasa leuwih loba ti dina bagian-bagian séjénna — umumna 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — jeung kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana
ref: Panjang antara Point Marion sareng Fairmont nyayogikeun sababaraha kaayaan nyetir anu paling nangtang di Jalan Raya Buffalo-Pittsburgh, seringna ngalewatan daerah pedalaman nu terpencil. Upami anjeun henteu biasa nyetir dina jalan pilemburan, jaga fokus anjeun: tanjakan anu curam, jalur anu leutik, jeung jalan nu loba péngkolan nukik. Wates kacepetan anu diumumkeun jauh langkung handap tina ruas jalan sateuacana sareng anu salajengna — biasana 35-40 mil/jam (56-64 km/jam) — sareng anu minuhan peraturan langkung penting tibatan anu sanés. Anéhna, sinyal telepon sélulér téh langkung kiat di dieu ti batan sapanjang ruteu séjénna, contona Pennsylvania Wilds.

src: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain. If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate. Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise. Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.
mt: Jarak antara Point Marion jeung Fairmont nyadiakeun kondisi paling ngalanggaran pikeun ngeganggu mobil di jalan Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, ngalir leuwih loba lewat daérah hutan isolat. Jika kalian teu asupan pikeun ngeganggu di jalan daérah, jaga pikiran kalian: lereng curam, lebar jalan, jeung lengkung tajam dominan. Spesipikasi kecepatan anu diatur di luar biasa leuwih loba ti dina bagian-bagian séjénna — umumna 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — jeung kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana kakuatan pati kana

Wates kacepetan anu diumumkeun jauh langkung handap tina ruas jalan sateuacana sareng anu salajengna — biasana 35-40 mil/jam (56-64 km/jam) — sareng anu minuhan peraturan langkung penting tibatan anu sanés. src: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water. Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).
mt: Kanyoning (atawa: kanyoneering) nyaéta ngejalan di dasar kanyon, anu bisa kering atawa penuh jeung banyu. Kanyoning ngahubungkeun éléman tina ngejalan, ngejalan, ngejalan sareng ngejalan--tapi butuh latihan jeung bentuk fisik nu leuwih sedeng pikeun mulai (bandingkeun jeung rock climbing, scuba diving atawa alpine skiing, pikeun conto).
ref: Canyoning (atanapi: canyoneering) nyaéta perkawis badé ka jero talaga, teu mikiran talagana téh garing atawa eusianna pinuh ku cai. Ngalalana di jurang ngahijikeun sababaraha kagiatan sapertos ngojay, naék gunung sareng luluncatan--tapi ngabutuhkeun sakedik latihan atanapi awak nu kuat pikeun mulaina (dibandingkeun sareng naék gawir, neuleum, atanapi ski di alpen).

src: "Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity. Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations. Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention. In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to ""camp"". Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down."
mt: "Ngarak ngaliwatan mobil pribadimu sareng ngalakonan perjalanan jauh ngan ngangetkeun. Tapi, unggal mobil leuwih gedé, kalian bisa nyadarkeun kana mobil kalian sareng ngangetkeun kana keterbatian kana mobil kalian. Ngarak ngaliwatan mobil kalian bisa jadi ngangetkeun kana ngarangkeun tenda di tempat pribadi atawa di kota anu ngangetkeun. Dina kataran, ngarangkeun tenda ngaliwatan mobil bisa jadi ngangetkeun kana ngarangkeun tenda ngaliwatan mobil, tapi henteu ngangetkeun kana ngarangkeun tenda ngaliwatan mobil."
ref: "Asup ka mobil anjeun jeung ngalakukeun perjalanan jauh  ngagaduhan daya tarik intrinsik dina kesederhanaanana. Heunteu sapertos kanaraan anu leuwih gede, maneh tiasa wae geus wauh pisan mobil maneh jeung nyaho batas kamampuannana. Ngadegkeun tenda di properti pribadi atawa di dayeuh kalawan ukuran sabaraha oge tiasa gampil metot perhatian anu henteu dipikahayang. Singkatna, nganggo mobil anjeun mangrupikeun cara anu saé kangge perjalanan darat, tapi jarang pisan dianggo pikeun ""kémping"". Kémping dina mobil tiasa waé upami anjeun gaduh mobil nu ageung, SUV, sedan, atawa Station Wagon anu korsi na ngagolér."
