src: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after an earthquake in 1755. The Moroccan sultan rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya and it was given the name Casablanca by Spanish traders who established trading bases there. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in all of Morocco. Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.
mt: Kota modern Casablanca didirikan ku nelayan Berber dina abad ka-10 SM, jeung dipaké ku Fenisia, Romawi, sareng Merenid minangka pelabuhan strategis anu katelah Anfa. Portugis ngabéntang éta jeung ngarékonstruksi dina ngaran Casa Branca, tapi ngabéntang éta sanggeus gempa dina taun 1755. Sultan Maroko ngarékonstruksi kota éta minangka Daru l-Badya jeung dipaké ngaran Casablanca ku pedagang Spanyol anu ngadegkeun basis dagangna di éta. Casablanca salah sahiji tempat paling ngan ngan pikeun ngaburu di sakabéh Maroko. Di sekeliling kota lama éta, gampang pikeun ngaburu tempat anu nyediakeun barang-barang tradisional Maroko, saperti tagine, keramik, barang-barang kulit, hookah, sareng spektrum gegegaw, tapi ieu pikeun turis.
ref: Kota modern Casablanca diadegkeun ku pamayang Berber di abad ka 10 SM, teras dianggo ku bangsa Fenisia, Romawi, sareng Merenid janten palabuhan strategis nu disebut Anfa. Portugis ngancurkeun jeung diwangun deui eta make ngaran Casa Branca ngan ukur ditinggalkeun sanggeus lini di 1755. Sultan Maroko ngawangun deui kota janten Daru l-Badya sareng dingaranan Casablanca ku padagang Spanyol anu netepkeun padagangan diditu. Casablanca téh salah sahiji tempat anu paling metot di sakuriling Maroko kanggo balanja. Sakuriling Madinah anu lami mah, anjeun tiasa gampil mendakan tempat-tempat anu ngajual barang tradisional Maroko, sapertos tagine, karajinan, barang kulit, hookah, jeung spéktrum Geegaw, tapi éta téh sadayana kanggo turis.

src: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron. Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca. Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.
mt: Ka lor jeung deukeut jeung aya kota romantis sareng menarik Sintra anu jadi terkenal ka warga asing sanggeus akun terangna ngeunaan kejayaanna anu ditulis ku Lord Byron. Bus Scotturb 403 aya anu leuwih sering ka Sintra, ngalangkahkan di Cabo da Roca. Ogé ka lor, kunjungilah Sangkakéta Bunda Maria Fatima (Shrine), tempat apparition Marian dunya.
ref: Di palih kalér nu gampil didongkapan aya kota saé sareng romantis Sintra nu kakoncara ku turis asing saatos kaéndahanna dicatet ku Tuan Byron. Beus Scotturb 403 biasana indit unggal poe ka Sintra, ereun di Cabo da Roca. Teras di bagéan kalér, cobian dongkap ka wangunan suci Our Lady of Fatima (Kuil), tempat nampakna Maria anu kakoncara di sakumna dunya.

src: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris. With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it. Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
mt: Dina taun 1994, daérah Nagorno-Karabakh nu etnis Armenia di Azerbaijan ngalakonkeun perang ka Azeri. Dengan bantuan Armenia, republik anyar diadegkeun. Namun, ti hiji nagara nu jadi - bahkan Armenia - ngalakukeun pamegat resmi ngabenerkeun éta. Diplomatic perdebatan ngeunaan daérah éta ngahamburkeun hubungan antara Armenia sareng Azerbaijan.
ref: Di taun 1994, suku Nagorno-Karabakh Arménia di wilayah Azérbaijan perang ngalawan suku Azeris. Ku ayana dukungan ti Arménia, républik anu anyar tiasa diciptakeun. Nanging, teu aya nagara anu ngaku ieu nagara secara resmi , bahkan Arménia ogé'. Argumen diplomatik ngeunaan wewengkon eta teras ngarusak hubungan antawis Armenia sarta Azerbaijan.

src: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families. Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around. In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially. Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances. There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.
mt: Salah sahiji titik kuat ti Charlotte, Carolina Kidul, nyaéta yén aya abadana leuwih ti pilihan anu kualitasna handap pikeun kulawarga. Warga ti wewengkongna sering ngalaporkeun yén pilihan anu ramah pikeun kulawarga nyaéta salah sahiji alasan utama pikeun pindah ka Charlotte, sareng para tamu sering nyaritakeun yén kota éta gampang pikeun dihaturkeun ku anak-anak. Dina 20 taun pangalaman, jumlah pilihan anu ramah pikeun kulawarga di Uptown Charlotte tiasa ngalaman paningkatan eksponensial. Taksi henteu umum dipaké ku kulawarga di Charlotte, tapi bisa dipaké dina sababaraha kasus. Aya tambahan biaya pikeun ngahargaan leuwih ti 2 penumpang, jadi pilihan éta bisa leuwih mahal ti pangabutuhna.
ref: Salah sahiji kaleuwihan di Charlotte, Carolina Kalér, nyaéta seueur pilihan-pilihan anu saé pikeun kulawarga. Warga ti daérah séjén osok nyebatkeun karamahan kaluwarga salaku alesan utama ngalih kadinya, sareng pengunjung osok ngarasa kota éta gampil dinikmati bari nyandak budak. Di 20 taun kapengker, jumlah pilihan nu aman kanggo murangkalih di Uptown Charlotte téh nambihan meuni seueur. Taksi umumna henteu dianggo ku kaluwargi-kaluwargi di Charlotte, sanajan aya gunana dina kaayaan anu tangtu. Kudu mayar leuwih pikeun ngangkut langkung ti 2 panumpang teh, janten pilihan ieu tiasa langkung mahal tibatan ti nu diperlukeun.

src: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile. The Mapuche were also one of the last independent American indigenous groups, that were not fully absorbed into Spanish-speaking rule until after Chile's independence. Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (amid the Napoleonic wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a couple of years), decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.
mt: Sebelum Spanyol datang dina abad ka-16, Chile kalér di bawah pamaréntahan Inka sarta suku Araucanians (Mapuche) ngahuni Chile tengah sareng kidul. Mapuche ogé salah sahiji suku asli Amérika nu paling pati ngahiji ka pamaréntahan Spanyol nu ngahiji ka pamaréntahan Chile nu merdéka. Walaupun Chile ngumumkeun merdéka dina taun 1810 (amid Perang Napoleon nu ngabalukarkeun Spanyol teu bisa ngahasilkeun pamaréntahan nu boga kakuatan pikeun dua taun), kemenangan nu ngahasilkeun merdéka teu bisa dipastikeun teuas dina taun 1818.
ref: Sateuacan Spanyol sumping dina abad ka-16, Chili kalér aya dina kakawasaan Inca sedengkeun urang pribumi Araucanians (Mapuche) cicing di Chili tengah sareng kidul. Mapuche ogé mangrupikeun salah sahiji kelompok pribumi Amérika terakhir anu mandiri, henteu sapinuhna nyerep kana pamaréntahan anu nganggo basa Spanyol dugi ka saatos kemerdekaan Chili. Sanaos Chili nyatakeun kamerdekaanana di taun 1810 (di tengah Perang Napoleon nu ninggalkeun Spanyol tanpa pamarentahan pusat anu aya gunana sababaraha taun), kameunangan anu nentukeun pikeun Spanyol henteu katepi nepi ka taun 1818.

src: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria. They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List. Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea. Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.
mt: Cinque Terre, anu hartina Lima Tanah, ngandung lima desa kecil di pantai Italia di wilayah Liguria. Éta diatur dina daftar warisan dunya UNESCO. Dina abad-abad, jalma ngagangguan ngalakukeunna di luhur tebing nu ngalir ka laut. Sajaba ti éta, jalma ngagangguan ngalakukeunna di luhur tebing nu ngalir ka laut. ref: Cinque Terre anu boga harti 5 bumi, ngandung 5 kampung basisir alit nyaéta Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza jeung Monterosso anu aya dina propinsi Liguria di Italia. Éta teh didaftarkeun dina Daftar Pusaka UNESCO. Salila saabad, jelema geus ngabangun teras di luhur lanskap terjal jeung curam tepat diluhur jurang anu ngahareupan ka laut. Salah sahiji daya tarikna téh nyaéta kurangna pengembangan perusahaan nu katingali. Jalan satapak, karéta, sareng kapal téh anu nyambungkeun kampung-kampung, sareng mobil mah teu tiasa lebet upami ti luar.

src: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps. At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient. The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures. Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole. Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.
mt: Kabeh kasus paling umum pikeun kecelakaan dina musim dingin nyaéta jalan-jalan, jalan-jalan (sidewalks) sareng khususna tangga. Minimna, anjeun butuh sepatu anu bokongna cocok. Sepatu musim panas umumna teu cocok dina es sareng salju, bahkan sababaraha sepatu musim dingin teu cukup. Paternna kudu luhur, 5 mm (1/5 inci) atawa leuwih, sareng bahan anu lemes dina suhu dingin. Sababaraha sepatu ngandung stik sareng aya tambahan anu cocok pikeun sepatu sareng sepatu musim dingin, pikeun bokongna atawa bokongna sareng bokongna. Bokongna kudu luhur sareng lebar. Pasir, batu sareng garam (klorida kalsium) biasa diparabkeun dina jalan-jalan atawa jalur pikeun nambahkeun tahanan.
ref: Alesan kacilakaan di usum tiis nu pang umumna nyaéta jalan anu leueur, trotoar (sisi jalan), sareng hususna tanjakan. Sahenteuna, anjeun butuh sapatu anu sol na sasuai. Sapatu usum panas kan biasana leueur ai dina és sareng salju, malah sababaraha sapatu usum tiis ge kirang cekap. Polana kedah cukup jero, 5 mm (1/5 inci) atawa langkung, sareng bahanna kudu halus dina suhu anu tiis. sabagean sapatu ngabogaan paku, malihan mah aya oge paku kanggo sapatu tambihan ameh sapatu henteu leueur dina usum baseuh, cocok pisan pikeun kalobaan sapatu, pikeun hak sapatu jeung sol na oge. Hak sapatu téh kudu péndék jeung lebar. Keusik, batu-batu leutik atawa uyah (kalsium klorida) biasana disebar di jalan méh nambah napel.

src: "The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean. With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as ""Hawaii down under"". Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."
mt: Kepulauan Cook nyaéta hiji nagara pulau anu ngalakonan hubungan bebas jeung Selandia Anyar, aya di Polinesia, di tengah Samudra Pasifik Kidul. Ieu nyaéta archipelago anu ngandung 15 pulau nu ngabudidayakeun di 2.2 juta km2 samudra. Dengan zona waktu yang sama dengan Hawaii, pulau-pulau ini kadang-kadang dipandang sebagai ""Hawaii di bawah tanah"". Walaupun lebih kecil, ia mengingatkan beberapa pengunjung tua yang lebih tua sebelum Hawaii menjadi negara bagian tanpa semua hotel besar wisatawan dan pengembangan lainnya. Kepulauan Cook tidak memiliki kota-kota tetapi terdiri dari 15 pulau utama. Yang terbesar adalah Rarotonga dan Aitutaki.
ref: "Kapuloan Cook mangrupikeun nagara pulo anu boga hubungan bébas jeung Selandia Baru, lokasina di Polinesia, di tengah Sagara Pasifik Kidul. Ieu téh nyaéta kapulauan anu terdiri ti 15 pulau anu kasebar di lautan salega 2,2 juta km2. Kusabab zona waktuna sami sareng Hawaii, kapuloan ieu kadang disebut ""Hawaii handap"". Sanaos langkung alit, éta ngingetan sababaraha pangunjung anu tos sepuh di Hawaii ka nagara kalayan tanpa hotél wisata ageung sareng kamajuan sanés. Kapuloan Cook henteu boga dayeuh nanging boga 15 pulo anu béda. Pulo utama nyaéta Rarotonga sareng Aitutaki."

src: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service. It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.
mt: Permit tiasa disiapkeun dina waktu anu geus dipikirkeun. Kamu tiasa ngabutuhkeun permit pikeun ngalaman malam di Sirena. Sirena nyaéta satuluyna stasiun ranger anu tiasa ngabutuhkeun tempat tidur jeung pangan panas dina waktu anu geus dipikirkeun. La Leona, San Pedrillo, jeung Los Patos tiasa ngabutuhkeun camping tanpa pangan. Kamu tiasa ngabutuhkeun park permit langsung tina stasiun ranger di Puerto Jiménez, tapi éta tiasa teu ngabutuhkeun kartu kredit. Park Service (MINAE) tiasa ngabutuhkeun park permit leuwih ti hiji bulan anu geus dipikirkeun tina waktu anu geus dipikirkeun. CafeNet El Sol tiasa ngabutuhkeun layanan reservasi pikeun hiji biaya US$30, atawa $10 pikeun hiji pass anu geus dipikirkeun; rincian tina hal éta tina hal Corcovado.
ref: Idin kedah di pesen sateuacanna. Anjeun kedah ngagaduhan idin pikeun cicing di Sirena. Sirena mangrupiken hiji-hijina stasuin ranger anu nawiskeun kos-kosan sareng tuangeun panas  sakalian kémping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, sareng Los Patos nawiskeun kémping anu teu aya jasa tuang. Anjeun tiasa nyuhunkeun ijin taman ka patugas khusus di Puerto Jiménez, tapi aranjeunna teu nampi kartu krédit. Layanan taman (MINAE) atos teu ngaluarkeun izin taman langkung ti sabulan sateuacan waktos anu diperkirakeun kanggo dongkap. CafeNet El Sol nawiskeun jasa pemesanan tempat saharga $30 AS, atanapi $10 kanggo tiket sadinten pinuh; detil aya dina halaman Corcovado.

src: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking. It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots. Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route. In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.
mt: Naek gunung ku ski: Aktivitas éta ogé disebut backcountry ski, ski touring atawa ski hiking. Aktivitas éta patali jeung tapi teu ngahubungkeun alpine style ski touring atawa mountaineering, anu kedah dipikirkeun dina daérah anu ngaharum. Pikiran kana rute ski minangka rute hiking. Dina kondisi anu bagus, kalian bisa ngahadapi jarak anu leuwih luhur ti jalur kaki – tapi teu pernah kalian bisa ngahadapi kecepatan cross country skiing tanpa gunung anu beurat.
ref: Piknik saaayana nganggo ski: kagiatan ieu ogé disebat ski ka pedalaman, ski tur, atanapi ski hiking. Ieu aya hubunganna tapi biasana henteu ngalibatkeun tur ski gaya alpin atawa naék gunung, anu pamungkasna dilaksanakeun di médan curam anu meryogikeun ski sareng sapatu bot anu leuwih kaku. Bayangkeun rute ski sapertos rute nanjak. Dina kaayaan anu saé, anjeun bakal tiasa nutupan jarak anu langkung jauh tibatan leumpang - tapi jarang pisan anjeun sami sareng kecepatan ski antar negeri tanpa mawa ransel anu beurat dina jalur anu rata.

src: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe. Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture. When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture. When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt. People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.
mt: Kagetan balik ka budaya asli datang leuwih awal ti kagetan budaya anyar (teu aya fase honeymoon), tiasa leuwih lama, sareng bisa leuwih parah. Para pelancong anu ngalaman gampang ngadaptasi ka budaya anyar kadang-kadang ngalaman kagetan balik ka budaya asli anu leuwih parah. Saenggeus ngalaman hidup di luar negeri, kalian ngadaptasi ka budaya anyar sareng ngalaman hilangna sebagian habit ti budaya asli kalian. Saenggeus kalian ngalaman perjalanan ka luar negeri, para warga mungkin ngabeneran sareng ngertian, nyaho yen para pelancong di luar negeri butuh ngadaptasi. Para warga mungkin teu ngabeneran sareng ngertian, yen ngabeneran sareng ngertian ogé butuh diperlukan pikeun para pelancong balik ka budaya asli.
ref: Guncangan lebet deui datang langkung gancang tibatan budaya kaget (fase bulan madu dikirangan), langkung lami, sareng tiasa langkung parah. Wisatawan anu teu sesah nyesuaikeun dirina sareng budaya anyar biasana malah sesah pas uwih deui ka budaya aslina. Lamun anjeun uwih deui ka nagara asal saatos linggih di luar negeri, anjeun pasti atos adaptasi sareng budaya anu anyar sareng kaleungitan sakedik kabiasaan ti budaya asli anjeun. Nalika anjeun mimitian ka luar negeri, jalma-jalma tiasa sabar sareng ngarti, terang yén palancong di nagara anyar kedah adaptasi. Jalmi-jalmi manawi henteu sadar yen kesabaran sarta pengertian oge diperlukeun kanggo para turis anu wangsul ka bumi.

Saenggeus ngalaman hidup di luar negeri, kalian ngadaptasi ka budaya anyar sareng ngalaman hilangna sebagian habit ti budaya asli kalian. Saenggeus kalian ngalaman perjalanan ka luar negeri, para warga mungkin ngabeneran sareng ngertian, nyaho yen para pelancong di luar negeri butuh ngadaptasi. Para warga mungkin teu ngabeneran sareng ngertian, yen ngabeneran sareng ngertian ogé butuh diperlukan pikeun para pelancong balik ka budaya asli.
ref: Guncangan lebet deui datang langkung gancang tibatan budaya kaget (fase bulan madu dikirangan), langkung lami, sareng tiasa langkung parah. Wisatawan anu teu sesah nyesuaikeun dirina sareng budaya anyar biasana malah sesah pas uwih deui ka budaya aslina. Lamun anjeun uwih deui ka nagara asal saatos linggih di luar negeri, anjeun pasti atos adaptasi sareng budaya anu anyar sareng kaleungitan sakedik kabiasaan ti budaya asli anjeun. Nalika anjeun mimitian ka luar negeri, jalma-jalma tiasa sabar sareng ngarti, terang yén palancong di nagara anyar kedah adaptasi. Jalmi-jalmi manawi henteu sadar yen kesabaran sarta pengertian oge diperlukeun kanggo para turis anu wangsul ka bumi.

src: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.
mt: Kambing (juga dikenal sebagai elk) teu ngalaman agresif, tapi bakal ngabéla diri jikalau éta ngarasa anu teu aman. src: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things). These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water. Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.
mt: Di tengah-tengah poé, para pejalan kota bisa ngalaman mirage anu ngabogaan ilusi tina banyu (atawa hal séjénna). Ieu bisa jadi ngarungu jikalau pejalan kota ngajalankeun mirage, ngabébaskeun énergi nu boga nilai nu luhur sareng banyu nu boga nilai nu luhur. Anu paling panas ti padang pasir bisa jadi ngalaman suhu nu luhur di malam hari. Hipotermia nyaéta risiko nu boga nilai nu luhur tanpa pakaian panas.
ref: Di beurang anu panas, wisatawan tiasa ningali fatamorgana anu nampakkeun ilusi sepertos cai (atawa benda lainna). Picilakaeun lamun wisatawan ngudag fatamorgana, miceun-miceun energi jeung cai anu sesana. Malah gurun anu pangpanasna ogé tiasa janten tiris pisan upami wengi mah. Hipotérmia nyaéta résiko panggedéna lamun teu nganggo anggoan haneut.

src: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE. Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos.
mt: Républik Dominika (Bahasa Spanyol: República Dominicana) nyaéta hiji nagara Karibia anu ngagunakeun sabagian wétan pulo Hispaniola, anu dipaké bareng jeung Haiti. Selain pasir putih pantai jeung pemandangan gunung, nagara éta ogé ngahuni kota Eropa pangluna di Amérika, kiwari jadi bagian ti Santo Domingo. Pulo éta munggaran dipaké ku bangsa Taínos jeung Caribes. Caribes nyaéta bangsa Arawakan anu datang ka wétan pulo Hispaniola dina taun 10.000 SM. Dina waktu nu lila sabalikna tina datangna éksplorator Éropa, populasi Taínos geus ngalaman penurunan anu siginifikan ku pangkonkistoran Spanyol. Dumasar kana Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) antara 1492 jeung 1498 pangkonkistoran Spanyol ngabunuh sekitar 100.000 Taínos.
ref: Républik Dominika (Spanyol: Republik Dominika) Mangrupikeun nagara Karibia anu  nempatan bagian belah wetan pulau Hispaniola, anu di bagi sareng Haiti. Iwal ti tetempoan keusik bodas sareng pagunungan, nagara ieu mangrupikeun bumi pikeun dayeuh Éropa anu pangkolotna di Amerika, ayeuna bagian ti Santo Domingo. Pulo éta mimitina dicicingan ku Tainos sareng Caribes. Jalmi-jalmi Caribes nyaéta jalmi-jalmi anu nyarios basa Arawakan anu atos anjog kira-kira 10.000 SM. DIna sababaraha taun pondok saatos datangna penjelajah éropa, populasi Tainos di kirangan  secara signifikan ku parebut Spanyol. Dumasarkeun kana Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) antara taun 1492 nepi keun ka taun 1498 penjajah Spanyol tos meuncit sakitar 100,000 jalma Taínos.

src: "Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet. Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as ""ski bums,"" planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location. The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC! Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia."
mt: "Snowboard, anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard, nyaéta olahraga anu loba dipaké ku jalma-jalma anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilkeun skis sareng snowboard anu ngahasilke
ref: "Olahraga salju nurunan gunung, kalebet ski sareng seluncur salju, nyaéta olahraga kasohor nu ngalibatkeun nyorodot dina taneuh anu katutupan salju nganggo alat ski atanapi papan selucur anu dipasang dina sampéan anjeun. Ski nyaéta salah sahiji kagiatan nyaba nu utama jeung loba nu resep, sakapeung dipikawanoh ku ""gelandang ski"", anu ngarancang sakabéh liburan sabudeureun tempat ski éta. Ski atos aya ti saprak jaman baheula — gambar di guha anu ngagambarkeun jalma anu maén ski atos aya ti 5000 taun Sateuacan Maséhi! Ski nurunan bukit minangka olahraga dimimitian sahenteuna abad ka-17, sarta dina taun 1861 klub ski rékréasi munggaran dibuka ku urang Norwégia di Australia."

src: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean off the eastern coast of Africa. Madagascar is by far the biggest, and a continent on its own when it comes to wildlife. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or associated with France, and known as luxury beach resorts. The Arabs also brought Islam to the lands, and it took in a big way in the Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.
mt: Kepulauan Afrika Timur aya di Samudra Hindia di pesisir timur Afrika. Madagaskar nyaéta nu paling gedé, jeung benua sendiri nalika ngabahas hirupan. Kepulauan kecil séjénna nyaéta nagara nu merdeka, atawa nu hubungan jeung Perancis, jeung dikenal salaku resor pantai nu mewah. Arab ogé ngimpor Islam ka wewengkung éta, jeung éta ngahijarkeun di Kepulauan Komoro jeung Mayotte. Pengaruh jeung kolonialisme Eropa dimimiti dina abad ka-15, saperti Vasco da Gama, penjelajah Portugis, ngarandap jalur Cape ti Eropa ka India.
ref: Kapuloan Afrika Wétan téh lokasina dina Samudra Hindia sisi basisir wétanna Afrika. Madagascar sajauh ieu jadi anu panggedéna, sareng mangrupikeun buana terpisah dina kahirupan sato liar. Kaseueuran pulo-pulo leutik mangrupikeun nagara bagian mandiri, atanapi aya hubunganana sareng Perancis, sareng dikenal salaku pantai méwah. orang arab oge anu mawa Islam ka pulau eta, jeung bisa loba mangaruhan di daerah Comoros jeung Mayotte Pangaruh Eropa jeung kolonialisme dimimiti tina abad ka-15, keur penjelajah Portugis, Vasco da Gama manggihkeun rute Cape ti Eropa ka India.

src: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise. There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual. More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.
mt: Tradisi pikeun leupas malam Paskah di tempat terbuka pikeun nongkong pisanan matahari. Aya alasan teologis Kristen pikeun tradisi éta, tapi mungkin ogé ritual musim semi sareng kebajikan nu leuwih lama. Gereja tradisional sering ngalaksanakeun Paskah malam Sabtu di akhir pekan Paskah, jeung kongregasi sering ngalakukeun pesta pikeun ngepahkeun pisanan pikeun ngepahkeun pisanan pikeun ngepahkeun pisanan pikeun ngepahkeun pisanan pikeun ngepahkeun pisanan pikeun ngepahkeun pisanan pikeun ngepahkeun pisanan pikeun ngepahkeun pisanan pikeun ngepahkeun pisanan pikeun ngepahkeun pisanan pikeun ngepahkeun pisanan pikeun ngepahkeun pisanan pikeun ngepahkeun pisanan pikeun ngepahkeun pisanan pikeun ngepahkeun pisanan pikeun ngepahkeun pisanan pikeun ngepahkeun pisanan pikeun ngepahkeun pisanan pikeun ngepahkeun pisanan pikeun ngepahkeun pisanan pikeun ngepahkeun pisanan pikeun ngepahkeun pisanan pikeun ngepahkeun pisanan pikeun ngepahkeun pisanan pikeun ngepahkeun pisanan pikeun ngepahkeun pisanan pikeun ngepahkeun pisanan pikeun ngepahkeun pisanan pikeun ngepahkeun pisanan pikeun ngepahkeun pisanan pikeun ngepahkeun pisanan pikeun ngepahkeun pisanan pikeun ngepahkeun pisanan p
ref: Aya tradisi hudang dugi ka énjing dina wengi Paskah di sababaraha tempat anu kabuka pikeun ningali panonpoé naék. Tangtos waé aya wawaran téologis Kristen kanggo talari ieu,nanging manawi éta téh ritual Usum Semi sarta Kesuburan pra-Kristen. Langkung loba garéja tradisional anu sering ngarayakeun Wengi Paskah dina dinten Saptu dina ahir minggu Paskah, sareng para jamaah sering ngaayakeun acara di tengah wengi kanggo ngarayakeun kebangkitan Kristus.

src: Ecuador requires that Cuban citizens receive an invitation letter prior to entering Ecuador through international airports or frontier admission points. This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements. These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries. Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.
mt: Ékador ngabutuhkeun surat undangan ti warga Cuba pikeun masuk Ékador lewat bandara internasional atawa titik masukna. Surat éta tiasa di legalisasi ku Kementrian Luar Negeri Ékador sareng ngalakukeun persyaratan-persyaratan. Persyaratan éta tiasa ngabutuhkeun aliran migrasi nu disusun antara kedua nagara. Warga Cuba anu jadi green card ti AS tiasa ngalakukeun eksémpsi ti persyaratan éta ku ngalakukeun konsulat Ékador. Paspormu tiasa valid pikeun 6 bulan ti tanggal perjalananmu. Tiket perjalanan bulan/belakang tiasa dipaké pikeun ngabuktikeun lama perjalananmu.
ref: Ekuador ngawajibkeun urang Kuba kedah nampi serat uleman sateuacan lebet ka Ekuador liwat bandara internasional atanapi perbatasan. Serat ieu kedah dilegalkeun ku Kementrian Luar Nagri Ekuador, sareng kedah sasuai sareng syarat-syarat anu geus ditangtukeun. Syarat ieu dirancang pikeun nyayogikeun aliran migrasi anu leuwih kaatur diantara dua nagara. warga Kuba anu ngagaduhan US Green Card tiasa ngadatangan Konsulat Ekuador supados tiasa bebas tina persyaratan ieu Paspor anjeun kedah berlaku sahenteuna 6 bulan kaping anjeun angkat. Tiket bulak balik kedah aya kanggo ngabuktikeun lilana anjeun tetep diditu.

src: Ecuador requires that Cuban citizens receive an invitation letter prior to entering Ecuador through international airports or frontier admission points. This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements. These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries. Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.

src: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labour costs are lower. Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bringing the prescription along to be filed elsewhere. High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.
mt: Kacamata bisa leuwih murah di negara asing, khususna di negara miskin anu biaya tenaga kerja leuwih handap. Mimiti periksa mata di rumah, khususna jikalau asuransi ngabungkeun, sareng ngabawa resep anu diisi di tempat lain. Kacamata merek-merek mahal anu bisa didapuk di tempat-tempat éta bisa ngalaman dua masalah; kadang-kadang éta bisa jadi tiruan, sareng kacamata asli anu diimpor bisa leuwih mahal ti di rumah.
ref: Kacasoca tiasa langkung mirah di nagara luar, utamana di nagara anu penghasilanna-kirang anu ongkos pagawéna langkung handap. Partimbangan ngetes panon di bumi teh, utamina upami asuransi anjeun nutupan éta, sareng nyandak resep di tempat sanés. Merek-merek anu mahal nu aya di sababaraha daérah gaduh dua masalah; sabagian na palsu, jeung anu meunang impor hargana leuwih awis.

src: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store. British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted. On the outlying islands credit cards will probably not be accepted, although British and United States currency may be taken; check with the owners in advance to determine what is an acceptable payment method. It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.
mt: Uang resmi di pulo Falkland nyaéta Falkland pound (FKP) anu nilai éta ditetepkeun sarua jeung nilai British pound (GBP). Uang bisa dicampurkeun di bank satuluyna di pulo Falkland anu perenahna di Stanley di deukeut FIC West store. British pound bakal umumna diaképtan di pulo Falkland sareng di Stanley kartu kredit sareng dollar Amerika bakal ogé diaképtan. Di pulo-pulo luar Stanley kartu kredit bakal teu diaképtan, tapi British sareng dollar Amerika mungkin diaképtan; cek jeung pemilik di deukeut pikeun ngabédakeunana nilai tiasa diaképtan. Ieu teu bisa dicampurkeun di luar pulo Falkland, jadi campurkeun uang sebelum leupas pulo Falkland.
ref: Mata uang resmi Falklands téh nyaéta pound Falkland (FKP) anu nilaina sami sareng hiji pound Inggris (GBP). Artos tiasa ditukerkeun di hiji-hijina bank nu aya di pulau anu lokasina di Stanley sebrangeun toko FIC West. Pon Inggris sacara umum bakal ditampi di kapuloan mana wae sareng kartu Stanley sareng dolar AS ogé sering ditampi. Di pulo kapuloan kartu kiridit henteu tiasa katampi, sanaos mata uang Inggris sareng AS tiasa ditarima; tanyakeun ka anu bogana pikeun nangtoskeun naon padika pembayaran anu tiasa ditampi. Ampir teu mungkin nuker keun duit Falkland di luar pulo, matak kudu nuker keun heula saacan ninggalkeun pulo.

src: Most of the temples do have an Annual festival starting from November end to Mid of May, which varies according to each temple's annual calendar. Most of the temple festivals is celebrated as part of temple's anniversary or presiding deity's birthday or any other major event associated with the temple. Kerala's temple festivals are very interesting to see, with regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.
mt: Salah sahiji kuil mibanda festival taunanna ti akhir bulan Nopémber nepi ka tengah bulan Mèi, anu bédana ti kalénder taunanna ti masing-masing kuil. Léngkahna kuil-kuil di Kerala téh kacida unik pikeun ditéangan, ku sababna prosesi kakuilna anu diparéntah ku gajah-gajah anu dihias, orkes kuil sareng lalakon-lalakon séjénna.
ref: Kalobaan kuil ngarayakeun festival taunan mimiti bulan November nepi ka pertengahan Mei. Rupa-rupa sesuai kalender taunan masing-masing kuil. Kalolobaan acara kuil dirayakeun salaku bagéan tina tepang taun kuil atanapi milangkala déwa atanapi acara-acara gedé anu séjén anu aya hubunganana sareng kuil. Perayaan kuil Kerala resep pisan keur ditonton, kalayan prosési rutin gajah dihias, orkéstra kuil, sareng perayaan séjénna.

src: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you). However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class! Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.
mt: Carab ngalakukeun penerbangan dina kelas mimiti atawa bisnis nyaéta ngabutuhkeun duit anu teuas pikeun ngabutuhkeunana (atau, leuwih bagus, ngabutuhkeun perusahaan anjeun pikeun ngabutuhkeunana). Nu teuas ieu teu datang murah: sabagéan anu kasar, anjeun tiasa ngabutuhkeun ngahaja opat kali harga normal pikeun bisnis, sareng sapuluh kali pikeun kelas mimiti! Umumna, teu aya pati pikeun nempo diskon pikeun kelas bisnis atawa mimiti dina penerbangan langsung ti A ka B. Perusahaan penerbangan tahu yén aya hiji grup nu teuas anu milih pikeun ngabutuhkeun duit anu teuas pikeun ngabutuhkeunana, sareng ngabutuhkeun anu teuas ieu.
ref: Cara anu jelas naek pasawat di kelas utama atanapi bisnis nyaéta mayar artos nu seueur pikeun meunang kaistiméwaan khusus (atanapi, langkung saé, gaduh perusahaan anjeun ngalakukeun hal pikeun anjeun). tapi, eta teh henteu murah; sapangalaman abdi, anjeun bisa wae mayar 4 kali langkung awis tinu harga ekonomi anu kanggo bisnis biasa sareng sawelas kali langkung awis kanggo kelas anu kahiji Sacara umum, henteu aya gunana neangan diskon kanggo korsi bisnis atanapi kelas munggaran pikeun penerbangan langsung ti A ka B. Maskapai penerbangan apal pisan yén aya sekelompok penerbang anu daék mayar langkung mahal keur menangkeun hak istimewa pikeun indit ka hiji tempat kalayan gancang sareng nyaman, sareng meakeun biaya nu sesuai.

src: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive rates than other European airlines. Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014. If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare. Don't forget to add in the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.
mt: Maskapai kayak Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways sareng Turkish Airlines geus ngagénggalan layananana ka Afrika, sareng tiasa ngabogaan koneksi ka sababaraha kota Afrika nu penting dina harga nu kompetitif ti maskapai-maskapai Eropa séjénna. Turkish Airlines nglayani 39 destinasi di 30 nagara Afrika ti 2014. Jika kalian miboga waktu perjalanan tambahan, cek deui kana bagéan harga total kalian ka Afrika tibatan kana bagéan harga perjalanan dunia. Jangan lupa pikeun ngabogaan bagéan-bagéan tambahan ti visa tambahan, pajak perjalanan, transportasi darat, etc. pikeun sababaraha tempat séjénna ti Afrika.
ref: Maskapai sapertos Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines parantos ngaluaskeun layanana ka Afrika, sareng nawarkeun konéksi ka seueur dayeuh-dayeuh ageung di Afrika kalawan pangaos bersaingjeung maskapai Éropa lianna. Maskapai Turkish ngalayang ka 39 tujuan di 30 nagara di Afrika ti taun 2014. Upami anjeun gaduh waktos tambahan lalampahan, periksa sabaraha tawaran tarif sadayana lalampahan anjeun ka Afrika sareng tarif lalampahan keliling dunya. Tong hilap keur nambahan biaya langkung kanggo visa tambahan, pajak indit, transportasi darat, jeung nu sanés. keur sagala tempat di luar Afrika.

src: Buying food in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to get fed. Without cooking opportunities, choices are however limited to ready-made food. Increasingly supermarkets are getting a more varied section of ready-made food. Some even provide a microwave oven or other means to heat food. In some countries or types of stores there is at least one on-site restaurant, often a rather informal one with affordable prices.
mt: Kuasakan pangan di swalayan umumna mah paling murah pikeun dipaké. Tanpa kana kesempatan pikeun masak, pilihan-pilihan éta terbatas pikeun panganan jadi. Tapi, swalayan anu ngahasilkeun panganan jadi anu leuwih bervariasi. Aya ogé anu nyadiakeun oven microwave atawa sumber énergi séjén pikeun ngahit panganan. Dina sababaraha nagara atawa tipe swalayan aya hiji restoran anu di tempat, biasana mah informal jeung harga nu murah.
ref: Ngagaleuh tuangeun di supermarket biasana mangrupikeun cara anu paling murah pikeun nyandak dahareun. Tanpa kasempetan masak, pilihan dugi ka dahareun anu cepat saji. Tosérba ayeuna nambihan deui jenis-jenis tuangeun anu siap saji. Sababaraha malah aya ogé aya nu nyayogikeun oven microwave atanapi alat séjén anu tiasa dianggo pikeun manaskeun tuangeun. Di sababaraha nagara atawa rupi toko sahenteuna aya hiji restoran di tempat,remen oge anu rada informal kalawan pangaos kahontal.

src: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible. In particular, the numbering system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some slight peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different. Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
mt: Variasi-variasi basa Perancis anu dipaké di Belgia sareng Swiss béda leutik ti basa Perancis anu dipaké di Perancis, tapi bédaan éta teu ngahambat pikeun saling ngahargaan. Tapi, basa Perancis anu dipaké di Belgia sareng Swiss béda leutik ti basa Perancis anu dipaké di Perancis, tapi bédaan éta teu ngahambat pikeun saling ngahargaan. Tapi, basa Perancis anu dipaké di Belgia sareng Swiss béda leutik ti basa Perancis anu dipaké di Perancis, tapi bédaan éta teu ngahambat pikeun saling ngahargaan. Tapi, basa Perancis anu dipaké di Belgia sareng Swiss béda leutik ti basa Perancis anu dipaké di Perancis, tapi bédaan éta teu ngahambat pikeun saling ngahargaan. Tapi, basa Perancis anu dipaké di Belgia sareng Swiss béda leutik ti basa Perancis anu dipaké di Perancis, tapi bédaan éta teu ngahambat pikeun saling ngahargaan. Tapi, basa Perancis anu dipaké di
ref: Variasi basa Perancis anu dinyarioskeun di Bélgia jeung Swiss téh sakedik béda tina basa Perancis anu dinyarioskeun di Perancis, sanaos duanana sami-sami mirip jeung kedah dingartikeun. Khususna, sistem penomoran di Bélgia jeung Swiss anu nyarios bahasa Prancis gaduh rada aneh tibatan anu nyarios bahasa Prancis di nagara Prancis, sareng cara ngucapkeuna ogé bénteun saalit. Sanaos kitu, sadaya urang Bélgia jeung Swiss anu nyarios basa Perancis parantos diajar basa Perancis standar di sakola, jadina aranjeunna téh tiasa ngartos anjeun komo upami anjeun nganggo sistem panomeran Perancis standar.

ref: Variasi basa Perancis anu dinyarioskeun di Bélgia jeung Swiss téh sakedik béda tina basa Perancis anu dinyarioskeun di Perancis, sanaos duanana sami-sami mirip jeung kedah dingartikeun. Khususna, sistem penomoran di Bélgia jeung Swiss anu nyarios bahasa Prancis gaduh rada aneh tibatan anu nyarios bahasa Prancis di nagara Prancis, sareng cara ngucapkeuna ogé bénteun saalit. Sanaos kitu, sadaya urang Bélgia jeung Swiss anu nyarios basa Perancis parantos diajar basa Perancis standar di sakola, jadina aranjeunna téh tiasa ngartos anjeun komo upami anjeun nganggo sistem panomeran Perancis standar.

src: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel. Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.
mt: Kurang leuwih maskapé anu masih ngahargaan pikeun penerbangan pikeun ngedaharkeun, anu ngurangkeun harga penerbangan pikeun ngedaharkeun. Maskapé anu ngahargaan ieu nyaéta Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa pikeun penerbangan anu mimiti ti AS atawa Kanada, sareng WestJet. Dina kasusna, kudu direservasi ku telepon langsung jeung maskapé.
ref: Ngan sababaraha maskapai anu nawarkeun kénéh tarif kapapaténan, anu masihan diskon alit waragad pamakaman di menit ahir. Maskapai anu nawiskeun ieu jasa kalebet Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa pikeun penerbangan anu asalna ti Amérika Serikat atanapi Kanada, sareng WestJet. Dina sagala kaayaan, anjeun kedah mesen nganggo telepon langsung ka maskapaina.

src: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when out of your home country. It can save money over buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company. If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.
mt: Ngagunakeun GPS navigasi aplikasi di ponselmu bisa jadi cara paling gampang sareng paling nyaman pikeun navigasi nalika di luar nagara asalmu. Ieu bisa ngahasilkeun pungsi pikeun ngahindarkeun ngabutuhkeun peta anyar pikeun GPS, atawa perangkat GPS standar atawa menyewa ti perusahaan sewa mobil. Jika kamu teu ngabutuhkeun koneksi data pikeun ponselmu, atawa nalika ponselmu teu di jangkauan, kinerja éta bisa terbatas atawa teu bisa.
ref: Nganggo aplikasi GPS panunjuk arah dina hp mangrupikeun jalan anu paling gampil pikeun janten panunjuk arah nalika anjeun di luar negeri. Ieu tiasa ngahémat artos timbang meser peta pikeun GPS, atawa alat GPS anu mandiri atawa nyéwa hiji ti pausahaan séwa mobil. Upami anjeunteu ngagaduham konéksi data pinkeu hapé atawa jaringan na di luar jangkauan, kinerja na tiasa kawatés atanapi henteu sayogi.

src: Seeing the sites and wildlife of the Galapagos is best done by boat, just as Charles Darwin did it in 1835. Over 60 cruise ships ply the Galapagos waters - ranging in size from 8 to 100 passengers. Most people book their place well in advance (as the boats are usually full during the high season). Be sure the agent through whom you book is a Galapagos specialist with a good knowledge of a wide variety of ships. This will ensure that your particular interests and/or constraints are matched with the ship most suitable to them.
mt: Ngaliwatan kapal téh anu paling bagus pikeun nempo situs sareng hirupan alam Galapagos, saperti Charles Darwin ngaliwatna dina taun 1835. Leuwih ti 60 kapal plesir ngalakonan pelayaran di Galapagos - anu ukuran ti 8 nepi ka 100 penumpang. Banyak jalma anu nyokotkeun tempatna dina waktu anu luhur (saperti kapal-kapal éta umumna purna dina musim anu luhur). Pastike agén anu dipakékeunna nyaéta spésialis Galapagos anu miboga pangaweruh anu luhur ngeunaan kapal-kapal anu béda-béda. Ieu téh bakal nyadiakeun yén minat jeung/atawa kakuatan anu dipibandaan ku jalma éta disambungkeun jeung kapal anu paling cocok pikeunna.
ref: Ningalian tempat jeung alam liar na Galapagos paling alus nganggo kapal, siga nu dilakukeun ku Charles Darwin dina taun 1835. Langkung ti 60 palayaran nyebrang ti cai Galapagos - rata-rata 8 dugi ka 100 panumpang. Lolobana masarakat téh mesen tempat jauh sateuacanna (sabab kapal biasana pinuh pas usum na ramé). Pastikeun anjeun mesen ka agén anu mangrupikeun spésialis Galapagos anu jembar pangaweruh tur ngagaduhan réa jinis kapal. Ieu bakal mastikeun karesep atanapi kakirangan anjeun téh cocok sareng kapal anu cocok sareng maranéhna.

src: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits can be hard to find. They usually have special food, drink and entertainment offers, to keep guests in a good mood, and keep them at the premise. Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.
mt: Kasino umumna ngalakukeun deui upaya pikeun maksimalisasi waktu sareng uang anu dipaké ku tamu. Jendela sareng jam biasana teu aya, sareng pintu keluar teu gampang dipikiran. Biasana aya tawaran panganan, minuman sareng hiburan husus, pikeun ngaganggu tamu dina kaadaan anu bagus, sareng pikeun ngaganggu éta di tempat. Beberapa venue nyadiakeun minuman beralkohol gratis. Namun, mabuk ngaburkeun pangaweruh, sareng kabéh pamaén anu bagus tahu pentingna pikeun ngaganggu bener.
ref: Kasino biasana ngalakukeun seueur usaha pikeun maksimalkeun pungsi waktos sareng artos anu di anggo ku tamu. Jandela sareng jam biasana teu aya, sareng panto kaluarna biasana sesah dipilarian. Aranjeunna biasana ngagaduhan katuangan khusus, inuman sareng nawiskeun hiburan pikeun sémah tetep dina kasenangan sareng tetep di lokasi. Sababaraha tempat nawarkeun inuman alkohol di imah. Kumaha oge, mabok teh ngurangan kana kaputusan, kabeh tukang judi nu hade ngarti pentingna tetep sadar.

src: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects. It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.
mt: Semua kata benda, sarta kata Sie pikeun kalian, selalu dimimiti ku huruf kapital, bahkan di tengah kalimat. Ieu nyaéta cara penting pikeun ngabédakeun antara sababaraha kata kerja sareng objek. Ieu ogé mungkin ngalengkepan bacaan, tapi tulisan jadi kawengku ku kudu ngahalatakeun apakah kata kerja atawa adjektiva dipaké dina bentuk substantif.
ref: Kabeh kata benda, sinareng kata Sie kanggo anjeun, osok dimimitian ku hurup gede, sanajan aya di tengah-tengah kalimat Ieu téh cara anu penting keur ngabédakeun sababaraha kecap kerja jeung benda. Ieu tiasa ngadamel maca leuwih gampil, sanaos nulis téh émang rada sesah karna butuh malarian kecap kerja sareng kecap sipat dianggo di bentuk anu tiasa dibuktikeun kabeneran na.

src: "In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating ""hello."" However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means ""come over,"" similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose. Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back."
mt: "Dina sababaraha bagian dunya, ngagayuh nyaéta gestur kasih sayang, anu ngandung "halo". Aya deui di Malaysia, di antara urang Melayu di daérah pedesaan, éta ngandung "mari keur," sarua jeung jempol anu bentuk ka arah badan, gestur anu dipaké di sababaraha nagara di Barat, sareng tiasa dipaké pikeun tujuan éta. Sama deui, turis Britania di Spanyol bisa ngalirkeun gestur panggahar anu ngagunakeun papan ngagayuh ka arah panyayur (bukan ka arah anu dipanggahar) minangka gestur pikeun ngabalik."
ref: "Di babaraha tempat di dunya, ngageupayan leungeun nyaeta gestur ramah anu hartina ""halo"". Tapi, di Malaysia, sahenteuna diantara urang Melayu lembur, éta hartosna ""kadieu,"" mirip jeung curuk anu ditekuk kana awak, sikep anu dianggo di nagara-nagara kulon tertentu, jeung kudu dianggo pikeun tujuan éta waé. Sami ogé, saurang wisatawan Inggris di Spanyol tiasa salah ngartikeun dadah nu ngalibatkeun talapak panangan pas berhadapan sareng nu ngadadahan (tibatan jalmi anu didadahan) salaku tanda pikeun balik deui."

src: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges. The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed. At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.
mt: Gletser teu stabil, tapi ngalir turun ka bukit. Ieu bakal nyababkeun retak, retak, anu mungkin ditutup ku jembatan salju. Dinding jeung atap gua salju bisa robah jeung retak bisa ditutup. Di pinggiran gletser blok-blok gedé robah, jatuh jeung mungkin ngalir atawa ngalir ti pinggiran.
ref: Glasier téh teu stabil, tapi ngalir turun gunung. Ieu bakal nyababkeun retakan, celah, anu tiasa dihalangan ku sasak salju. Témbok sareng hateup guha és téh tiasa runtuh jeung retakan tiasa ditutup. Dina tungtung glasier, balok-balok ageung lepas, ragrag sareng tiasa waé luncat atanapi ngagulung salajengna tina tungtung.

src: Goma is a tourist city of the Democratic Republic of Congo in the extreme east near Rwanda. In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre. While Goma is reasonably safe, any visits outside of Goma should be researched to understand the state of the fighting that persists in the North Kivu province. The city is also the base to climb the Nyiragongo volcano along with some of the cheapest Mountain Gorilla tracking in Africa. You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.
mt: Goma nyaéta kota pariwisata ti Républik Démokratik Kongo di wewengkon paling wétan deukeut Rwanda. Dina taun 2002 Goma dihancurkeun ku lava ti gunung Nyiragongo anu nguburkeun jalur-jalur kota, hususna pusat kota. Sementara Goma aman, kunjungan ka wewengkon luar Goma kudu dipikaresep pikeun nangtukeun keadaan perang anu masih ngalangkang di wewengkon Kivu Kalér. Kota éta ogé pangkal pikeun naik gunung Nyiragongo sareng gorila gunung pangmurahna di Afrika. Kamungkinan pikeun ngalakukeun boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) pikeun ngalakukeun Goma. Harga normal (lokal) nyaéta ~500 Franc Kongo pikeun perjalanan pendek.
ref: Goma mangrupakeun kota wisata di Républik Démokratik Kongo di tungtung wétan caket Rwanda. Dina taun 2002 Goma ancur ku lahar ti gunung merapi Nyiragongo anu ngubur kalolobaan jalan kota, hususna pusat kota. Nalika Goma lumayan aman, tiap kunjungan iwal ti Goma mah kedah apal keur aya perang naon nu lumanggung  di propinsi Kivu kalér. Kota ieu ogé ngarupakeun dasar panaékan gunung merapi Nyiragongo babarengan sareng sababaraha panaékan Pagunungan Gorilla pangmurahna di Afrika. Anjeun tiasa nganggo boda-boda (ojek) kanggo ngurilingan Goma. Harga normalna (lokal) kira-kira 500 Franc Kongo kanggo jarak anu caket.

src: Any camping below the rim in Grand Canyon requires a backcountry permit. Permits are limited to protect the canyon, and become available on the 1st day of the month, four months prior to the start month. Thus, a backcountry permit for any start date in May becomes available on 1 Jan. Space for the most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground adjacent to Phantom Ranch, generally fill up by the requests received on first date they are opened to reservations. There are a limited number permits reserved for walk-in requests available on a first come, first served basis.
mt: Kampanya di bawah rim di Grand Canyon butuh ijin belakang. Ijin éta terbatas pikeun ngabudidayakeun Grand Canyon, sareng jadi bisa dipakékeun dina poé pertama bulan, opat bulan saméméh bulan start. Mimiti, ijin belakang pikeun kampanya di bulan Mèi bisa dipakékeun dina 1 Januari. ref: "Kémping kumaha waé di handapeun sisi kota Grand Canyon peryogi ijin pedalaman. Idin di watesan pikeun mayungan gaung, sareng sayogi dina dinten ka 1 unggal bulan, 4 bulan sateuacan mimiti bulan. Kusabab éta, ijin kemping mulai ti sasih Mei téh bakal aya kaping 1 Januari. Ruang keur wilayah nu paling terkenal, sapertos Bumi Perkemahan Bright Angel anu sabelahan jeung Phantom Ranch, nu umumna pinuh ti awal tempatna buka. Aya pangwatesan jumlah ijin jang kahoyong langsung jeung aya dijero layanan ""kahiji dongkap, kahiji dilayanan""."

src: Any camping below the rim in Grand Canyon requires a backcountry permit. Permits are limited to protect the canyon, and become available on the 1st day of the month, four months prior to the start month. Thus, a backcountry permit for any start date in May becomes available on 1 Jan. Space for the most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground adjacent to Phantom Ranch, generally fill up by the requests received on first date they are opened to reservations. There are a limited number permits reserved for walk-in requests available on a first come, first served basis.

src: Some hotels have a heritage from the golden age of steam railways and ocean liners; before the Second World War, in the 19th or early 20th centuries. These hotels were where the rich and the famous of the day would stay, and often had fine dining and nightlife. The old fashioned fittings, the lack of the latest amenities, and a certain graceful agedness are also part of their character. While they are usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state and other dignitaries. A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels.
mt: Hotel-hotel anu ngan miboga warisan ti jaman emas kereta api uap sareng kapal laut; saméméh Perang Dunia II, dina abad ka-19 atawa awal abad ka-20. Hotel-hotel éta nyaéta di mana para kaya sareng para terkenal dina jaman éta ngalaman, jeung kadang-kadang miboga makanan jeung hiburan anu bagus. Fitting-fitting anu kuna, kurangna amanitas anu anyar, sareng kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan anu kagagalan an
ref: Sababaraha hotél ngagaduhan warisan ti jaman kadigjayaan karéta uap sareng jalur laut; sateuacan Perang Dunya Kadua, di abad ka-19 sareng abad awal ka-20. Hotél-hotel ieu tempat cicingna jalmi-jalmi anu beunghar sareng anu kasohor, sareng gaduh réstoran keur makan malam méwah sareng hiburan wengi. perlengkapan nu jaman baheula, sareng kurangna pasilitas anyar, jeung ogé yuswa anu anggun teh bagian ti ciri khas aranjeunna. Sanaos biasana dipiboga sacara pribadi, aranjeunna sakapeung nampung para pangunjung nagara sareng aparat tinggi. WIsatawan anu seueur artos parantos tiasa ngalayang di sakumna dunya, putus sareng cicing di hotel ieu.

src: "Thanks to undersea fiber optic cable links to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having internet access. Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi. As mentioned above, though the word ""Eskimo"" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners. The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland. Crime, and ill-will toward foreigners in general, is virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no ""rough areas."" Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face. If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing. The very long days in the summer can lead to problems getting sufficient sleep and associated health issues. During the summer, also watch out for the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be irritating."
mt: "Terima kasih kana kabel serat optik bawah laut tina Eropa sareng satelit broadband, Greenland jadi terhubung jeung 93% populasi mibanda akses internet. Hotel atawa tuan rumah (jika ngalaman di rumah tamu atawa rumah pribadi) bakal mibanda wifi atawa komputer anu terhubung jeung internet, sareng saban kota mibanda kafe internet atawa tempat anu mibanda wifi publik. Saperti disebutkeun di atas, meskipun kata ""Eskimo"" tetap diperbolehkan di Amerika Serikat, éta dianggap pejorative ku banyak orang non-Arctic, khususnya di Kanada. Sementara Anda mungkin mendengar kata itu digunakan oleh penduduk asli Greenland, penggunaannya harus dihindari oleh orang asing. Penduduk asli Greenland menyebut diri mereka Inuit di Kanada dan Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), seorang Greenlander, di Greenland. Kriminalitas, dan kebencian terhadap orang asing secara umum, hampir tidak ada di Greenland. Bahkan di kota-kota, tidak ada ""area kasar."" Cuaca dingin mungkin satu-satunya bahaya nyata yang akan dihadapi oleh orang yang tidak bersiap-siap. Jika Anda mengunjungi Greenland selama musim dingin (mengingat semakin ke utara Anda pergi, semakin dinginnya cuacanya), penting untuk membawa pakaian yang cukup hangat. Hari-hari yang sangat panjang di musim panas dapat menyebabkan masalah mendapatkan tidur yang cukup dan masalah kesehatan terkait. Selama musim panas, juga perhatikan serangga Nordic. Meskipun mereka tidak menularkan penyakit apa pun, mereka dapat mengganggu."
ref: "Ku ayana kabel optik fiber di handapeun laut anu nyambung ka Éropa tur satelit broadband, Greenland kasambung ka 93% populasi anu ngagaduhan aksés internét. Hotel anjeun atanapi tempat nu nampi anjeun teh bakal migaduh WiFi atanapi komputer anu aya internetan, sareng kabeh bumi di daerah eta gaduh warung internet atanapi sababaraha tempat aya WiFi gratis. Sapertos disebatkeun di luhur, sanaos kecap ""Eskimo"" angger tiasa ditarima di Amérika Serikat, kecap éta dianggap ngahina ku seueur jalmi Arktik non-Amérika, utamana di Kanada. Sanaos anjeun manawi ngadéngé sanggem anu dianggo ku jalmi pribumina Greenland, pamakéanna kedah dihindari ku jalmi sejen. warga asli Greenland nyebut diri manehna Inuit di Kanada sareng Kalaalleq (jamak tina Kalaallit), Greenlander, di Greenland Kajahatan, sareng niat goreng pikeun urang asing umumna, hampir teu dipikanyaho di Greenland. Malah di kota-kota, teu aya ""daérah anu jahat."" Cuaca tiis panginten hiji-hijina bahaya nyata anu bakal datang pikeun nu teu siap-siap sateuacanna. Upami anjeun ngadatangan Greenland salami usum tiris (émut langkung jauh ka kalér anjeun angkat, langkung tiis cuacana), penting pikeun mawa baju anu cukup haneut. Dina usum panas, poe nu panjang pisan tiasa nyababkeun masalah kulem anu cekap sareng masalah kaséhatan anu pakait. Tapi, jaman kiwari mah aya seniman graffiti ogé anu mapan, acara graffiti jeung tembok anu ""légal"". Lukisan-lukisan graffiti dina nu kieu téh leuwih ka karya seni sanes tulisan-tulisan nu teu kabaca."

src: Jardín de la Unión. This space was built as the atrium for a 17th-century convent, of which the Templo de San Diego is the sole surviving building. It now functions as the central plaza, and always has a lot of things going on, day and night. There are a number of restaurants surrounding the garden, and in the afternoons and evening there free concerts are often given from the central gazebo. Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters is home of an old love legend. For a few pennies some children will tell you the story.
mt: Jardín de la Unión. Ruang éta dibangun minangka atrium pikeun konvent abad ka-17, anu tempatna aya di Templo de San Diego. Ayeuna fungsi minangka plaza pusat, jeung aya loba hal anu aya, dina poé jeung malam. Aya loba restoran anu ngabingkang taman, jeung dina poé jeung malam aya konser gratis anu sering dipaké tina gazebo pusatna. Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Dua balkon anu dipisahkeun ku 69 sentimeter, nyaéta tempatna tiori kasih sayang anu lama.
ref: Jardín de la Unión. Ruang ieu diwangun jantén atrium keur biara di abad ka 17, anu mana Templo de San Diego téh nyaéta hiji-hijina bangunan nu aya kénéh. Ayeuna damel salaku alun-alun puseur, sareng teras aya seueur kagiatan, beurang sareng wengi. Aya sababaraha réstoran di sakuriling taman, sarta dina sonten sareng wengina mindeng diayakeun konsér haratis ti gazébo puseur. Callejon del Beso (Gang Ciuman). Dua balkon anu dipisahkeun ngan ukur 69 séntiméter mangrupikeun imah ti legénda cinta nu tos lami. Pikeun sabaraha sén hungkul, budak alit bakal nyaritakeun anjeun carita éta.

src: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails. Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day. For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them. Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children.
mt: Jalan-jalan anu disebut ogé hiking nyaéta aktivitas luar ruang anu ngahasilkeun jalan-jalan di lingkungan alam, kadang-kadang di jalan-jalan hiking. Jalan-jalan hari anu ngahasilkeun jarak kurang ti mil anu bisa ditempuh dina hiji hari. src: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails. Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day. For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them. Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children.

src: "Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau. These plateaus are often referred to as ""vidde"" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse. In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called ""hei"" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather."
mt: "Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau. These plateaus are often referred to as ""vidde"" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse. In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called ""hei"" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather."
ref: "Ciri khas Norwegia nyaéta fjords anu lungkawing jeung gawir anu ngadadak nanjak, kurang langkung sapertos dataran luhur. Dataran luhur ieu sering disebat ""vidde"" nu hartina tempat lega kabuka, tempat lega nu teu aya bates. di Rogaland jeung Agder mah maranehna sok nyebut ""hei"" teh pikeun ngagambarkeun taneuh lapang nu katutupan semak belukar"

src: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer. However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.
mt: Musim pariwisata pikeun stasiun gunung umumna ngahasilkeun puncak dina musim India. Aya sababaraha stasiun gunung anu mibanda tipe béda tina kecantikan sareng kagiatan dina musim dingin, anu mibanda jumlah salju anu teuas sareng tiasa ngahasilkeun aktivitas saperti ski sareng snowboard.
ref: Usum turis kanggo stasiun bukit biasana ngahontal penclut na salila usum panas India. Kumaha oge, eta teh boga kaalusan jeung pesona nu beda lamun pas  usum tiis, jeung loba stasiun pasir anu ngagaduhan salju nu loba sareng nawarkeun kagiatan siga ski jeung papan salju.

src: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you. Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.
mt: Jangan khawatir, setelah sampe di marina, segala-galanya bakal jelas. Kamu bakal ketemu jeung boat hitchhiker séjén jeung bakal ngabagi informasina jeung kamu. Dina dasarnana kamu bakal nulis surat tawaran bantuan, ngabasa landasan, ngabasa urang anu ngebersihin yacht, ngabasa urang anu ngejalan di bar, dsb. Coba ngobrol jeung asamana urang mungkin. Setelah sababaraha waktu, urang bakal ngertikeun kamu jeung bakal ngabagi tanda-tanda anu mana yacht anu ngalirkeun cari urang.
ref: Yarakin, keur maneh nepi di pelabuhan sakabehna arek leuwih jelas. Maneh arek kapanggih jeung laleumpang anu narumpang kapal. Manranehna arek mere maneh informasi. Pokokna anjeun bakal masang bewara pikeun nawiskeun bantosan anjeun, wara-wiri di darmaga, ngadeukeutan jalmi anu ngabersihkeun kapal, nyobian keur nyarios ka pelaut di bar, sareng sajabana. Cobian ngobrol ka saseueur-seueurna jalmi . Saatos sababaraha lami, sadaya bakal terang anjeun sareng bakal masihan pituduh ngeunaan kapal anu nuju milari padamel.

src: Hong Kong Island gives the territory of Hong Kong its name and is the place that many tourists regard as the main focus. The parade of buildings that make the Hong Kong skyline has been likened to a glittering bar chart that is made apparent by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour. To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite. The great majority of Hong Kong Island's urban development is densely packed on reclaimed land along the northern shore. This is the place the British colonisers took as their own and so if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past, this is a good place to start.
mt: Hong Kong Island ngabogaan ngaran Hong Kong jeung mangrupa tempat anu dipikaresep ku para turis minangka pusat utama. Parade bangunan anu ngahasilkeun skyline Hong Kong geus dipikawanoh minangka bar chart anu boga cahaya anu dipayun ku hadangan Victoria Harbour. Pikeun nampa pemandangan anu paling bagus ti Hong Kong, leupas ti pulo jeung jalan ka Kowloon anu boga watesan. Léngkahna anu boga padatna anu dipadatkeun di daratan anu diréklamasi di sisi kalér. Ieu téh tempat anu dipaké ku koloniser Britania minangka tempatna, jeung jadi jikalana anjeun ngalakukeun panalungtikan ngeunaan panyakit kolonial, ieu téh tempatna.
ref: Pulo Hong Kong masihan nami wilayah Hong Kong anu mangrupikeun tempat nu dianggap ku turis janten pusat utama. Barisan wangunan anu ngajunjung dina cakrawala Hongkong disamikeun sareng diagram batang anu berkilauan anu muncul ku cai di Palabuan Victoria. Kanggo nyaksian pamandangan anu pangsaéna di Hongkong, tinggalkeun Pulo sareng angkat ka sisi laut Kowloon di sebrangna. Seuseueurna pengembangan perkotaan di Hong Kong dipadetkeun ka reklamasi di sapanjang  basisir kalér. Ieu mangrupikeun tempat anu diaku ku penjajah Inggris salaku jajahanna janten lamun anjeun hoyong ningali buktos wilayah penjajah jaman baheula, ieu mangrupikeun tempat anu saé pikeun ngamimitian.

src: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle. They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them. If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken. First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole. Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.
mt: Stirrup nyaéta soket pikeun kaki penunggang anu ngalir ka bawah di sisi kiri sareng kanan ti sandal. Ieu tiasa nyingkahan stabilisasi pikeun penunggang tapi bisa ngalaman risiko keamanan sabab kaki penunggang tiasa ngaganggu. Jika penunggang tumbang tina kuda tapi kaki tumbah di stirrup, mungkas tumbah. Pikeun ngurangkeun risiko ieu, sababaraha tindakan keamanan bisa dilakukeun. Sabalumna, sababaraha sandal, khususna sandal Inggris, ngahasilkeun bar keamanan anu tiasa nyingkahan stirrup leather tumbah ti sandal jika dipaksa tumbah ku penunggang tumbah.
ref: Sanggurdi nyaéta panyangga suku pengendara anu ngagantung dina dua sisi sadel. Eta teh ngadamel langkung stabil pikeun pengendara tapi tiasa nimbulkeun masalah kaamanan kusabab kamungkinan suku pengendara nyangsang di dinya. Upami naek kuda labuh tina kudana tapi sukuna kapepet dina panambangan, aranjeunna tiasa kaseret upami kudana kabur. Pikeun ngaminimalkeun résiko ieu, sajumlah langkah-langkah kaamanan tiasa dilaksanakeun. Kahiji,kalolobaan pengendara nganggo sapatu bot kalawan keuneung sarta sol anu lemes, cekap seseg. Salajengna, sababaraha pelana, khususna pelana Inggris, ngagaduhan palang kaamanan anu ngamungkinkeun kulit aduk murag tina pelana upami ditarik katukang ku pengendara anu murag.

src: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit. Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification. A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay. He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation.
mt: Jaringan tukar tamu ngahubungkeun para pelancong jeung warga lokal di kota anu geus dipilih. Ngabubutuhkeun jaringan éta biasana ngahubungkeun jeung ngabubutuhkeun formulir online; tapi sababaraha jaringan tiasa ngahubungkeun jeung ngabubutuhkeun verifikasi tambahan. Daftar tamu anu geus disediakan bisa ditemoan dina cetak sareng/atawa online, kadang-kadang jeung referensi sareng/atawa review tina para pelancong. Couchsurfing diadegkeun dina Januari 2004 sabada Casey Fenton ngalaman penerbangan murah ka Islandia tapi teu mibanda tempat pikeun nginum. Anjeunna ngirimkeun email ka mahasiswa di universitas lokal sareng menerima jumlah luar biasa tina tawaran pikeun tempat nginum gratis.
ref: Jaringan pertukaran keramahan nyaéta organisasi anu ngahubungkeun palancong sareng warga lokal di kota-kota anu aranjeunna badé datangan. Gabung ka jaringan sapertos kitu biasana ngan ukur kedah ngeusian formulir daring; sanaos sababaraha jaringan nawiskeun atanapi peryogi pamariksaan tambihan. Daptar host anu sadia saterusna disadiakeun dina wangun citak sarta / atawa online, sakapeung-sakapeung kalawan referensi sarta katerangan ku wisatawan sanes. Couchsurfing didirikeun di sasih Januari 2004 saatos programer komputer Casey Fenton mendakan penerbangan anu mirah ka Islandia tapi teu aya tempat kanggo linggih. Anjeunna ngirimkeun surél ka mahasiswa di universitas lokal sareng seueur pisan nampi tawaran akomodasi gratis.
